name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan

reviews.review_text:
A brilliant 10 days. My wife, son and I had a great time.

The rooms are a very impressive size, the pool areas are fantastic and there is plenty of space and lots to do throughout the day.  A special mention to the staff that do the entertainment and games by the pool. They work so hard all day and really help everyone Kids and adults to have a good time. All the staff at the hotel were friendly, always smiling and really made our stay enjoyable. The hotel was always extremely clean. The evening entertainment was a good standard which in my experience is a plus as often it can be shocking.

The location of the hotel is fantastic. Only a 10-minute walk into the port which is stunning and lots of places to eat and drink.

Now for my one and only criticism but it didn't have any negative impact on our stay. The pull out sofa bed in the bedroom is so uncomfortable. It is like lying on a bed of lumpy metal. All it needs is some kind of mattress topper like they have on the main beds and that will be problem solved.

Thank you to everyone at the hotel.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had a brilliant 10 days and enjoyed the various aspects of our hotel.
We're delighted that you found our rooms spacious and impressive, and that the pool areas added to your enjoyment. Our dedicated entertainment and games staff are indeed the heart of our daytime activities, and we're glad to hear that their efforts helped both kids and adults have a great time.
It warms our hearts to know that our entire staff and entertainment contributed to making your stay enjoyable. We take pride in maintaining a clean and welcoming environment, and your acknowledgment of our efforts is greatly appreciated.
We're grateful for your constructive criticism regarding the pull-out sofa bed. We apologize for any discomfort it may have caused. Your suggestion of adding a mattress topper is a valuable one, and we will certainly consider this to enhance the comfort of our accommodations.
Once again, thank you for choosing our hotel for your vacation. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you and your family back in the future.

reviews.review_text: A great place to stay within a 10 minutes walk to the harbour. Good standard of rooms, some with pool access which I'd recommend. The sunbeds are quite uncomfortable with a support bar which intrudes when relaxing. It would be good to have a pool bar service so you can order from your sunbed.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent stay with us. 

We're delighted to hear that you found our location convenient, with just a 10-minute walk to the harbor. We take pride in offering our guests comfortable and well-appointed rooms, and we're pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay in our pool access rooms.

Your note about the sunbeds is valuable, and we'll look into ways to improve their comfort, addressing the issue of the support bar. Your comfort is important to us, and we'll strive to make your next visit even more relaxing.

Regarding pool bar service, your suggestion is well-received.

Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, where we aim to make your experience even more enjoyable.

reviews.review_text: 7 night stay- found the hotel to be great for the majority. Child friendly hotel without being over the top with kids. The pull out bed could be much better and is a pull out spring mattress. Breakfast had plenty of options and was good. Staff were friendly and attentive with the exception of the bald headed life guard. Removed towels off the sun beds while I took my daughter to the toilet as weren’t allowed to reserve sunbeds (we’d been gone 2 minutes.) When I asked him why he couldn’t speak a word of English to answer my questions but could speak perfects English with everyone else.
reviews.owner_answer:
We really appreciate your feedback about your stay at our hotel. We are glad to hear that overall your experience was excellent and that you enjoyed our services and facilities.
However, we are sorry to hear that there were some aspects that did not meet your expectations. We will take into consideration your comments regarding the folding bed and mattress to discuss possible improvements in that area to ensure greater comfort for our guests.
With regards to the incident with the lifeguard, we apologise for any inconvenience this may have caused and will pass your comments on to the responsible department to follow up.
Finally, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and that you were very complimentary about the exceptional treatment you received from our team members. 
We hope that you will give us another opportunity to host you in the future and that you will enjoy an even more satisfying experience.

reviews.review_text:
Just come back here after a weeks stay.  Its a fantastic hotel in a good location in a quiet location.   Good friendly staff and service.   Great for kids and adults.

It's not exactly 5 star hotel. But good solid 4 star.   It's a place I'd definitely return to in near future and highly recommend.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for taking the time to share your valuable feedback with us. We're thrilled to hear that you had a fantastic stay and found our hotel to be in a quiet yet convenient location with friendly staff and great service.
Regarding your feedback on the pull-out bed, we apologize for any discomfort you experienced, and we'll certainly look into improving this aspect for a better sleep experience.
We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay.

reviews.review_text: The most comfortable bed I have  ever slept on in a hotel  ever.  And the pillows are like you sink into a  marshmallow. The pool areas are great 3 in all one for the little ones, a lively one and a quiet one. The room was huge with a bath and a shower separate.  And the balcony  with tables and chairs. And 2 sunlounger very  comfortable too. For me, the walk to the harbour  was hard .but found a taxi rank for less than 5 euros, and we asked  hotel reception to ring a taxi .took less than  5 mins to come . But for people who are OK to walk  good location to walk down to the harbour  for the restaurants,  shops would take  15 minutes or less. Would highly recommend this hotel.. There is a spar on sight. I have a massage booked  for later today . There is a gym on site and football, tennis,volleyball  pichers.and a rock-climbing wall plenty to do for the children and adults to do
reviews.owner_answer:
We are thrilled to receive such positive feedback from your recent stay at our hotel. It's truly wonderful to hear that you found our beds and pillows exceptionally comfortable, enjoyed our pool areas, and appreciated the spacious room with a separate bath and shower. 
We're delighted that you highly recommend our hotel.
Our team is dedicated to making our guests' stays as enjoyable as possible, and your kind words are a testament to their hard work. We hope you continue to have a fantastic time during your stay, enjoy your massage, and make the most of the on-site facilities. Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

reviews.review_text:
Wow, what a place! Beautiful hotel in a beautiful setting, fantastic staff and amazing facilities.
Special thanks to the incredible animation team, theyre all brilliant!!!. They really did make the holiday special, especially for my son Tobias!!
Special mention to Martin on the animation team. He was just brilliant, his energy is contagious! He was great with the kids running all the games, and his Aqua gym was just the best...he even jumps in and joins in, love it!!!
Also, special mention to the wonderful life guard (I wish I knew his name...Short dark hair and always wore sunglasses) who was always super helpful!
Reception team are brilliant too, nothing was ever too much trouble.
I wish I could have stayed longer! Until next time, Annette x
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We're absolutely thrilled to hear that you had such a fantastic stay at our hotel and that you enjoyed our beautiful setting, staff, and facilities.
Our animation team takes great pride in making our guests' holidays special, and we're delighted to hear that they exceeded your expectations. Martin is indeed a gem, and his  energy is always a hit with our younger guests. It's great to know that he made Tobias' holiday memorable with his games and Aqua gym sessions.
We'll pass along your compliments to our lifeguard as well. We're sure he'll appreciate the recognition for his helpfulness and vigilance around the pool.
Our reception team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, and it's fantastic to hear that they were always ready to assist you.
We can't wait to welcome you back for another memorable stay with us.

reviews.review_text:
Absolutely stunning location and beautiful hotel. I'm so sad to be back home in the UK today and missing the hotel loads. The staff were fantastic, particularly the animation staff, restaurant and pool bar staff. Animation staff were so good with the children and all extremely friendly. The pools were amazing and sun beds no problem. Very clean and  quiet hotel and the food was great. Gluten free was no issue also .
I love gran canaria so much and would love to return here hopefully if we're back next year. 💗 🇬🇧
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, we would like to express our sincerest gratitude that you have chosen our hotel and also for sharing your opinion
We have no words to thank you for this great feedback you have sent us. We appreciate a lot your comments regarding the location, food, team members, cleanliness and pools. It is a pleasure to work for guests like you who appreciate our strong efforts for making guests’ stay better and we are happy to know that we have reached this with you. 
We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of the animation team.We cannot wait to welcome you again at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.

reviews.review_text:
Hotel is contemporary and furnished beautifully. Location is amazing, theres some really stunning beaches near by and amenities. Local restaurants especially by the marina serve authentic Spanish food with gorgeous view's. Upon hotel arrival we recieved a warm welcome with drinks, which was lovely. I'd recommend car rental as its a beautiful island to explore and hotel parking is easy and accessible. Decent sized pools, life guards however, are abrupt towards children which is unacceptable. Bar staff didn't appear to know how to make hot chocolate for a child and were very rude stating 'its not my problem' (strange behaviour). Cocktails are very poor but that's across the island, best to stick to beer or wine! Entertainment isn't great but they have some good activities for children. Breakfast and lunch is decent/boring. Dinner wasn't very pleasant,  unfortunately zero flavour, repetitive, limited choice and soup was always cold (disappointing). Staff appear very tired, rude and drained which makes you feel uncomfortable. On most days i couldn't find any staff members it was almost as though the hotel had been abandoned. There is no guidance on how to use or access anything. Larder bar has to be the worst bar (near main pool) and is quite dirty. Rooms are nice however, bathroom doors do not lock therefore zero privacy and unfortunately we had flies and  cockroaches which was really off putting. Pull out bed is painful to sleep on but main bed was amazing! Nobody picks up when you call reception and for some reason nearly every staff member struggles to speak English when it suits them. Nobody bothered cleaning our room on our last day which was a shame.
Spa was very good, massages are brilliant which i highly recommend if you can withstand the negatives. This hotel is NOT 5* but certainly 3* at the most. I would not stay here again or recommend it unfortunately. But I value the experience and shall remember how beautiful the Island is.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback about your recent stay at our hotel. We're glad to hear that you appreciated the contemporary and beautifully furnished aspects of the hotel, as well as the amazing location with stunning nearby beaches and amenities.
We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced with a member of our team. At Radisson Blu, all our staff is committed to creating memorable moments for our guests, which is why we will pass on your comments to the responsible departments for further follow-up and we will certainly take your comments about the cocktail quality and dinner options into consideration for future improvements.
We regret any inconvenience you experienced with the lack of guidance and accessibility to amenities. We will review our communication and signage to make it clearer for our guests.
We take the issue of cleanliness seriously and will address your concerns about the Larder bar and the presence of insects. We want to assure you that in our hotel, we follow strict pest control procedures to avoid any inconvenience of this kind. However, as we are located on an island, and the weather can influence the presence of insects, it can be a challenge to keep them completely away at times.
We appreciate your kind words about the spa and massages, and we are pleased that you enjoyed this aspect of your stay.
Your feedback is essential to us as it helps us identify areas for improvement. We apologize that your overall experience did not meet your expectations. We will take your comments into consideration as we strive to enhance our services and offerings.
Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for valuing the beauty of the island. If you ever decide to give us another chance in the future, we would be honored to welcome you back and provide you with a more enjoyable and memorable stay.

reviews.review_text:
Not like it was, I’ve been to this hotel a few times, I’ve recommended it a lot, but this time it just hasn’t been so great, we had to ask for hangers for our room 3 times, our coffee is not always topped up, the airer we asked for twice was broken( missing a leg) these aren’t the biggest problems in the world of course but this is an expensive hotel. Breakfast isn’t as good as it used to be, but still good. We are a family of four with young children, our room is next to the quiet pool. Been told to go to kids pool by life guard a few times my children are young but not really loud, just excited, what annoys me about this is there are kids in the pool at 10:30 pm making so much noice my children get woken up.
It’s not that this hotel is bad,anything but, but it’s not quite as good as it was, and because of that we probably wouldn’t return
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for sharing your honest feedback with us. We deeply value your continued support and loyalty as a repeat guest. We apologize for any inconvenience you encountered during your recent stay. Your concerns about hangers, coffee, and the airer not being promptly addressed are valid, and we're sorry for falling short of your expectations.

Your insights regarding breakfast and pool dynamics are also valuable. We understand the importance of maintaining a peaceful atmosphere, especially for families with young children. We're actively working on addressing these issues to ensure a more enjoyable experience for all guests.

Please know that your feedback helps us improve, and we're committed to regaining your trust. We appreciate your understanding and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a more pleasant stay.

reviews.review_text: One of my favorite holidays! This hotel is located in Mogan, the harbour, with restaurants and shops, is only a 15 minute walk away from the hotel and the nearest supermarket and small shopping centre which contains shops and a few restaurants is only a 5 minute walk away from the hotel reception exit. The hotel itself is well run, luxurious and has a great layout. The 2 pools and a very shallow pool, allow adults to have some quiet time on the 1st floor pool, while children can play with balls, be loud and mess around in the kids pool on floor 0 (which is slightly salty) but you don't notice it. Floor 0 also is where the entertainment takes place and also where the restaurants, bar, gym and spa are located. On floor 0 there is a smaller restaurant for lunch which is next to the quiet pool, there is also a volleyball court, tennis court, paddle court and a football court which is open 24/7 to have a kick about with your friends or to play a organized game by the hotel at 10am on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Sundays! Floors 2 and 3 only have rooms, but floor 4 has a sun deck and yoga deck. The food at the breakfast buffet is nice and runs until 11am. The hotel staff are very nice and helpful and the room service is quick and anything you need at the hotel, they will most likely have it, such as a power adapter for UK plugs, clothes drier, extra pillows etc. Overall I had a great experience at the hotel and definitely would stay at a raddison blu hotel again!
reviews.owner_answer:
It sounds like you had an amazing experience at the hotel! Your detailed description of its location, facilities, and services truly captures the essence of what makes it special. It's great to hear that the hotel's layout, pools, and various amenities provided such a comfortable stay.
 The availability of sports facilities like the volleyball, tennis, paddle, and football courts, along with the organized games, is definitely a plus for our guests who enjoy staying active during their holidays.
We thank you also for the positive comments about the breakfast buffet and the helpfulness of the hotel staff.
 Thanks for sharing your experience in such detail! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again!

reviews.review_text:
Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and the hotel is great. I hope my comments help you make a choice because there's a few things to consider. We went 9th-19th September. This is by far the busiest hotel I have ever stayed in, this is not a criticism at all, just shows how popular it is. There's a constant buzz of people everywhere - but it is not loud and we still found the atmosphere and poolside very relaxing. We don't have kids but even as an outsider, we could tell it's very family friendly. Being child-free shouldn't put you off though, it's caters very well for most. I'd say if you want seclusion or you don't want to be around kids at all, this is not the place for you and perhaps look for something adults only. Also, if you want to be partying all night in an 18-30's type vibe, also not for you. Despite the busy atmosphere of people and kids activities, most people are sat peacefully, with a glass of sangria relaxing!

The staff are great! Lots of languages spoken, we mainly heard German, English and Spanish. I tried with my terrible Spanish though and they do appreciate you having a go! Everyone was very knowledgeable and helpful. On the last day, I think because it seemed quieter, we got offered drinks poolside and table service - which was ace! I wish we'd had this service all the time.

The rooms are air conditioned and the air conditioning is quiet too for the most part, unless it hasn't been on and it means you want to dramatically change the temperature. We had two room keys and generally left one in the power so the air con was on whilst we were out and about so we always came back to the room nice and cool. The room was serviced daily. My only critique here is that the consumables weren't consistently replaced, teabags, milks, toiletries. However, bed made, bins emptied, floors mopped, towels changed etc, all very consistent. Beds were by far the most comfy I've ever slept in at a hotel - kudos! Note, ours was two single beds pushed together, rather than a double/king bed. Not a problem at all.

The gym.... I used the gym 6/10 days. Good things are it's generally empty. I'd describe it as small for the size of the hotel but that comment is irrelevant really as the most people in there when I used it was 3, including me. It would perhaps be a waste of space to make it any larger. I only used the cardio machines and it's functional but in need of an update really. The treadmills, no problems but little things like you can see rust forming, one of them the touch screen hardly worked. The exercise bike is so old and rusty you can't adjust the seat. The rowing machine, I couldn't keep my feet in (could have been me though)! There didn't feel much resistance because it was some sort of water thing (hard to explain!). Just generally, it needs an update in my opinion but you'll get by if you want to use it.

Didn't visit the spa, prices are what you'd expect for a hotel which priced us out.

Finally, breakfast. Oh my goodness me, best breakfast buffet ever. It's chaotic, lots of people, trying to get what they need but I was very impressed. We usually ate around 9:00-10:00 ish. All what you'd expect, hot 'English' breakfast, cheese, meats, bread, cereal, pastries, juices, yogurts but there's a few things that went above and beyond for me. Cava is freely available if you fancy a cheeky breakfast mimosa, smoked salmon freely available too. (I find that most places charge extra for salmon and fizz). Tea and coffee brought to the table and hot milk provided as standard. Egg station - so you can get an omelette made with your choice of filling fresh in front of you and fried eggs are done to order. I personally really liked this, I hate picking up a fried egg that looks like it's sad and been under a hot plate for hours. I felt like all these little extras, with the plethora of choice in the first place made it fantastic. There's so much fruit, bread, cheese, meat, the choice really is superb.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for providing such a detailed and insightful review of your stay with us! Your feedback is incredibly valuable, and we appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts.
It's wonderful to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay and that you found the hotel to be great. Your observations about the hotel's atmosphere, especially during your stay in September, are helpful for potential guests to understand what to expect. We are indeed a family-friendly establishment, and we take pride in providing a welcoming environment for all.
We're glad to know that you had positive interactions with our multilingual staff, and it's heartening to hear that you appreciated the table service by the pool on your last day. We'll take your feedback about offering this service more consistently into consideration.
Thank you for your detailed comments about the rooms and the air conditioning. We'll review the consumables replacement process to ensure a more consistent experience for our guests. It's great to hear that you found the beds comfortable, and we're pleased that the room configuration met your expectations.
Your feedback about the gym is noted, and we will consider improvements to the equipment and facilities. We want to ensure that all our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable experience in our gym.
Lastly, your glowing review of our breakfast buffet is greatly appreciated. We're thrilled that you found it to be the best you've ever had, and your detailed description will undoubtedly help future guests understand the fantastic options we offer. We aim to provide a wide variety of choices to cater to different tastes and preferences.
Once again, thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

reviews.review_text:
First time in this hotel, in short not a 5 star hotel for sure. Bad quality towels, no service in the pool area. Rooms are more then outdated and shower equipment as well as chrome all is not maintained properly. Cleaning is terrible and hairs and others they just leave on the floor. Water in the pool gets really warm this period and is to small for the amount of people in the hotel.

Soccer field and tennis is perfect
Breakfast is reasonable ok

Radisson app does not work, you can ask things 20 x and it just does not come ..
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing us and for taking the time to write this review. 
We are sorry to hear that you had some inconveniences during your stay. We thank you for your comments and apologise. We will forward your comments to the relevant departments as it is thanks to our guests that we are able to constantly improve. We kindly ask you to always contact our reception team during your stay so that we can assist you at all times and meet your needs. 
We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again in the future and to offer you a memorable stay.

reviews.review_text:
Popular with families this is a great resort hotel for guaranteed sun and heat. The pool was 32 C in August and there are 4 pools a quiet chlorine one, a small kids salt water one and the large main salt water family pool.

Serval organised fun games a day (eg water polo, pool aerobics etc), bingo and a show each evening.

You will no doubt spend a lot of time looking at rocks of the nearby cliffs. It is in a valley so day are slightly shorter than some place.

Food is good and the breakfast buffet is plentiful and varied with the usual resort pancake and egg station.

No inflatables in the pools.

The location is about a 400m walk from the sea / beach. This is fine but the walk shows some of the resort of Morgan seems to have been abandoned in its development.

The restaurants at the beach and the new town(the bit that looks like Venice.. allegedly..yeh right. It has a couple of bridges) are not any cheaper than the hotel restaurants.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your experience! We're delighted you enjoyed our family-friendly resort, from the variety of pools to the engaging activities and delicious dining options. We appreciate your insights about the surrounding area as well. Looking forward to welcoming you back for more sunny memories!

reviews.review_text: A great hotel that I’ve visited numerous times. It’s great value with lots of space for everyone and the buffet is great. It’s starting to look ready for a lick of paint here and there though.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you  for sharing your feedback with us. We appreciate your loyalty to our hotel.
We're pleased to hear that you find our hotel to be a great value with ample space and enjoy our buffet offerings. Your input is valuable to us, and we will certainly take your comments about the appearance of the property into consideration. We're committed to maintaining our facilities to the highest standards, and your observation will help us make the necessary improvements.
Once again, thank you for your feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the future.

reviews.review_text: Amazing hotel , staff, and services all you can need is in one place. Food is really good, kids enjoyed the pool every day. 5 star from the arrival until the last minute.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at our hotel. We truly appreciate your kind words.

It's delightful to hear that you found our hotel amazing and enjoyed our staff and services. We take great pride in providing exceptional hospitality, and we're thrilled to know that we could meet your expectations throughout your stay. We're especially glad that your kids had a fantastic time in our pool—it's always a pleasure to see families enjoying themselves.

We're also pleased to hear that you found our food to be really good. Our culinary team works diligently to offer a diverse and delicious menu, and it's rewarding to know that it left a positive impression on you.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and for your generous five-star rating. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you and your family back for another memorable experience in the future.

reviews.review_text:
Amazing hotel and facilities
Staff were great, food was great.
The only downside is its quite a way to the beach.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that you found our staff and food to be great.

Regarding the distance to the beach, we apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. In fact, our hotel is only a short 15-minute walk from the beach, which allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds - the tranquility of our facilities and the beauty of the beach just a stone's throw away. We hope to welcome you back soon!

reviews.review_text: Enjoyed our 9 night stay at the Radisson Blu in Mogan. We stayed in the top section of the hotel around the quiet pool. Bed was super comfy, a great balcony with comfy loungers, and a great selection for breakfast (Would advise going a little earlier to avoid the rush at peak times). Staff were very welcoming and helpful. My only slight issue was with the cleaning of the rooms - Our dirty cups/glasses were not replaced everyday and our towels disappeared over the stay (not sure why they were taken but not replaced). It still gets 5* from us though!
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, thank you for sharing us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.

We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your kind words regarding the rooms, beds, breakfast and team members; we will share your comments with the whole team as guests like you make us very proud to work at the hotel and give us motivation to keep going and improving.
This time, we do regret to read that we could not satisfy your expectations in every moment, especially in terms of cleanliness. We will consider your feedback and we will pass all the information to the corresponding departments in order to take action to improve our services.
We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text: Lovely modern resort hotel . We had half board. The food was excellent. Great pool areas with jacuzzis. Not far from Puerto Mogan. Entertainment every night. Beds are so comfortable. Aircon, safe and fridge in all rooms. Kettle in Superior rooms. Staff always kind and helpful.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your wonderful review of our resort hotel! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our modern facilities, including the great pool areas and jacuzzis, met your expectations. It's also great to know that you found the food to be excellent and that you appreciated the comfort of our beds. We strive to provide a range of amenities, including air conditioning, safes, and fridges, to ensure our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable experience. We're glad our staff was kind and helpful throughout your stay. We hope to welcome you back in the future for another memorable stay!

reviews.review_text: A sublime hotel. My premier room was spacious and tastefully decorated. I highly recommend paying extra for dinner, since there is a vast array of dishes and the value exceeds local restaurants.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your great review ! We're glad you enjoyed your spacious and tastefully decorated premier room and our dinner options. We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back in the future.

reviews.review_text: Great resort spend 7 nights with family at this Radisson blu, the staff were exceptional and the kids loved it.  1 large family pool, a quiet pool and a kids pool which were not too busy.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your positive feedback! We're delighted to know that you and your family had a fantastic  stay at our resort. Our team takes pride in delivering exceptional service, and we're thrilled that the amenities, including the different pool options, added to your family's enjoyment. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another memorable experience in the future!

reviews.review_text: We allready knew the hotel, the fantastic rooms, facilities and the nice staff. This is our third holiday at Radisson Blu Resort and Spa, but for the first time we had Asian dinner buffet in the Larder Restaurant and both the food and the rosè was amazing👏 for all 6 of us from age of 16 to 92🥳
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're delighted to hear that you had such a fantastic dining experience at the Larder Restaurant during your third holiday at our Radisson Blu Resort and Spa. It's great to know that the Asian dinner buffet exceeded your expectations, and you enjoyed both the food and the rosè. We truly appreciate your kind words and are thrilled that we could provide an enjoyable dining experience for all six members of your group, spanning different age ranges. We hope to have the pleasure of serving you again on your future visits. Thank you for choosing our resort!

reviews.review_text:
The good bits: lovely big well laid out hotel. Large rooms, excellent beds, excellent spacious bathrooms, two nice pools, not too crowded, and very attentive and friendly staff. Great facilities and service.

The less good bits: breakfast choice was ok, maybe could have used some more Spanish items, but quality wasn't 5 star - no freshly baked pastries and some cooked/fish items felt cheap. The other detraction was the the awful early evening entertainment: we were subjected to "club singers" every night, butchering pop classics on cheap keyboards. The hotel should hire some of the local (surprisingly good) street musicians instead, would have been much easier on the ears.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for taking the time to give us such honest and detailed feedback.We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of facilities, rooms, pools and staff. On the other hand, we are sorry that the breakfast offer did not meet your expectations. We are also sorry that our evening shows were not to your liking. We have taken note of this and have passed it on to the responsible departments to follow up and implement improvement.
We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the not too distant future and hope you can let us be again at your service.

reviews.review_text:
Tuesday night 25th April 2023 8:00 PM - I have just been to the only bar open and ordered 2 * large G&Ts.. what a disappointment, my wife’s was fine , mine was a single…

Why would you want to behave like that… never again….

Absolutely cannot believe it! Treating customers fairly is not on there menu!
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing us and for taking the time to write this review. 
We are sorry to hear that the order was not to your liking. We would like to mention that the bar in the quiet area closes around 18:30 pm to avoid noise, as it is a guaranteed quiet area. 
However our other pool bar is open until 8 o'clock at the same time you will find another bar open the Entertainment Room & Bar where you can order drinks.
 We kindly inform you that all our drinks are composed of a wide selection of premium drinks and the sizes are standardized. Please ask our bar staff to help you  find the option that best suits your tastes. If you need any further advice during your stay please consult our front office staff. 
At Radisson Blu we are committed to creating memorable moments for all our guests.

reviews.review_text:
Ive just spent a lovely 12-night stay at Radisson Blu, Puero Mogán.
The hotel was perfect for our family of 4. Rooms were of a very high standard as was the food in all the restaurants.
I have to highlight the staff though- from cleaning, bar, waiting and front of house, all of them are a credit to themselves and the Radisson Blu chain. I can’t praise them highly enough. Hard working, attentive, always smiling. 10/10!
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for sharing your positive experience at Radisson Blu, Puerto Mogán!. We are glad to hear that the rooms exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed the high-quality food in all the restaurants.
It's especially great to hear that the staff left a lasting impression on you. From the cleaning team to the bar, waiting, and front of house staff, they all contributed to making your stay exceptional. Their hard work, attentiveness, and ever-present smiles truly made a difference. I'm sure the staff  will be thrilled to receive your glowing feedback. Thank you for acknowledging their efforts!
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you and your family back for another memorable stay in the future

reviews.review_text:
Modern hotel with friendly staff, nice rooms and great facilities for children, such as the kids club and kids pool. Breakfast and dinner were nice, particularly the BBQ at dinner was amazing.
The best feature of the hotel is that all pools are heated to a comfortable level, great in February!
I would recommend allowing guests to choose whether they would like to be located in the quiet/adult area or in the family area when making their reservation.
reviews.owner_answer: First of all, thank you for sharing us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán. We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your kind words regarding staff, facilities, pools and food; we will share your comments with the whole team as guests like you make us very proud to work at the hotel and give us motivation to keep going and improving.It is always a pleasure to receive such positive comments. Your satisfaction is our best award. We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text:
Currently on holiday in this hotel for 9 days and it's simply gorgeous
No issue with sunloungers
Breakfast has a vast choice and good quality
Location is superb for exploring Mogan
Staff are all friendly and super helpful
Rooms are clean, modern and very comfy, the bed is like a marshmallow it's that good
Outside area of the rooms is really good too with decent sunloungers and a decent rattan table and chairs
Overall I can't fault this hotel
I use Radisson a lot for work and this is the first time I've used them for a family holiday but it certainly won't be the last
The whole family is really pleased with our choice
Thanks Radisson
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you're having a fantastic time at our hotel. It's great to know that you're enjoying the gorgeous surroundings, the sunloungers, and the vast breakfast choices. We're glad our location has been perfect for you. Our staff takes pride in providing friendly and helpful service, and we're delighted to hear that you found our rooms comfortable and modern. We're overjoyed that your whole family is pleased with your choice, and we can't wait to welcome you all back in the future. Have an amazing holiday!

reviews.review_text: Overall good hotel breakfast is nice food and the complex is clean but had a bad experience right at the end of the holiday with someone stealing a t-shirt that was drying outside.
reviews.owner_answer:
We appreciate you taking the time to share your recent experience with us, and we want to express our gratitude for your feedback. We are committed to continuously improving our services and ensuring the comfort and security of our guests.


We kindly request that in the event of any issues or incidents, such as the one you experienced, please inform our reception team immediately. Our dedicated staff is here to assist you and ensure your well-being throughout your stay. reviews.review_text: Excellent hotel& location. Food is very good and has vegan & vegetarian options

reviews.review_text: Love this resort! Been there two years in a row. Will definitely go back. Quiet but not too quiet, nice buffet in the evening and great breakfast! Nice pools, great place for the kids and close enough to the beach!

Your satisfaction is our best award. We cannot wait to welcome you back. Please contact us directly and we will try to assist you with everything.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing place. It's close to the beach and has amazing pools. Excellent for family and for a quick break. Don't plan anything as you have plenty of daily activities in the resort or if you want, you can ask them to plan outside activities and they will do it gladly.
reviews.owner_answer: First of all, we would like to express our sincerest gratitude that you have chosen our hotel and also for sharing your opinion.We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of  pools, activities and facilities. We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text: We stayed here with my 4yr old. He loved the kids pool. The hotel was amazingly clean and beds were so soft and comfortable. We booked a 2 bed family room and it was massive and had two balconies. The hotel has no beach view and not really in walking distance to the port. But it has a supermarket across the road and if you hire a car it's in a lovely quite part of the island. I have dietary requirements for gluten free and the hotel has excellent options for this but I would comment that the staff don't always understand the request so you may have to repeat and ask multiple times.
reviews.owner_answer:

reviews.review_text:

Minor criticism, service slow getting a drink in the entainment bar after dinner. Wouldn't serve at the bar. Could benefit from another bar in the evening.

reviews.review_text: What a wonderful resort! The service is amazing.  Food is wonderful.  Every night the food is different.  And yes, I have dessert every night too!

reviews.review_text: Great place for a family getaway, clean, well organised, lots of fun things to do in the resort, staff are always smiling and super helpful, pools are fabulous, rooms are big, airy, modern and clean. Really handy for the local beach and shops. Perfect for a relaxing break away in the sun.

reviews.review_text: Good hotel pool selection 👌 the food selection could be better location a bit out the way you  can  walk to Porto de Morgan and get a bus or the boat apart from that it's  OK 👍
reviews.owner_answer:

reviews.review_text: The Radisson blu Mogan more than meets expectation. The staff are wonderful and the rooms and facilities are excellent. Highly recommended.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for having chosen our hotel for your stay.We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of rooms, facilities and team members. We would be delighted to welcome you back sometime soon.

reviews.review_text:
An absolutely fantastic hotel in a lovely location.

The rooms are serviced every day, fresh bed linen and you sleep like an angel in an air conditioned environment.

The pools are great. The larger salt water pool is heated enough that you don't go into shock if you go in it early on, the other fresh water pool is the same with enforced quiet areas also. A 'no towel' policy applies to the sun beds until 10am also, the lifeguard removes towels before that time that have no one on or near them. This means you can actually lie in past 7am and still get a lounger by the pool!

The life guards run competitions and fun activities every hour or two and loads of kids get involved.

The diners are great, all you can eat with freshly cooked options like omelette in a morning and burgers etc in an evening.

The staff are extremely friendly and helpful.

The walk into town takes 15 to 20 minutes depending how much wine you've had, loads of varied restaurants in town to try. The beach is well maintained and has options for pedalos with slides and so on. While not part of the hotel it all adds to its appeal.

All in highly recommended.
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, thank you for sending us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.
We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay with your family. We appreciate your kind words regarding pools, rooms and our team members ; we will share your comments with the whole team as guests like you make us very proud to work at the hotel and give us motivation to keep going and improving.

We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text: Fantastic hotel, great staff, great location, great pools Fantastic rooms. Can't say enough good things about it

reviews.review_text: Friendly staff, great accommodation, large choices at all themed buffet meals. A very relaxing stay.

reviews.review_text: this has to be one of the best hotels i’ve ever stayed at! the customer service was AMAZING! welcomed us with a nice lovely glass of champagne & orange juice (for the non alcoholic drinker, which i found so considerate), they assisted us with any questions we had. the hotel is filled with lovely people who love their job & are proud to show it! they have an endless breakfast range & the rooms were clean!

reviews.review_text:
We recently stayed in the Radisson blue and this was our experience:

- Confort: 2/5. The bed was really soft and it caused back and neck pain.
- Cleanness: 2/5. The room cleaning was ok (we kept finding hair everywhere) and the shower had mold. Parts of the hotel smelled like animal pee and last but least the room was smelly.
- Facility: 3/5. The pool area is the highlight. The rooms, gym, and other areas could use a big refresh.
- Friendliness 3/5. The waiters and restaurant personnel were super nice, but the receptionists were not.
- Value 3.5/5.

Unfortunately we would not recommend to a friend based on the other options in the island with similar offerings.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing us and for taking the time to write this review.
We would like to mention that we have a free pillow menu for all guests and we have the option of making the mattress harder. Please always contact our reception team so we can help you with all your needs and ensure you have a memorable stay.  On the other hand we regret the incidents you may have had with the cleanliness, we apologise and we will pass your comment to the responsible department to follow up and implement improvements. 
We would like to mention that we have recently renovated several sports areas of the hotel. We thank you for your suggestions.  Finally, we thank you for the positive comments about our restaurant staff and we are sorry to hear that you had an issue with a member of our reception team. We apologise and will pass your comments on to the responsible department.
We ask you for a second chance to make your next stay a unique one.

reviews.review_text: Visited with our 9 month old daughter. Service was excellent. We had problems with our initial room and the staff solved it immediately. The location and view is beautiful and the live entertainment in the evening was wonderful. Food was very decent too, but some dishes got a little bit repetitive even though they tried to vary each day. Staff was very kind and accommodating to little ones.
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, thank you for sharing us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.

We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay with your family. We appreciate your kind words regarding  the entertaiment, location and staff ; we will share your comments with the whole team as guests like you make us very proud to work at the hotel and give us motivation to keep going and improving.
We are glad to know that our front desk staff has solved any inconvenience and helped you to fulfill all your needs.

We thank you for your positive comments about the food. On the other hand, we will take into consideration your comment in order to transfer it to the department in charge and follow up on it.

We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text: I came as a couple without children and was still placed in the family section where it was loud and full of children. We asked to move to the quiet area, and they initially agreed for the next day but when we came back the next person said "no" which was disappointing and unprofessional. Soundproofing is decent for the window but they neglected the door and so every time maintenance or anyone gets off the elevator you hear it loud and clear.  The "half board" buffet is decent quality but it's a bit of an annoying charade to hand vouchers at a "5 star" resort.  Everything is a hassle. That and they charge extra for your drinks at the buffet (even water).  On the whole the staff are kind. The cleanliness of the rooms leaves a little to be desired
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing us and for taking the time to write this review.
We are sorry to hear that you had some inconvenience with the location of your room and we are sorry to hear that you had some problems with the noise. We apologise and have passed your feedback on to the responsible department.
Thank you for your review of our food and we are sorry that our system caused you any inconvenience. 
We would like to mention that the beverage regime at dinner is always an extra service and due to the fact that in the Canary Islands it is not recommended to drink tap water, there is only the possibility to drink bottled water.

Finally we are sorry that the cleanliness did not meet your expectations.
We hope to have a second opportunity to make your next experience a unique stay.

reviews.review_text:
This was the third time that my partner and I had stayed at this hotel as we've always thoroughly enjoyed our stays and as gold Radisson members we have always been very well looked after. However, on this occasion, this was sadly not the case.
The first room we were offered, although nice and clean,  smelt like cigarette smoke and there was very little privacy and so we were kindly moved to a second room. This room had an ant infestation and when I informed reception of this they sent maintenance who sprayed the room with ant killer. We were then informed the problem had been dealt with. Unfortunately, the problem had not been dealt with and there were still a significant number of ants crawling over the surfaces and around the bed. I, therefore, therefore asked to move again. I was told by the manager that there were no rooms available and that the hotel was fully booked. I quickly checked online and showed him that I was able to book several rooms for my stay and he then changed his tune and offered me a ground-floor room but couldn't guarantee there were no ants. I informed him that for a 5-star hotel this was not good enough but I would take the room. When waiting for the room to be made up he managed to 'find' a higher-up room which we moved to. Fortunately, there were no ants but there was a very strong sewerage smell coming from the drains.
Except for the evening manager, the staff were all very helpful and the facilities were clean.
I feel the hotel requires some maintenance as cracks are showing in the plaster, damp patches are visible on the ceilings and mould was present in all of the bathrooms we were in.
For a five-star hotel I expected better and always have experienced better so this time it was an exceptionally disappointing visit.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for staying with us and for assessing your experience. We look forward to your next visit!

reviews.review_text: Thank you very much to all staff teams for making our stay pleasant, relaxing and attractive. Big thanks to a wonderful animation team, Barbara, Monika and Angelika for making our children’s experience joyful and special with all kinds of activities. We had a wonderful stay in the hotel and hope to see everyone again in near future. Valerie, Vincent with parents
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, thank you for sharing us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.
We would especially like to thank you for the comments you made concerning our staff. We are sure that they will be very satisfied to hear that there are guests who appreciate their work.
It is always a pleasure to receive such positive comments. Your satisfaction is our best award.
We would be delighted to welcome you back sometime soon.

reviews.review_text:
This isn't a 5 star hotel as it claims. If you accept that, I would imagine you won't be as disappointed.
It's a massive hotel but with no soul and certainly doesn't look or feel Spanish in any way. Just feels like any other large corporate hotel.
Plus points, all the staff were friendly, professional and courteous.
Breakfast was fairly standard fare, some items could be a bit hit and miss but a good selection.
We ate dinner only on the one night and it was very disappointing. Stone cold steak with stone cold mushroom sauce (not even sure how's it possible that these could be cold!) that was left uneaten.
The sofa bed in the bedroom was so uncomfortable that we had to request a mattress topper for it, they supplied a piece of foam. I wouldn't stay again for that reason alone.
The quiet pool area is in poor condition with tiles lifting from the bottom of the pool. Never seen this in a 5-star hotel.
Room condition was no where near what I would expect for a 5-star hotel, cleaning again a 3/5. Overall it feels like a slightly upmarket Butlins!
My advice would be if you want to stay in a hotel in Puerto Mogan, look at the Cordial Mogan Playa.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for taking the time to write this review.
We appreciate the positive comments about our staff.
On the other hand, we are sorry that we did not meet your expectations and thank you for your comments about the dining and facilities. We will pass your comments on to the appropriate departments.

Finally we are sorry that you had some inconvenience with the cleanliness and we thank you for your comment about it, we will transmit it to the corresponding department to follow up.

We hope you will give us a second chance to make your next stay a totally satisfactory one.

reviews.review_text: for a 5 star hotel we were quite disappointed. I dont think I ever slept so bad during a vacation, the mattress and pillows are of bad quality. Food was ok but in the restaurant it feels like being in a canteen. The employees working there are all friendly but not the ones at the reception..we would not recommend this hotel as in Gran Canaria there are much better options for 5 stars hotels
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing us and for taking the time to write this review. We regret that we did not meet your expectations. We would like to mention that we have a free pillow menu available for our guests as well as options to make the mattress harder. We ask that you please always contact our front office staff so that we can make your stay a memorable one. 
On the other hand we are sorry that we did not meet your expectations with the food. At Raddison Blu we work with local suppliers to ensure the freshness and quality of all our food. We also apologise if you have had any issues with any of our staff, we will pass your comments on to the responsible department to follow up and implement improvements. We hope to have another opportunity to make your next stay a unique one.

reviews.review_text:
Radisson blu Morgan

Definitely would not class this particular hotel a 5 star as they’ve advertised it. I travel 5 star hotels round the world and this one does not fit in that category whatsoever! Discrimination at the highest!

Arrogant and rude staff, managers backing the staff although staff being on the wrong! That just shows lack of professionalism with no equality especially for the management team. The company needs to review their decision in employing unqualified employees with no interpersonal skills. In addition to this the spa is at additional cost which is a joke for a hotel advertised as ‘5 stars’! And the list just goes on!

Absolutely ridiculous this hotel has more red flags on the list🚩
What’s more appalling is that I see a lot of previous bad reviews here and yet the management have made false statements that will improve, however, I see no changes is in place! Surely if changes were to be made when people initially complained, by now I shouldn’t be experiencing similar issues.
I would definitely NOT recommend this hotel. 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Ash H, 
 
Thank you so much for the time taken to share your feedback through Tripadvisor after your recent stay with us. 
 
We hope you accept our sincere apologies for not being able to meet all your expectations; however, we would like to let you know that we are surprised to receive your review regarding discrimination, as one of our main values is to treat all our guests and team with the respect we all deserve.
On the other hand, we know that you have been in touch with the management regarding this situation and they have talked directly to you to make your stay more comfortable. 
 
Best regards,

reviews.review_text:
Best holiday hotel ever.
Every single thing about this hotel is faultless. The most outstanding feature is the staff. Every single member of staff is welcoming, friendly and helpful. The rooms are impeccable. The food is amazing. The location is perfect. The hotel facilities are endless. It made my trip 100x more enjoyable and unforgettable. The entertainment is great too! Thank you to everyone at the hotel.
reviews.owner_answer:

We have no words to thank you for this great feedback you have sent us. We appreciate a lot your comments regarding the facilities and services. It is a pleasure to work for guests like you who appreciate our strong efforts for making guests’ stay better and we are happy to know that we have reached this with you.

reviews.review_text: Beautiful hotel with very nice rooms. We had a standard double room and found it spacious and well equipped with a nice modern look. Breakfast was great! We would definitely go back 😊 …
reviews.owner_answer: First of all, thank you for sharing us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán. Our aim is to ensure that each and every guest has a memorable stay with us and it is wonderful that we did this for you. We do hope to welcome you back to the hotel soon.

reviews.review_text: Stayed here for a week and really enjoyed it. Upon arrival you are warmly greeted by the nice staff who offer you a welcome drink while they inform you about your stay. Your luggage will be brought to your room for free if you'd like. The pool areas always have many available sunchairs even in busy periods. There are two pools+the childrens pool, both are very nice, one is salwater, and the other one is water with chlorine. Near the kids pool besides the "VIC kid's club", there is an arcade machine, a mini-billiard table, an airhockey game, and a candy claw machine. The breakfast buffet is nice aswell, there is a big selection of food aswell as drinks. As for the restaurants on the hotel, you will find 4. The 2 pool bars, the buffet and restaurant "Fillini". Both pool bars' kitchen open at around 13 and close at 16/17 if im correct. The buffet is called "Around The World Buffet" and serves differently geographically themed food every night, which is very nice. The restaurant "Fillini" serves italian food for both lunch and dinner. The hotel is located nicely within the mountains, and is near a nice promenade that leads to the city/beach. They have a free parking service in the basement level, which is very nice if you are renting a car. I can really reccomend this, especially if you are staying with younger children.
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, thank you for sharing us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.
We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay with your family. We appreciate your kind words regarding the services, facilities and food ; we will share your comments with the whole team as guests like you make us very proud to work at the hotel and give us motivation to keep going and improving.
At Radisson Blu, we know that the holidays are some of the most important times of the year and that is why it brightens our day to read opinions as positive as yours.
We thank you for your wonderful description otherwise we would like to mention that the Filini restaurant now serves Mediterranean, local and international cuisine.
We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text: A lovely hotel with great facilities. We had a week here half board. The food was excellent, tasty and well presented with lots of variety. The standout feature was the friendliness and helpfulness of every member of staff we came across - cleaners, waiters, receptionists, pool attendants, animation team. Thank you.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for having chosen our hotel for your stay. We are glad that you have enjoyed our beautiful paradise, but most important, the service provided by our staff who is the one responsible of creating memorable experiences in our valued guests.
We cannot wait to welcome you again at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.

reviews.review_text: Everything is absolutely amazing...breakfast, rooms, service, swimming pools, kids area, activities...so happy we came here..
reviews.owner_answer: First of all, we would like to express our sincerest gratitude that you have chosen our hotel and also for sharing your opinion.. We appreciate a lot your comments regarding breakfast, rooms, service, kids area and activities. It is a pleasure to work for guests like you who appreciate our strong efforts for making guests’ stay better and we are happy to know that we have reached this with you. reviews.review_text:
The hotel itself is peasant with nice rooms, pools and kids activities. However there is barely any cleaning staff. We called 4 times to get our room cleaned and no one came.
There’s also no staff for pools r ice drinks or food. For the cost of this place per night , it isn’t 5 star service to cleanliness. Very disappointing!
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing us and for taking the time to write this review. We are sorry to hear that you had problems with the cleanliness. We apologise and thank you for your feedback. We will pass it on to the responsible department to follow up and implement improvements.
We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our hotel and make your next experience a satisfactory one.

reviews.review_text:
It’s definitely not a 5* hotel. Room cleaning and overall level max 3 *. Hope management will take all measures and fix this, because it is inappropriate conditions for such a price and not following standards for 5* hotel
- Air conditioner full of dust, not cleaned, dirty. Allergic people be Alert!!!
- Dirty floor
- Shower cabin very dirty and hair after previous tourists

Only what we liked is pool and breakfast
reviews.owner_answer:
T
hank you very much for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to write this review. We appreciate your positive comments about our breakfast and swimming pool. On the other hand, we are sorry that you had some inconvenience with the cleanliness, we apologize and we transmit your comment to the hotel management to follow up and implement improvements.

We hope to have a second opportunity to make your next stay a unique stay.

reviews.review_text:
Hotel is great. A family room is two separate rooms (and bathrooms) with a shared lobby and access via the balconies which is perfect when you have teens / tweens.
We had half board and enjoyed both breakfast and dinner for 5 days. Good selection and the staff are all very friendly and accommodating. I didn’t like the house wine by the glass so we bought a more expensive bottle and were able to put it away each night and enjoy it the following night.
Common areas are very spacious and separating the adult and child pools works well. There are activities and entertainment if you want them but you are not forced into it. Location is excellent and far less touristy than other places on the island.
Only gripe would be you only get free water in the room on the first day, this isn’t replaced.
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Kathryn, we would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your impressions. It is fantastic to read that our comfortable family room, the half board meal choice, friendly staff, spacious common areas and the hotel´s  location close to the Mogan port were to your liking. We hope to have another chance to welcome you again. Kind regards

reviews.review_text: A great hotel, with great friendly staff! Big shout out to Leo and all the entertainment staff for making us feel so welcome. The breakfast and dinner buffet are also great with quick speedy service. Just remember to practice your table tennis in order to win a free cocktail 🍹
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, I would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan

We are glad that you have enjoyed our beautiful paradise, but most important, the service provided by our staff who is the one responsible of creating memorable experiences in our valued guests. We also want to thank you for mentioning by name so many of our wonderful staff; a copy of your review will go to Leo and to the animation team.

We are glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. Furthermore, we pretty much appreciate that you liked the facilities of the hotel as well as the food.

We are looking forward to welcoming you soon.

reviews.review_text: The place is spectacular. The service from the staff there was excellent, you can relax  in the resort without going out. Everything is easy to find. Local supermarket is 5 minutes away, so is the street market in the same location. Food inside the resort is worth it, breakfast was full of options to try from. From the bar in the night, Christian really looked after us. Casiano from reception also very well into taking care of our requests.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Ala Uddi,
We are glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.Your lovely review and the high score you valued us, serve us an encouragement for all the team. Also thank you for mentioning our nice collegues Christian from the bar and Casiano from reception.
We are looking forward to welcoming you soon.

reviews.review_text: What a fantastic hotel. Staff are excellent,  food exceptional and the rooms cleaned to a high standard. I feel safe in this hotel. The outdoor areas, spa and restaurants are also cleaned to a high standard. My husband received a lovely surprise cake and bottle of bubbles for his birthday. A lovely thoughtful touch. Thank you 😊
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Morag Kelly,

First of all, we would like to thank you for choosing Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogán to enjoy your holiday and for the time taken to send us your feedback.

We are delighted to know that you and your family had a wonderful holiday in our new resort hotel and fully enjoyed our comfortable facilities. We are happy we could play a small part making your husband´s birhtday special.

We look forward to your return!

Sunny regards from Puerto de Mogán

Fayna Rodriguez
Guest Relations

reviews.review_text:
We are absolutely delighted we chose this hotel for our family holiday. The hotel has surpassed our expectations,  the rooms are stylish and so comfortable, the entire hotel is  spotless and ouzes style with its classy decor. We opted for half board and we were blown away by the quality of the selection  at breakfast and dinner. We are a family of very different palettes so it was perfect. Outside of the buffet meals, on the pool bars the service can be hit or miss we quickly identified that the much better service was at the zona tranquila pool and bar.
As for kids Club there was plenty,  unfortunately with it being our 5 year old  daughters first holiday abroad she struggled to intergrate with other kids who were mainly of Spanish origin, she enjoyed the kids disco and was completely fascinated by the evening entertainment which we all enjoyed.
On the whole , we loved the hotel , we have had a wonderful holiday and we hope to return again next year.
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, we would like to express our sincerest gratitude that you have chosen our hotel and also for sharing your opinion.
We have no words to thank you for this great feedback you have sent us. We appreciate a lot your comments regarding the rooms, cleanliness and food. It is a pleasure to work for guests like you who appreciate our strong efforts for making guests’ stay better and we are happy to know that we have reached this with you. 
We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of  evening entertaiment and services. 

We cannot wait to welcome you back. Please contact us directly and we will try to assist you with everything.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely fantastic resort and stay can't fault anything to do with the hotel and staff are amazing.Our room was amazing all facilities amazing.We will definately be coming back
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for having chosen our hotel for your stay. At Radisson Blu, we know that the holidays are some of the most important times of the year and that is why it brightens our day to read opinions as positive as yours. We thank you for the positive comments regarding our team members and facilities. We do hope to welcome you back to the hotel soon.

reviews.review_text:
We are currently staying at this hotel(3 days in).
As a family we are extremely impressed with the staff, who are constantly attentive, helpful, friendly and in my opinion make this hotel a standout for any break. We love the breakfast and evening meal selection. Drinks prices we feel are fair in the current inflation crisis we face currently. Keep up the hard work.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Tom Langham,

Thank you for your recent stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan and the time that you have spent sharing your experience with us.
We appreciate very much your positive feedback regarding your stay in our Resort. It is always good to know that our guests are meeting their expectations with us.
Your positive comments, especially about our staff will encourage us to keep on in our continuing effort to improve our services.
The Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán team would be glad to welcome you again in your next holidays in Gran Canaria.
Best regards,
Fayna Rodriguez
Guest Relations

reviews.review_text:
Nice entrance. Helpful reception. You get greeted with a drink.
Cleaning ladies could clean the rooms better. Often hairs or sink weren't cleaned properly. Especially for a 5 star hotel. They forgot to replace the smaller towels and the ear buds.

Nice and clean pools. You can exchange towels at the pool every day.

Breakfast was nice, but could use more variation. We stayed 8 days.

There was a free underground parking, which was very helpful with keeping our car cool.

Our room was far from the pools and reception, but more quiet.

Small playground for kids. There was a nice pool for the kids. And 2 big ones for the adults. With a small bubblebath attached to it.

Fitness room was a bit small. In the mornings it gets crowded. The 15kg dumbbells were missing. They also only had 1 set of each. There was no seperate powerbar. Limited amount of machines.
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, we would like to thank you for choosing us for your stay and for taking the time to write this review.

On the other hand, we are sorry that you had some inconvenience with the cleanliness of the rooms. We have forwarded your comment to the responsible department to follow up.

We thank you also for the positive comments about our pools.
We are sorry we did not meet your expectations with breakfast, we would like to mention that we work with local suppliers to guarantee the freshness of all our food and to reduce the environmental impact.

We appreciate your comments about the fitness center and will pass them on to management for consideration and improvements.

We look forward to a second opportunity to make your next stay an unforgettable visit.

reviews.review_text: Loved this hotel facilities fantastic breakfast great rooms spacious and very clean . Only one gripe service at pool bar/restaurant very slow. Would definitely recommend especially families with adults
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for taking the time to give us such honest and detailed feedback.We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay with your family. We appreciate your kind words regarding breakfast. rooms and facilities; we will share your comments with the whole team as guests like you make us very proud to work at the hotel and give us motivation to keep going and improving.
We are sorry to hear that you have experienced any inconvenience with the service at our pool bars or restaurants. We thank you for your feedback and will pass it on to the responsible department to follow up and implement improvements. 
We would be delighted to welcome you back sometime soon.

reviews.review_text: 10 days here. Lovely rooms. Not sure about 5 star on all counts. Some cleaning issues and repairs to tiles, floors etc needed around the hotel. The entertainment provided was very mixed. The karaoki was dire, the dance team and the acrobats were very limited, and a singing duo just sang along to a tape. One couple shone. They sang rock songs from the 80s and 90s. I forget their name but they were on on the Wednesday evenings. Our balcony was unuseable most of the day as the music from the children's area below was so loud we couldn't sit there. Perhaps rooms in that are should be allocated to families rather that an older couple like ourselves. We loved the quiet pool area and spent most of our time there, enjoying the pool itself, the jacuzzi and the bar. Breakfast was excellent. The choice and quality of food could not have been bettered.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your stay and for taking the time to write this review.

We are sorry to hear that you had some problems with the cleanliness and the state of some parts of the hotel. We thank you for your comment and we will pass it on to the corresponding department to follow up and implement improvements.

Regarding the shows and karaoke we are sorry we did not meet your expectations and we have passed your comment to the responsible department to follow up. We take note of your comment about the volume of the music in the family area.

On the other hand, we appreciate your comment about our breakfast and our food.
At Radisson blu we work with local suppliers to ensure the freshness and quality of all our products.

We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our hotel and make your next stay an unforgettable one.

reviews.review_text:
Stayed here for 4 nights in Feb 2022. The hotel has every amenity you could possibly want. It was relatively quiet when I stayed but as the property is so large there was never any crowds. Breakfast is buffet style and has all options you could want. Had dinner in the hotel on two night, options and quality was okay but nothing special.
Stayed in a superior room overlooking one of the pool. It was well appointed and maintained. Pillows were too soft for my liking so had to use 2/3 to be comfortable. Huge balcony so i chose to sun-bathe in the mornings before moving to the pool or sun deck in the afternoon.
Every single staff member I encountered were extremely polite and attentive.
Property is located a very short stroll from the beautiful town of Mogan with a large number of restaurants and bars.
I would definitely return to this hotel!
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Lee, thank you for staying with us and for sharing your comments.  We are glad to read that you enjoyed the overall experience and we appreciate your comments on our facilities and service.
It will be a pleasure for all of us to welcome you again in the future. Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
The rooms are nice and the breakfast selection is decent but getting a table is like a military operation. Prepare to wait 20 minutes.
Raquel who works at the pool bar is possibly the world's grumpiest woman. She'll ignore you for 10 minutes before she begrudgingly serves you. I've deducted a star just because of her attitude. She'd be better put her on grass cutting duty or night security.

There's loads of sunloungers to go around but the pool man will still steal all your belongings if you leave anything on a bed before 10am.
Not enough staff for a place of this size so don't expect 5 star service.
There's also a massive smell of sewerage all around the place and therefore lots of flies. Some guests had fly swotters with them at the pool.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your stay and for taking the time to write this review. 
We are sorry to hear that you had some inconvenience with the service at breakfast. We are also sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with a member of our team. We will forward your feedback to the responsible department to follow up and implement improvements.

We would like to mention that our policy of not reserving sunbeds before ten o'clock is in place to ensure that all our guests have an equal opportunity to choose sunbeds and are not reserved.

We are sorry to hear that you had issues with flies due to the rains caused by cyclone Hermine. We would like to inform you that our staff have taken exceptional measures to combat the flies and try to make the stay of all our guests as comfortable as possible.

We hope to have a second chance to make your next stay a perfect one.

reviews.review_text: Fantastic  hotel with very friendly staff with beautiful  food
reviews.owner_answer: Thank ou for choosing us. We are glad to hear that you had such a positive experience at our hotel! We take great pride in our friendly staff and delicious food offerings. Thank you for your kind words, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future

reviews.review_text:
Great hotel for both adults and children, there is a kids pool with loads of activities, and also a adult pool where it’s much calmer and no kids allowed.

The rooms are nice and clean and all the staff is nice and friendly.
Huge breakfast buffet, a few places to have lunch at and some bars to get a refreshment.

It is a walk to the harbor but it’s just nice to stroll down to the city of Mogán!

I will definitely come here with my family again!
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Harald Vasarainen,
We appreciate your taking the time to share your feedback.
