It is good to know that you enjoyed your stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa  Gran Canaria Mogán and that your entire holiday was fantastic.
All the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán would be very happy to welcome you back.
Best regards,

reviews.review_text: It’s extremely well designed hotel all rooms have large balcony and outdoor area with artificial grass. The buffet breakfast and dinner are very good and the pool bar and Italian serve good food throughout the day. It’s extremely well kept and regular cleaning of rooms. All staff very friendly. This is our 5th visit over the last 8 years. Oh and great pool too.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for your fifth visit to our property, Stuart. We love to hear that you fully enjoyed the experience and we hope to welcome you again soon. Kind regards

reviews.review_text: Clean, modern, fantastic pools and spa. The rooms are spacious and the beds are super comfy and the pillows are like sleeping on clouds. Cant fault anything about this fabulous hotel.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for having chosen our hotel for your stay.
We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of rooms, cleanliness and spa. 

Our aim is to ensure that each and every guest has a memorable stay with us and it is wonderful that we did this for you.

We would be delighted to welcome you back sometime soon.

reviews.review_text: Very spacious hotel, relaxing. Has something for everyone. Generous size rooms, great pools. Has a luxury feel but is still ideal for couples and families alike.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for your recent stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan and the time that you have spent sharing your experience with us.  
We are delighted to learn that you had a fantastic holiday with us and enjoyed all our facilities and services as well as the rooms.At Radisson Blu, we know that the holidays are some of the most important times of the year and that is why it brightens our day to read opinions as positive as yours.
We would be delighted to welcome you back sometime soon.

reviews.review_text: This was a great resort to stay at in Gran Canaria! The staff was very helpful, the location is great and loved their lawns where you can sunbathe whole looking at the sea. To top it off, they gave us a free upgrade to a room with a jacuzzi in our balcony which was awesome. Couldn't ask more from my stay- we simply loved it!
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Vibhas Pahuja,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about our sister hotel Radisson Blu Gran Canaria. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your time at the hotel.

May I take this opportunity to thank you personally for the very high scores you have awarded them.
It would be a pleasure to welcome you again in your next holidays in Gran Canaria.

Kind regards,

Fayna Rodriguez
Guest Relations

reviews.review_text: This hotel was amazing. The rooms were very cool with beautiful views. The beds really comfy & the breakfast buffet something you will never forget. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for having chosen our hotel for your stay.
We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate your kind words regarding the rooms and breakfast; we will share your comments with the whole team as guests like you make us very proud to work at the hotel and give us motivation to keep going and improving.
We cannot wait to welcome you again at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.

reviews.review_text: Wonderful place, from reception to the room to the evening dinner table 👍
reviews.owner_answer: We're delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience at our hotel. Your positive feedback is greatly appreciated, and it's our goal to provide exceptional service at every step of your stay. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

reviews.review_text: Beautiful hotel. Staff so pleasant and friendly. Had a lovely relaxing week there. We spent most of our days at the pool on ground floor level across from  childrens pool. Lovely jacuzzi beside large swimming pool. Water temperature lukewarm so pleasant for swimming and we cud hear the music playing at childrens pool. There is also a quiet pool area on level 1 but we like to see the children enjoying themselves. Food was excellent and we also got 1 free night with 3 course meal at the Italian on site  restaurant during our stay, which we really enjoyed. We booked a superior room with pool view and was worth the additional cost. The only negative is the port is about 15 mins downhill but def worth seeing. Large supermarket 5 mins walk away. Entertainment was ok, a bit repetative with acrobatic shows. The Abba Nigbt was good.  Will def go back again
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Lorraine barklie,
Thank you for taking the time to give us such honest and detailed feedback.
We would especially like to thank you for the comments you made concerning our staff. We are sure that they will be very satisfied to hear that there are guests who appreciate their work.
We cannot wait to welcome you again at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.
Best regards,

reviews.review_text:
The most beautiful hotel, our second stay and it did not disappoint. Myself husband and childrens were greeting with friendly smiles as we walked through the door, the children got soft drinks and myself and husband a glass of cava. As we went up to our room there was a fresh fruit bowl and a bottle of cava on ice. The rooms are absolutely beautiful, the comfiest beds and the air con was a dream as it was so hot. We had interconnected rooms with the children and it was brilliant.

When we went for breakfast every morning when we got back up the bedrooms were cleaned. The breakfast was unbelievable. The waiters are so lovely seat you quickly and you can eat literally anything you want. They cater for everyone.

The pool is stunning, lovely area for the children also the night pool
For adults and bigger kids which isn’t too deep at all. It’s the most chilled vive in the hotel. Of you wanted to go for a later swim we did and it was great. Nighttime entertainment stopped around 11ish but that was ok because we’d wake every every morning.

I’d be very overprotective over my children especially when we’re are away but the hotel is so safe, there’s basketball (my kids fav) football volley ball, you name it they have it.

I loved my stay even more then the 1st time

Thank you Raddison Blu, we shall see you next year ❤️
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for the time you have dedicated to write a review about your recent experience at our Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan.

We are glad that you have enjoyed our beautiful paradise, but most important, the service provided by our staff who is the one responsible of creating memorable experiences in our valued guests.

We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay with your family. We appreciate your kind words regarding the facilities and services ; we will share your comments with the whole team as guests like you make us very proud to work at the hotel and give us motivation to keep going and improving.

We are very happy to know that this was your second visit to our hotel and that it was even better than the first. At Radisson Blu we strive to make your holiday a memorable one.

It will be our pleasure to welcome you back to the hotel and to once again offer you an exceptional holiday.

reviews.review_text: Excellent - customer service was great, we felt well looked after - the hotel had simple and fair COVID guidelines that all guests adhere to. Out room and breakfast was great too, and is a short walk to the town. Will definitely come again!
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for staying with us and for commenting on your experience, Mayun. We are thrilled to read that your experience lived up to your expectations and we all hope to welcome you again in the future. Sunny regards from Mogan.

reviews.review_text: Excellent staff and Hotel,very close to port and beach
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with our staff and enjoyed your stay at our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future, and thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay!

reviews.review_text: Lovely hotel. Great location in a valley 10 mins walk from the marina. Friendly happy staff, great buffet breakfast 2 good pools.
reviews.owner_answer:
We appreciate very much your feedback regarding your stay in our hotel. It is always good to know that our guests are meeting their expectations.
 with us. We also are very thankful for your high valued scores. We are looking forward to welcome you again in the near future. 

.

reviews.review_text:
Incredible hotel. I think the word perfect is very strong but this comes mighty close. The staff are amazing, the food is out of this world and the general vibe of the place is superb.

This is our second time visiting and it is our second faultless visit.

Reccomend hiring a car from the airport if staying here. Transfers from Jet2 / Tui can be a bit long winded down to Mogan. Also, parking is free and secure in an underground, key card accessed car park.
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, thank you for sharing us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.

We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay with your family. We appreciate your kind words regarding the food, atmosphere and staff; we will share your comments with the whole team as guests like you make us very proud to work at the hotel and give us motivation to keep going and improving.

We are glad to hear that this is the second time you have visited us and  hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text: Few years ago this hotel was very nice but now is just average!!! Room's not clean like they should be, lot's of dust on wall lights, human hair in bathroom from previous visitors. During breakfast waitress not bother to offer you coffee and they not even bother to remove all used plates from the table, so you might end up having lot's of empty plate before anyone going to notice. During dinner please check your bill if ordering any drinks because they tend to overcharge by putting on bill drink bigger than you drank so for example we had 25cl beer but on the receipt was 45cl beer. So very unprofessional!!! Selection of food for breakfast is very limited and luck of choices...the same every morning. Dinner is not bad but definitely not perfect for 5 star hotel!!! I personally not recommend this hotel for few reasons, overpriced, poor cleanliness, unprofessional waitress with very limited English, food choice average!!!
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, we would like to thank you for taking the time to write a comment about your recent stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan. Your opinion is very important to us as we always look for ways to improve our service.

We would like to apologize for any inconvenience during your stay and assure you that we have taken note of your comment and will pass them to the department in charge in order to improve in future.
We regret that our team was not informed during your stay as always try to help our guests and to find the perfect solution to solve it to the satisfaction of our customer.
Regarding the restaurant service  and cleaning service we regret for this particular staff and we thank you for your feedback because we can be aware of little things that makes the difference and improve them day by day.

We are really sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the experience in our hotel to the fullest as we always strive to make each stay with us an unforgettable one. We also regret that you had this uncomfortable experience and hope that you will give us a second chance to show you that we can make your holiday an exceptional one

reviews.review_text: Gorgeous room but needed a thorough clean during our two week stay. No cleaning equipment provided and really small bin (not great with a toddler. Service and food amazing, can't be faulted. Location nice but a good 15 min walk to the sea front. My rating 4.5⭐️
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Rachel Begg Kay,
I regret that you were not completely satisfied with the cleaning and the equipment.Your opinion is very important to us as we always look for ways to improve our service.
We are looking forward to welcome you again in the near future.
Best regards,

reviews.review_text:
Firstly, this is a very nice hotel with great food. Unfortunately that’s as good as it gets.
I’m currently here just now, and have booked 10 nights. We won’t be staying at the hotel during the day for rest of our holiday. We’ll go elsewhere to sunbathe.

If you have kids under 5 this is ideal. If they are between 6-12, forget it. There is nothing for them to do at the pool. There’s no jumping on the inflatable, no li-lows allowed and no masks with snorkels or similar allowed. There is no accommodation for older kids at all.
If they play football, then they can do that all day. If not, well, good luck.

The straw that broke the camels back was dinner tonight where we, as a family of 4, were shown to our seats, to be sat down only to find there were 2 place mats set, and left to get on with it. I then went to the next table for 4 and grabbed all the cutlery we required.

This is billed as a 5 star hotel, and yes, it almost does meet most of the criteria, however, if you have a family of older kids, they will be bored completely after 2 days, unless they happen to like football.

To say I’m disappointed would be an understatement.

Will I be back? Absolutely not!!

Kenny
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear B Shanga,
Thank you for your recent stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan and the time that you have spent sharing your experience with us.
We apologize for not being able to meet your expectations during your stay and we highly appreciate all your observations and remarks as they help us to reach the excellence we are looking for.
Finally, we would like to transmit our wish to welcome you again in order to change your first impressions with the aim of recovering your faith in our company and in our hotel.
Yours sincerely,
Fayna Rodriguez

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend for families, I went 3 years 2019, 2022 and 2023 and the experience was great every year. Good services and nice staff!
reviews.owner_answer: First of all, we would like to express our sincerest gratitude that you have chosen our hotel during all these years and also for sharing your opinion.We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of services and staff. We look forward to serving you again in the future.

reviews.review_text:
We stayed in Mogan Raddison blu in April 22 as a couple. Personally I would not call it a five star hotel I would call it a good four-star hotel. We had a lovely room overlooking the pool with an extended patio area
the beds were super comfortable I liked the soft squishy pillows but the husband wanted a firmer pillow and that was no problem because it was changed as soon as we asked..  cleaning by the maids was good I wouldn’t say perfect because often our bathroom wasn’t swept properly. The breakfast is buffet style with chefs cooking eggs omelettes et cetera and I would say it was a fantastic choice all of the waiting staff were super helpful and efficient.
There is an enormous pool for children and families which seemed very well used whilst we were there there was still quite a few children who were on Easter holidays. On the upper deck there is a quiet zone Pool
I cannot understand why it’s just not for adults ? to me it seems completely pointless having a quiet area when the children can still come up and down and start using the pool..  admittedly the lifeguard in attendance was very quick to tell people when they were making too much noise , but  families with kids have got a choice of two swimming pools whereas if you’re an adult on your own the likelihood of you sitting downstairs with the kids pool is unlikely.

We didn’t use the restaurants in the evening so can’t comment , we chose to walk into town each evening.
I would recommend this hotel but I think primarily it’s a family hotel .

The staff were all lovely 😊 and we enjoyed our stay .
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Fiona Hobbs,
Thank you for having stayed at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa  Gran Canaria Mogán.It is a pleasure to read that you have enjoyed most of our features and services.However, we deeply regret to know that we were not able to meet all your expectations. We take note of the observations you have made about your stay and will share them with the head of the departments involved, in order to improve where necessary.
We hope to have the pleasure to welcome you back in the not too distant future and those details you mentioned will not stop us to visit us again.
Warm regards,

reviews.review_text:
Sadly the rudest service I've ever experienced in a hotel. At check in we were told one of our two rooms bookings didn't exist (despite me showing them both confirmation numbers) and was bluntly told that they had no rooms and we couldn't stay there that night. They outright denied the problem was anything to do with Radisson, multiple times. We were told we couldn't stay.
The booking was via British Airways who then had a long argument with the reception staff on our behalf, and it transpired that Radisson had received but failed to note the second room booking.
The hotel begrudgingly gave a second room (suddenly one was available) and we were told we would need to move rooms during the week. When we turned up at reception the next morning, as requested, to find out what moves would be needed - they had no idea who we were or what the issue was. Super frustrating!
I've had plenty of experiences of bookings being incorrectly processed, but I've never been treated with such utter contempt as my family was here. No apology was given either. (British Airways on the other hand was faultless, and they couldn't have been more helpful!)
My advice is to avoid Radisson
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all thank you very much for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to write this review.We are really sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the experience in our hotel to the fullest as we always strive to make each stay with us an unforgettable one.

Please rest assured that your comments will be shared with the team so as to avoid receiving this kind of feedback in the future.

We definitely wish to count on a second opportunity to exceed your expectations in all aspects. While we understand that your stay was less than satisfactory, we hope that you would give us another chance to make your stay as best as it can be.

reviews.review_text:
Lovely rooms with sun beds on balcony, definitely go for mountain view like us. Very clean, soft beds and large bathroom (shower & bath). The pool in the quiet area is great for swimming, sunbathing and relaxing. The buffet breakfast and dinner both have lots of options and good quality food. The Fellini Italian restaurant on site was really good. Pretty good value hotel stay given all the facilities. Note some are extra cost however including the Spa.
Evening entertainment ok but nothing special.
15 min walk to the beach, lots of restaurants options nearby. Note I understand here in Puerto Morgan it is a bit more expensive than other places along the coast but still ok value to be found.
Sandy beach there is not that large and crowded. To the left there is a rocky area where much better to swim if you like clear water and seeing fish!
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your stay and for taking the time to write such a detailed review.
We also thank you for your comments about our food at breakfast and dinner. And our a la carte restaurant Filini. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed all our facilities and services.
We are glad to know that you enjoyed the area and the port of Mogan, this place has everything you need to have a good holidays.
Regarding the nightly entertainment we take note of your comment and we will forward it to the corresponding department to follow up.

Thank you very much again for this review and for the high rating and it will be a pleasure for us to welcome you again in the near future.

reviews.review_text: Really lovely hotel. Always kept very clean and highly professional staff with great service. Breakfast buffet was amazing and very good quality. Puerto de Morgán was lovely and the hotel was well located with a 20 min gentle stroll the beach and harbour. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for your comment about our hotel and for taking the time to write this review.
We are very happy to see that you enjoyed all our services and facilities. Thank you also for your comments about our breakfast, cleanliness and especially about our staff, who always strive to meet the needs of all our guests.

Finally, we thank you for recommending us and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our hotel in the near future.

reviews.review_text: We stayed here as a family of 4 (2 teenagers) in April 22 and loved it! The hotel was spotless, the staff excellent and great facilities for all ages. Loved the architecture with the hexagons, wide open spaces and light! In a quiet location, surrounded by mountains and a short pleasant walk to the beach and marina. Peurto Mogan is just beautiful - the nicest resort we have stayed at in all the Canaries! Sympathetically developed from the 1980s, still has a large local population and we found it attracted locals from elsewhere in the canaries at Easter, a good sign that it’s not just full of Brits and has local bars/eateries. We only ate at the Radisson buffet in the evenings 3 times - used half board for our lunch and went to the beachfront and marina at night. Food was great though, and very clean and efficient buffet. Would definitely return and recommend.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for your family stay with us and for sharing your positive comments with other travelers, S Hunt.
Your recommendation is much appreciated and we look forward to welcoming you again.
Kind regards

reviews.review_text: 2nd time staying here, definitely won't be the last. Everything is perfect, staff go above and beyond to make you feel welcome
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for having chosen our hotel for your stay again. Our aim is to ensure that each and every guest has a memorable stay with us and it is wonderful that we did this for you. We would especially like to thank you for the comments you made concerning our staff. We are sure that they will be very satisfied to hear that there are guests who appreciate their work. We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text: Beautiful location, really comfortable room and bed. Breakfast was very tasty & the buffet dinner had plenty of choice. We'll be back!!
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, thank you for sending us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.
At Radisson Blu, we know that the holidays are some of the most important times of the year and that is why it brightens our day to read opinions as positive as yours.
We are extremely pleased that you liked our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay with your family. We appreciate your kind words regarding the room, breakfast and dinner.
We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text:
The only hotel hotel I will always choose for Gran Canaria!

Me and my fiancé stayed here for 5 weeks (while undergoing a home renovation) and we had the best most enjoyable time!

First and most important ALL staff were Amazing and made us feel at home! They were very accommodating to our requests, since during that time we had to work from the hotel! We really felt cared for!

The food is great and diversified! We really enjoyed the quality food every night. (Usually we don’t prefer all inclusive deals when abroad since we like to try different things), but since they had a theme night every night and food was so so good so we are there every night!

The hotel itself has 2 very big pools and is very spacious, which I really enjoyed!
The rooms are one of the biggest you will find in Gran Canaria, and have amazing balconies with sun beds!
They have activities during the day, and also different performances during the evenings!

A great place If you are traveling with kids also!

It’s great to be home, but will miss this place! <3
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Aleksandra,

Thank you very much for your recent stay with us and your wonderfull review. We are very glad to know that you have a great time in our Hotel and the service was perfect for you also. We will pass your feedback to our staff and thanks them for his great service. We can not wait to welcome you again in your next visit to Gran Canaria. Once again thank you very much and have a lovely day!

reviews.review_text: I don't usually consider myself a fan of all inclusive resorts but the Radisson Blu has been a generally excellent experience. A few times I've found service to be slow but it has always been very friendly and helpful. Amenities for kids are good but it would be nice to have more foreign language TV channels when you need to keep the darlings distracted. Close enough you can take a leisurely stroll to the picturesque town centre and harbour.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogán for your holiday. We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you also for your comments about our staff, because they always work very hard to satisfy all our guests and to offer the best experience. We thank you for your suggestion to have more foreign TV channels and we will forward it to the relevant department for consideration.

We hope to see you again in our hotel in the near future.

reviews.review_text:
This was our first trip abroad since Covid, and our 3rd stay at the Radisson.
This remains a class hotel and its 5 star rating is entirely justified.
The staff are welcoming and work so hard. We've just experienced the storm Hermine and the team did everything they could to make sure that everyone's stay was not affected too much by the heavy rain. The hotel is spotlessly clean.
The food in the restaurant remains of a high standard, but I have a particular shout out for Omah.  Since our last stay here in 2019 my wife now requires gluten free food.  Whilst there are options, it was Omah's intervention that ensured she got a great meal each night that specifically met her needs. Thank you Omah.
We'll be back for sure.
Covid has had an impact on this small resort with some of the bars, shops not having reopened. It remains however a quiet and classy resort with  no loud music belting out anywhere.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for taking the time to write this positive review and for your loyalty over the years.

We are delighted to know that you have enjoyed all our facilities and services, but above all that you highlight the treatment offered by our staff. In Radisson blu we have the philosophy of Yes I can! and that is why all our employees do their best to meet the needs of all our customers.

Your comment will be passed on to our colleague Omah,
We would like to inform you that all our bars are currently open, however due to the storm and for security some pool bars were closed only during the storm.

Thank you again for your rating and your positive comments.
It will be a pleasure for us to welcome you again in our hotel.

reviews.review_text: Very nice and modern. Fun and big children pool, they have also salt water pool.  One thing is for sure. The food was great, drinks and cocktails were well prepared, great COVID safety awareness, nice and comfortable furniture on the pool area, bar and recreational area. The staff were very kind, and the location of the hotel is perfect. They also have a quiet pool for people without children that wish a more relaxed environment. To name other things that weren't that great, they were a little understaffed and the app to communicate with the reception was not effective. Better to use the good old phone to speak with reception. Needs some small maintenance on the rooms on small things like lamps that were rusty, mirror frame paint was falling apart and some small other things. For me one of the worst things were the cushions overlay on the room hammocks that were in need of replacement or a good cleaning but the rest was very pleasant and enjoyable. Had a very good time. Strongly recommend this hotel. Like Terminator's catch phrase "I'll be back".
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Steven, Thank you for taking the time to detail your experience. We are delighted to know you had an  enjoyable stay and that you especially appreciated the food of our buffet. We also took note of your comments about maintenance and the hammocks in order to improve those points. We are looking forward to welcome you back.

reviews.review_text:
Great resort with really friendly staff. The buffet at the restaurant for dinner and breakfast are absolutely great and change every day a little bit.
The layout is great for all kind of travelers. Walk to beach is at least 15 minutes… but once you are there clean water nice beach and tons of great restaurants and shops.

We traveled as a Familie with 3 kids and had a pool front 2 bedroom place. Was great since everything is right there.
The rooms are clean and everything is pretty up to date… walkways and kids pool and the sportsection need little renovation soon. If you depend on wifi then you will have trouble it’s spoty and not really fast.
Room service is ok, but not great. I excpect more for 5 Stars
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Yvan Rüedi,
Thank you for taking the time to give us such honest and detailed feedback.
The entire team works very hard to ensure that we deliver a high standard of service and a warm, memorable experience.
We look forward to serving you again in the future.
Best regards,

reviews.review_text: Fantastic pools, even though the hotel is big you do not feel on top of each other. They gave a separate kids pool and play area and a quiet pool area with jacuzzi just for adults. Food great, and a good choice was available. From the airport you can take a bus (about 6 euros) which takes about an hour.

Stayed here for a family holiday and it had the perfect balance of everything.

Esp like the no towels before 10am by the pool rule! Means everybody has a chance at getting a good sunbed.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for having chosen our hotel for your stay. We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of the hotel. We look forward to serving you again in the future.

reviews.review_text: Big and lots of kids, would really like to have adults only section at breakfast. Quiet area rooms/pool good. No kiosk/shops at premises but foodstore nearby
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for both effort and time taken to complete this survey and for the score you have given us. We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of the quiet area and pools. We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text:
Comments not criticism.
If your only language  is English apart  from rolling news nothing on tv.
If you are have a gregg addiction the bacon
was awful as the sausage.
We were advised  not to drink the water.
4  small bottles only foc  then  if bought from hotel 2.50 each.
Arriving at the resort at 23.00 after 4 hour flight 2 hour transfer  we had one plate of food left in the room enough to feed a sparrow.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review and for choosing our hotel.

First of all, we regret that we did not meet your expectations regarding our food. We would like to mention that in our hotel we work with local suppliers to guarantee the freshness of our food and to reduce our ecological footprint.

We also have theme nights at our dinners so that guests can experience the flavours of different types of food from around the world.

On the island it is not advisable to drink tap water, therefore it is possible to buy it at the hotel or in the surrounding supermarkets. As a courtesy we always offer bottles of water on the first night.
Regarding the dinner for late arrivals we leave a prepared dinner for our guests, we are sorry that it was not to your liking.

Finally on the TV we have channels in different languages and there is also the possibility to connect it to your mobile phone to watch any channel in streaming.

We are sorry for not having met your expectations and we hope to have a second opportunity to make your next stay a unique one.

reviews.review_text: We stayed here from the 17th - 31st July. This is a lovely place to stay is the first things I would say. The buildings are quite new and it is enclosed and secure. The Covid-19 enforcement is really good too. They strongly encourage you to wear a mask all the time except when you are eating, drinking or on a sun lounger. The Pools are immaculate and even the family pool isn't too noisy. We took full board tickets for 7 nights and the rest of the time we went out into town which is just 10 minutes walk. The breakfasts are very good and the dinners are fine. If you have visited Turkish hotel buffets for similar hotels then you will not have the same standard but frankly you won't be disappointed. The staff are very professional and friendly. I have two minor criticisms, the first is that the drinks and lunch menu in the pool bar are over priced. The same is true for drinks in the evening with dinner. Do go for a walk in the surrounding hills and enjoy the Port in the evening. would we come and stay there again? Yes, of course we would.
Great location and great staff. Not 5 star but definitely 4
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our great location and found our staff to be exceptional. We strive to provide a high level of service and create a positive experience for our guests. While we appreciate your kind words, we also understand your perspective regarding the star rating. We continuously work towards improving our services and facilities to meet and exceed our guests' expectations. We hope to welcome you back in the future for another enjoyable stay!

reviews.review_text:
Lovely family friendly hotel. Maximilian on  reception was amazing. Full of information about things to do on the island, where to eat etc....
The hotel was about a 10 min walk to the beach, which had loads of shops and restaurants lining the pier.
The buffet breakfast and dinner were great especially for fussy eaters as there were loads of options.

Great room but as a platinum member, was expecting a bit more of service level. No welcome gift, no gift in the room and no thanking for being a platinum member. Excellent hotel but it would be nice that they take a bit more care for the top level members
reviews.owner_answer: First of all, we regret the inconvenience caused.We would like to apologize for any inconvenience during your stay and assure you that we have taken note of your comment about the service of the platinum members and we will pass them to the department in charge in order to improve in future. Thank you for your feedback and understanding.

reviews.review_text:
2022 update after 4 years and 4 visits: brilliant hotel. I repeat all the previous positive remarks. It is great that they offer half the resort for families and half for people who want a quieter experience. The staff are always friendly and welcoming. Still a pristine resort with something for everyone.

Beautiful hotel in a quieter part of Gran Canaria. Although providing a resort feel is just a pleasant 15 minute pedestrian only walk into town. We found everyone helpful and charming from pick up at the airport to departure. Pristine room and facilities.
Recommended.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for sharing such a positive review on Google, Bob. We love to know your enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your next visit! Kind regards

reviews.review_text: Lovely airy rooms with a balcony, food to a good standard and staff friendly. The spa met my needs and especially Maria whose hands I can only say were magic. Totally enjoyed my stay at the radisson blu mogan
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogán for your stay.

We are proud to see that you enjoyed a unique stay at our resort. We thank you for your special mention of our rooms, food and especially our staff.
Thank you also for your comments about the spa and our colleague Maria, we will forward your comments to her.

Thank you very much again and it will be a pleasure for us to welcome you again in our hotel.

reviews.review_text:
Lovely hotel with nice family and children's foods. Rooms were spacious, clean and cool.
Food was also excellent, and allergies handled very well. Staff friendly and helpful.
Short walk to the beautiful town of peurto de Mogán and its beach as well.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for having stayed in our hotel and for your kind words about the staff and the hotel. Positive feedbacks like yours are a big motivation for all our staff and makes us want to improve and offer an even better experience when you return. Guests like you make us work harder every day to deliver an exceptional service. We feel having reached this with you, and this is the best award for all of us.

reviews.review_text: Hotel is fantastic, staff / food / bars & pools are absolutely top class. This hotel is a gem! Rooms are spotless & staff are a great to deal with & very pleasant.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for your recent stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan and the time that you have spent sharing your experience with us.  We are glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.
Furthermore, we pretty much appreciate that you liked the facilities of the hotel as well as the food.

Thank you for the positive comments towards our staff, who are responsible for creating memorable moments.
It would be a pleasure to welcome you again in your next holidays in Gran Canaria.

reviews.review_text:
This is a beautiful resort and you can see that every thing has been thought through, down to the last detail. Even the balconies have plenty of room and I love the massive sliding doors that really open the rooms up. The only thing I'm not completely sold on was the glass bathroom walls with no lock (I have a toddler who was partial to popping his head through the door to say hello mid-shower!), but that's a personal preference!

The staff were very attentive and couldn't do enough for you. The food was also lovely with plenty of choice and it was different every night in the buffet restaurant.

My kids loved the pools, and the quiet pool was very peaceful. Unfortunately I ran out of time to sample the spa!

The hotel is situated a short walk from the beach, but it is very pleasant and seems much shorter than it actually is. There is a small supermarket that you can see from the hotel, so very handy for everything from nappies and wipes to extra suncream and drinks for the walk to the beach.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for staying with us and for sharing your experience on Google, Linzi. We are happy to know that you and you family fully enjoyed the stay with us. Great to read that your kids loved the pools!
It will be a pleasure to welcome you with us again in the future!

reviews.review_text:
Nice clean large hotel.
Superior rooms are great. Good tv with Android and IOS sharing from mobile.
WiFi Good
English channel are just news.
Shower Good and beds are big and really  comfy.
Pools and good and clean with jacuzzi in both normal and quite pools.

Only went BB, thank God.
Food at breakfast is buffet and is constantly luke warm to cold. Absoultley apualing for a 4*
.....Radisson,  just turn heaters up and warm the plates.......its not that hard!

Arrived at 7pm, so chose to have the evening  buffet. At 24 Euros  each. In my opinion,  not worth it. Good selection but nothing special. Better going to a restaurant  for that money.

Drinks are obviously going to be more expensive but not majorly compared with the high end restaurants.

Surprised you have to pay to enter the Spa. Obviously if you wanted the massage etc , then yeah you expect an extra charge.

Tennis courts are also chargeable!

I did get a birthday cake and bottle of red on my Birthday,  which I thought was a very nice touch. However I do think the customer service regarding the issue with food, was useless and still there's no explanation or improvement after lots of complaints regarding this issue which have been raised by other people.....check Trip Advisor.

Wouldn't call this hotel 4* but overall its nice but probably not value for money  tbh. We paid £1600 for 2 people 7 nights Flying from Manchester  In Jan 2022

To add, just found out its a 5* .......lol
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Stephen, Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your impressions. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed the overall experience and in particular the birthday surprise organized by our team. Both your positive and constructive comments are highly appreciated. The secondly mentioned will help us improve the daily operations. We take an opportunity to inform you that our modern resort hotel was opened five years ago and we are truly proud to have achieved a high rate of customer satisfaction. It would be an honor for all of us to welcome you again in the future. Kind regards

reviews.review_text: Nice hotel, few things need improvement, not 5 star.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for choosing us. We are sorry we did not meet your expectations and look forward to a second opportunity to make your next stay a memorable one.

reviews.review_text: The best of this hotel are the super helpful and attentive staff. For a five stars hotel needs better maintenance and food is not up to standards. Breakfast should be better managed or even split between other restaurants as can be very busy. Quality of food served could be of a better quality.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your impressions following your experience, W T. We are thrilled to read that our attentive staff contributed to a memorable holiday. We are sorry to hear that the maintenance and food didn´t exceed your expectations. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you and exceed your expectations at all times. Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
This is the 4th time we have stayed at the Radisson Blu in Puerto de Mogan and there are very good reasons why.

The service is excellent, the staff all so friendly and the rooms very comfortable. Breakfast is included and is plentiful (half and full board options also available), whilst quality of food is very good.

We were there for my partner's birthday and, without any prompting from me, a member of staff arrived at the room with a card, a birthday cake and a bottle of Cava! Very gratefully received and enjoyed. 😀

The Puerto de Mogan resort is a lovely place to spend time (very pleasant bars/restaurants and some nice shops), whilst the port itself is very picturesque despite its diminutive size.

All in all, would wholly recommend this hotel and resort ... we will certainly be back!
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Colin Pidgeon,

Thank you for your recent stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan and the time that you have spent sharing your experience with us.

We appreciate very much your feedback regarding your stay in our hotel. It is always good to know that our guests are meeting their expectations with us.

It would be a pleasure to welcome you again in your next holidays in Gran Canaria.
Best regards,

reviews.review_text:
Very peaceful resort.
Staff pleasant
Rooms decent size
Beds divine with regular sheet changes
Food of an average quality, slightly repetitive and could be more imaginative
Entertainment good but could do with an improved calendar
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review and for choosing us for your stay.
We thank you for your positive comments about our facilities and staff.

On the other hand we thank you for your comments about the food and entertainment. We will pass both comments on to the departments in charge to follow up and implement improvements.

We hope to have the opportunity to host you again in our hotel and make your next stay a unique one.

reviews.review_text:
Super friendly staff. Two amazing pools one is a quiet zone which is great. Close to the mall and beach.
Beds are very soft.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for both effort and time taken to complete this survey. 
We have no words to thank you for this great feedback you have sent us. We appreciate a lot your comments regarding the pools, rooms, location and staff. It is a pleasure to work for guests like you who appreciate our strong efforts for making guests’ stay better and we are happy to know that we have reached this with you. 

At Radisson Blu, we know that the holidays are some of the most important times of the year and that is why it brightens our day to read opinions as positive as yours.

We would be delighted to welcome you back sometime soon.

reviews.review_text:
An excelent choice well situated and quiet location. Not so close to the beach but you need anyway a car or bus to reach other beaches. The hotel is very clean
Breakfast is amazing and you have a huge variety suitable for anyone. Fresh fruits and different coffee.
Kids club is also nice with plenty of activities
Night entertainment is also nice artists coming by and playing different music styles.
Rooms are big and fit couples to families depending how big the group is.
Even though we were during pandemic time we felt comfortable and safe. Nothing to worry. Staff was very nice and friendly.
Really recommend this place
Thank you Radisson!
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Alex, Thank you very much for your nice review. We are delighted to read that your stay with us fulfill all your expectations and that you felt comfortable and safe. We hope to welcome you back soon.

reviews.review_text: Stayed for one week. Very helpful staff, clean and tidy, clean and big swimming pools. Drinks and food at poolside bars not cheap, but especially drinks are good quality. Buffet breakfast quite good. The evening buffet lacks quality, though high quality is probably impossible throughout the huge number of available dishes.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for assessing your week stay at our resort hotel, Thomas. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the overall experience and we hope to welcome you with us again. Kind regards

reviews.review_text: Great stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan in July 2022. The staff was really nice and helpful. The service was great: room as described and in a nice location, we booked a car for a day with them - easy and worry-free, the area is clean and tidy. Also, we asked for a late check-out (our flight back was at 9 pm) and we got it without a problem until 6 pm. Will be back again!
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your recent stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan and the time that you have spent sharing your experience with us.  We are glad that you have enjoyed our beautiful paradise, but most important, the service provided by our staff who is the one responsible of creating memorable experiences in our valued guests. We are glad to hear that you were able to check out late, we always try to satisfy our guests' needs as much as possible. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our resort in the not too distant future.

reviews.review_text: I've been to the hotel twice now and both times have been extremely good experiences. The staff are so, so helpful and accommodating and greet you with a smile on every encounter. Truly looking forward to my next visit at the Radisson Blu, Mogan.
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, we would like to express our sincerest gratitude that you have chosen our hotel and also for sharing your opinion.
We are thrilled with reviews like yours. It encourages us work harder and harder and it is the best recompense to our work.
We would especially like to thank you for the comments you made concerning our staff. We are sure that they will be very satisfied to hear that there are guests who appreciate their work.

We cannot wait to welcome you again at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.

reviews.review_text: Fantastic food, huge rooms as standard with fridge and kettle sofa etc and loungers on balconies as well as table and chairs. It's like an apartment. Food is top quality and so much choice at breakfast. Furnishings around hotel are beatifulky designed so many wonderful chairs you just want to sit down and chill fir a while. Two large pools on different levels so the quiet area really is quiet. Hotel so well designed it's big and spacious yet quiet and private. Would definitely stay again. Last staff are trained well, polite efficient and friendly. Excellent.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for your kind comments on your recent experience lived at the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan , Catherine. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our stylish facilities, well designed open spaces, fantastic food, two different pool areas,  and our friendly and polite staff.
We look forward to welcoming you again!

reviews.review_text: Beautiful hotel, spotlessly clean, very friendly and helpful staff. This was our second stay at this lovely hotel and we were not disappointed. Wonderful adult pool and jacuzzi, reception staff always very helpful and courteous and Pedro, one of the porters, was particularly helpful and friendly. The only very minor things that could have been better but were probably only personal to our preferences were the TV in our room had very limited English channels (all news channels) and we were unable to set up the Apple TV pairing.  Also we would have preferred an empty minibar/fridge to keep our own drinks cold. Otherwise we had a wonderful stay and will definitely be returning.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for sharing your second holiday experience with us on Google, Irene. We appreciate all your kind comments on our modern and comfortable facilities, multiple services and helpful staff. Thank you for praising Pedro, he will certainly be happy to read your kind words. Please do not hesitate to contact us during your next stay for assistance with Apple TV. Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
Nice modern hotel.
Very very friendly staff.

Due to #COVID measures the hotel was not completely full.

We received a room in the quiet area and that was amazingly quiet. Good night sleep.

The superior room has a large balcony including 2 seats a table and 2 sunbeds.

You don't even have to leave the room :) . As the hotel is situated between mountains we had limited wind on the balcony so can be quite hot :) more wind can be found near the open pool area.

The hotel has around 100mbit of wifi access (up/down) everywhere to have you "connected" for free. More then enough even to enjoy Netflix.

The room is large and has:
- a safety box
- a large bed
- modern LED tv (with HDMI connections) the remote is your phone.
- a couch (can be converted to bed
- small desk an seat

Housekeeping is friendly and refills everything you need daily.

- Free coffee and tea
- a water heater is in the room.
- iron is in the room
- The air-conditioning is temperature controlled.
- Bathroom has shower and separate rainshower plus large bath.
- 2 washing tables
- Enormous amount of closets to store your luggage.

The 24x7 gym is nice however due to #COVID a facemask is required in all enclosed areas.

Breakfast and dinner has plenty of choice (meat / no meat)

A supermarket is nearby to buy your own groceries. Also an ATM is available on-site.

The hotel offers courtesy room or extended check out on your last day in the hotel.

We had a really enjoyable stay!
Unfortunately did not check out the spa.
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Sandor, we would like to thank you for staying with us and for taking your time to evaluate your experience. We are thrilled that we were able to deliver  memorable service and experience and we hope to have you with us again in the future. Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
Really lovely place and atmosphere! Rooms were nice an clean. A lot of space in the room and if you don't want to go to pool, you could also take sun on the sun beds at your balcony. Bed is really soft and maybe little too soft for my taste but some people love it.
Breakfast buffet had good selection maybe more catered towards British taste.
There's two pools and other one is adults only. That's a big plus! Good size pools both of them.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for your kind comments on Google, Kukka. We love to know you enjoyed your stay with us, especially the lovely resort and the relaxed atmosphere. We look forward to your next stay with us! Kind regards

reviews.review_text: We spent last week in your hotel and we 'll like the atmosphere and facilities there. For me, I'm really impressed by the pillow you provide in the room. My I know whether I could buy one from any online shop in NL? Thanks.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Luyi Gong,
Thank you very much for the high score for our Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan.
We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your time at the hotel.Concerning your question about our pillows, you can send your request to info.mogan@radissonblu.com
We look forward to your to your next visit!
Warm regards,

reviews.review_text:
We stayed here for 9 nights from the 29th October 2021 and opted for breakfast only.

We arrived before check-in (which is at 3pm) but the reception staff managed to get our room ready for 2pm which was very helpful. There is a secure luggage room that we left our bags in whilst we went to sit at the pool bar.

The room was very clean and spacious. The bed was super soft which I like, but might not be to everyone's taste. Mini fridge and safe included in the room.

Plenty of food to choose from at breakfast. I particularly enjoyed the egg station and the Pastry station. Fresh omelette every morning - yummy!

We spent our days at the 'quiet pool' which is at the other end of the hotel to the kids pool which was perfect for us. The sunbeds are quiet close together but there was room to move them slightly further away from other people if needed. It great that you can't reserve sunbeds before 10am so there isn't that mad early morning rush. The lifeguard does remove items left on sunbeds before 10am.

We visited the gym several times during our stay. Due to covid, only 4 people can be in the gym at any one time so you have to go to reception to book your hour slot. The popular times, ie early morning and before dinner get busy, so you do have to plan your trips. You can't just turn up like you would pre-covid.

We didn't use the salt water pool, the kids pool or see any of the evening entertainment shows so can't comment on those.

Overall we enjoyed our stay l but I've removed 1 star as we encountered some little annoyances. For example, toiletries in our room weren't placed - we had to find a cleaner one morning as we were running very low on toilet paper. There's no drinking water taps around the hotel so we popped to the local supermarket to buy bottled water. We could buy water at the bar, but its far cheaper to buy at the supermarket (2-3 min walk). We also bought some alcohol at the shop to enjoy in the room pre dinner but annoyingly the cleaner didn't replace the dirty wine glasses the next morning.

I appreciate my negatives aren't that major, but I do think its important to mention here.
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Ali, we would like to thank you for your stay by us and for sharing your impressions. We are glad to read that your experience at our modern property in Mogan was pleasant. Rest assured your constructive comments will be forwarded to the relevant team members for analysis and follow up. We hope to welcome you with us again in the future. Kind regards

reviews.review_text: I was there recently with my family and I can't thank the staff enough for how accomodating they were with me (vegan here), everyone was great, but I have to mention specifically Judith from the kitchen and Omar from the restaurant. They were both above and beyond, a reason on their own to come back. The place was great to go with kids and relax.
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Guiomar, we would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing such a lovely feedback. We are thrilled to read that you and your family fully enjoyed your holiday with us. Your special mentions to our team members who made your holiday special are much appreciated and we look forward to your next visit. Kind regards

reviews.review_text: Very good hotel. Poolside loungers and furniture in general was uncomfortable. Case of aesthetics taking precedent over practicality.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for choosing us for your holidays. We thank you for the high rating you have given us and we are sorry to hear that you had some issues with our furniture and sunbeds. We thank you for your comment and we will pass it on to the responsible department to follow up and implement improvements.

We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.

reviews.review_text: Amazing hotel, we’ll exceeded our expectations. Kids loved it. Great service, rooms were excellent, good pools, highly recommended.
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, thank you for sharing us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.
We have no words to thank you for this great feedback you have sent us. We appreciate a lot your comments regarding the services and facilities. It is a pleasure to work for guests like you who appreciate our strong efforts for making guests’ stay better and we are happy to know that we have reached this with you.

We look forward to serving you again in the future.

reviews.review_text:
We have visited this hotel with my boyfriend for our anniversary in February. We have loved it. Rooms are spacious and clean with big bathroom and private balcony.
Staff is polite and attentive, but not intrusive. Room service always available.
We were looking forward for breakfast every morning. Plenty of options available. Waiting staff was very attentive greeting us with smile every morning. We preferred to sit outside as it was too noisy inside - full of families with children.
Although it's family friendly resort they have one swimming pool just for adults far from kids pool, so you haven't even noticed there are children around.
Nice cocktails available for reasonable price.
We will be definitely back.

What a great hotel this is. Stayed here in July  on a B&B basis. The room was fantastic. I missed having a kitchen but the breakfast buffet spread had all you could want regardless of your nationality. The staff were fantastic from the front of house down to cleaners all always had a smile and greeting for you. The grounds are well kept and clean as are all the areas. Never seen a pool without towels on sunbeds before, even at 10:00. It has  2 pool areas of which 1 is classed as a quiet area the other for children with its own fun pool. The last time we were in Puerto Mogan 3 years ago the hotel was being built. I was a little apprehensive about coming back in case the hotel had a adverse effect on the area, this proved to be unfounded as the local area seems to have been enhanced by the arrival on this great hotel. Well done to all concerned.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for sharing such a positive review on Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan on Google, Keith. We love to know your stay with us was memorable and that you fully enjoyed our modern facilities and multiple services. We look forward to your return! Warm regards

reviews.review_text: Only a couple of years old so nice and modern, spacious and a bit minimalist if that takes your fancy. Rooms have ample storage and spacious balconies,  ours with a table,  two chairs and two sun loungers. Our room was spotless, the beds comfortable and with excellent web connection even though we were towards the end of the hotel ans we had no problem with noise from our neighbour's. Breakfast has an amazing selection that is constantly topped up with fresh food and a nice touch was bottles of Cava so each morning started off with a bucks fizz..... well, you are on holiday!!!! We love the restaurants in town so didn't eat dinner and only twice enjoyed lunch by the pool but that too was very good. Staff are fantastic, friendly, bilingual and helpful and nothing seemed any trouble. It is a stretch of a walk from the town to the hotel but it's a walk we enjoy although some might want to be nearer or consider taxis.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Steve, thank you very much for sharing your comments on your recent stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan. We are thrilled to know that our modern facilities with minimalistic design, large rooms with spacious and fully equipped balconies, comfortable beds, high speed and quality WiFi, plentiful breakfast buffet and friendly and helpful staff fulfilled your expectations and contributed to a memorable holiday exprience.
We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you with us in the near future! Sunny regards from Mogan.

reviews.review_text: Beautiful hotel, happy and very accommodating staff.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your comment. We are very happy to know that you had such a good time with us and we are especially glad about your positive valuation of our team members. We hope that you will continue to give us the pleasure of hosting you.

reviews.review_text: Modern and clean hotel, excellent friendly staff. Rooms were fantastic and the beds are amazingly comfy. Clean and quiet resort, breakfast was delicious
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Justin Grainger,
Thank you very much for choosing Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogán Hotel to spend your holiday in Gran Canaria and of course for taking the time to write a review of our services and facilities.
We look forward to welcoming you again at our hotel soon.
Sunny regards,

reviews.review_text: This hotel is mainly for families with smaller children. The kids enjoying this place very much. They have a fun pool and 2 other pools. Lots of sport facilities and much daily activity. Not at the sea but never mind it is just a few minutes away but kids enjoying in the hotel more. Breakfast is great the dinner is not as good but the kids lunch is very cheap.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your kind comments on our modern family friendly resort hotel, Tibor. We are happy that you and your family fully enjoyed the time spent at the hotel and we look forward to your next stay with us!

reviews.review_text: Cannot fault this hotel in anyway. We were welcomed with Champagne, the check-in was very warm. The room was spotless with a walk in shower and bath. The food was 1st class as were the bars. The hotel has two pools a spar and and a therapy salon along with a fully equipped gym. The hotel is a ten minute walk from Porto Megan witch is a small resort with many bars and restaurants that are reasonably priced. We didn't have one bad meal in the two weeks we were there. 10/10
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for choosing Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan and for taking the time to share your kind comments. We are happy to learn that everything was to your liking and that we were able to deliver memorable holiday experience. It will be a pleasure to welcome you again.

reviews.review_text: Had a lovely stay. The staff were friendly and helpful, the room was spotless and the bed was soft and comfortable. The buffet dinner and breakfast were nice. Not a huge selection, but the quality was good. Close to the shopping centre and the beach. The evening varied in quality, but was mostly good(except one night with some rather average singers). Overall a great stay and would be happy to return.

We had a great holiday at the Radisson during our stay in late October. Hotel is in a lovely location (40 minute drive from the airport) with lots of shops, restaurants and a nice beach near by. The rooms are very modern and spacious. We upgraded to a half board when we got there. Our kids love buffet restaurants so, even though the quality wasn't fantastic, there was always a good choice and we didn't have many complaints. Eating and drinking in the hotel is  a bit expensive but there is a store near by and you get fresh bottled water in your room. There are plenty of alternative places to eat, all within a 15 minute walk.
There is a good range of activities available in the hotel. We also liked the fact there was never any mad rush or getting up at stupid times in the morning to get a lounger by the pool.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Dav, thank you very much for staying with us and for sharing your experience on Google. We are delighted to read about your great holiday in our modernly designed resort hotel in the charming Mogan.
We would be pleased to receive your next visit soon. Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
We just came back from our holiday there and we already miss it.
One week was so relaxing there. Even with a one year kid. Or especially (for her) :)
Big, very clean rooms with a balcony each, comfy beds, some entertainment in the evening (but not too long or loud), good food, mini disco and kids club for the little ones, daily yoga classes and a quiet zone on the other pool made it perfect for everybody's needs. But the biggest benefit of this place is the friendly and attentive staff - in all areas!
The only thing to improve would be more vegan/vegetarian/healthy snacks in the buffet area.

It's a ten minutes walk to the beach and restaurants. A supermarket is three minutes away.

We come back for sure!
reviews.owner_answer: We appreciate your feedback, Julia. It is great to hear that you all enjoyed your family holiday with us and relaxed in our modern and comfortable facilities. Great to learn that our friendly and attentive staff delivered memorable moments! We will forward your comments on the vegan/vegetarian/healthy snacks to the Kitchen team to follow up. We all look forward to welcoming you again!

reviews.review_text:
This is our 3rd time at this fabulous resort, staff are very helpful and nothing is too much trouble. Accommodation is perfect, quiet pool, half board is ideal for us and is located a short walk from the beach and port. No doubt will book again as great value for money .
PS forgot to mention the towels, all towels are removed before 10.00am so no issues with sun beds, absolutely superb don’t know why this policy isn’t adopted at all hotels 😊👍
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your fantastic review on your third stay at our modern resort hotel, Chris. We are glad to hear that you once again feel like home with us and we appreciate in particular your comments on the towel policy by the pools. We wish you a great start of the week!

reviews.review_text:
Very nice hotel.
Seperate children's and adults (quiet zone) pools are good idea but in reality it doesn't work, too many kids being noisy and messing about in the quiet zone for my liking... My kids are grown up, I've been through that annoying stage and certainly don't want to listen to other people's off spring, in an area where they shouldn't really be in the first place. Staff made no effort to 'control' or even advise them.
Life gaurd is NOT present all day. Every 5 mins he dissappears off, with no replacement in place.
My only other observations would be on our room. We were expecting a double bed and got 2 singles pushed together, this doesn't work, is quiet disappointing and actually a bit of an atmosphere killer! The other observation is only 1x bin in a huge room (niggly I know).
Staff are very helpful and pleasent.
We are B&B board and the breakfast turn out is superb; everything you could imagine x10.
As expected bar prices are much higher than the surrounding bars and restraunts.
Half a lager and lime and a double Grey Goose and coke was over 20euros.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you  for assessing your recent stay with us, James. We are glad to hear that your enjoyed your holiday and we appreciate your constructive comments that will be followed up. We hope to welcome you again in the future and make your experience memorable in every moment. Sunny regards

reviews.review_text:
Fantastic food, amazing staff.
The hotel is excellent, facilities are excellent too.

Pool areas are very clean and not crowded, even in half term. Only thing I'd say to improve is to move the patio heaters to outdoor bar seating in the evening as it gets very cool.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for the high rating and kind comments on your recent stay with us, Lynne. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the overall experience, the food, hotel's facilities, pool areas and the service delivered by our team. We all look forward to welcoming your again.

reviews.review_text: Had such a lovely holiday! Hotel very clean, family friendly hotel but tastefully done so everyone can enjoy. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Food was good great quality, to eat at the restaurant felt a little expensive compared to local restaurants out of the hotel. Nice location located in an up and coming area, the port was a 10 minute walk away with  beautiful views, restaurants and shops. Would recommend highly.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for staying with us and for posting your comments on Google, Kelly. It is great to read that our modern family friendly resort hotel, helpful and attentive staff, great quality food and nice location contributed positively to a memorable holiday experience. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to your next visit!

reviews.review_text: Very good bit quite five star in our terms but still exquisite and all we needed. The breakfast buffet is amazing with champagne and caviar on the menu. We loved the quieter pool and the facilities ie gym and sport options were great. The room service which we tried for a treat was terrible and very expensive. The hotel is in a small quieter port but a bus journey away from lots of other towns. Great holiday so far 3 more days to go!!!

We stayed here for a week to relax and explore the island. The hotel is very new and all facilities (sport facilities, pool) are well maintained and clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet is great in quality and choice. The rooms are modern and come with a very spacious balcony. Beach and town is in 10min walking distance, although the town beach is not the greatest. Overall a great place to relax, do sports and to use it as a hub for excursions.
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Alexander, thank you for your highly positive feedback on Google. Great to read you spent a great and relaxing holidays with us and we hope to have a chance to welcome you again in the future. Warm regards

reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed our stay here. Rooms were nice and modern as the resort is only about 3 years old. Buffet food was good (better than the Baobab where we stayed the year before). Quite a compact resort and not as visually impressive as the Baobab but great for families, and staff were very friendly (as always in Gran Canaria).
reviews.owner_answer: Thanks for the high score you rated us on Google, Doug. We look forward to your next visit!

reviews.review_text: One of the best hotels I have visited. Climatized pools, delicious food and amazing service. We were lucky to enjoy the  Mexican and BBQ themed dinner and it was absolutely delicious. The hotel was really full but there were still plenty of sunbeds for everyone. My daughter loved the mini disco.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words on your experience lived at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan, Ave. We are thrilled to read you consider us one of the best hotels you have visited. Also great to hear that your daughter loved the mini disco! We look forward to your next stay!

reviews.review_text:
Frankly, I expected more from a 5-star hotel. Ok, the pools, the staff, the rooms and facilities are excellent overall. What didn't I like? 1. Extremely soft mattress gave me a sore back and low quality sleep. 2. Showers were fab but a door or curtain was lacking. 3. Breakfast was a shambles, terribly organised. The cereals and flakes even came in plastic packets! What on earth for, apart from generating more food and plastic waste? 4. The design was too harsh for me, all the angles and straight lines make it rather cold, and make it stand out from the environment.

I could go on, but I won't. Would I go back? Maybe, but it certainly won't be my first choice.

This is a lovely hotel with friendly, helpful and knowledgeable staff.

The rooms are really spacious and the sunbeds on the balcony are really comfortable.  I loved the monsoon shower and although the bath looked great we really didn't bother about it.   Now we come to the bed. Oh my days!  I've never really been in to soft mattresses but these you just sank into them and they just cradled you. I slept longer and deeper here than I have done in years.   They are massive too.

The pools are great and have a ramped access into them too.

Mogan is still a beautiful town with some brilliant shops. This is one of the world's best places to go see wild dolphins. We were out for just over a couple of hours and saw a couple of different types of them and had a great day.
reviews.owner_answer: Thanks for the high score you rated us on Google, Kevin. We look forward to your next visit!

reviews.review_text: A really awesome place to stay. The beach is close to the hotel. The public transportation is also close by. The staff were really friendly and welcoming. Greatly enjoyed the dinner buffet. They also have a giant pool and a kids pool to relax. I enjoyed my stay here. I'd definitely recommend this place. Also I would love to stay here again.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Reshma
Thank you very much for your review.

We are really happy to see that you found our team to be professional and nice and our location to be great for you too.

We thank you for your stay and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to Gran Canaria!

Best Regards,

reviews.review_text: A hotel that caters for all. Modern hotel with all the amenities one could ask for. Kids pool, crèche, water polo, rock climbing + more, as well as a quiet pool/jacuzzi sunbathing area for adults. Evening entertainment was OK, the cocktails are excellent. All the staff were exceptional. Don’t forget to fit in a massage or beauty treatment, one of the best we’ve had.  Easy walking distance to the harbour which has excellent restaurants.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you very much for the fanstastic feedback of a recent stay with us on Google, MrsR KGB.
We love to read about your positive experience at our modern resort hotel and appreciate your kind comments, in particular the ones on the excellent cocktails and staff. We look forward to your next stay! Kindest regards

reviews.review_text: Everything was amazing and exceeded expectations. Tenesor and Asia were extremely polite and helpful - always providing exceptional service. We'll definitely be returning!
reviews.owner_answer:
First of all, thank you for sharing us your fabulous opinion about your recent stay in Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria, Mogán.
We have no words to thank you for this great feedback you have sent us. We appreciate a lot your comments regarding  our colleagues Tenesor and Asia. We will pass your comments on to our colleagues and they will be glad to hear from you.
 It is a pleasure to work for guests like you who appreciate our strong efforts for making guests’ stay better and we are happy to know that we have reached this with you. 
At Radisson Blu, we know that the holidays are some of the most important times of the year and that is why it brightens our day to read opinions as positive as yours.

We look forward to serving you again in the future.

reviews.review_text:
supposed to be a 5 star resort. no chance. poor service, staff are good but not enough of them to offer a 5 star service. bar service very slow. pool area not cleaned regularly, dirty glasses and ash trays left all day and over night...
restaurant floor not cleaned in the evening food and stains still on floor under breakfast tables from the eve before.
advertised with spa, however entrance is charged with a time limit of about 90 minutes...really?
we chose because of spa so very disappointed had to pay twice every day to use the spa and indoor pool.
would not recommend or revisit.
ideal for families with kids but not for avid 5 star travellers expecting a 5 star spa hotel experience.
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Ritchie, thank you for sharing your comments on Google. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations during your last stay and apologize for any inconveniences caused. Our spa services are with an extra charge and the access to the thermal area you mention has a recommended time limit of 150 minut. Should you reconsider to give us another opportunity to welcome you in the future we will do our utmost to make your stay as pleasant as possible. Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
It is a very nice hotel very clean the only downside is most of the staff need customer service training this includes managers with the exception of Pedro . We waited 45 minutes to  get a drink 1 night and the manager agreed it was not a busy night he voided our bill which was for 8 drinks when the drinks arrived 1 was incorrect. This was our 3rd visit there were 8 of us and we used to drink outside the hotel as we couldn't stand the wait for drinks so the hotel lost a lot of no money. The pool is ideal for kids. Checking in out was very quick.Dont know why there is a €300
deposit for mini bar it would be useful to be able to use the fridge wouldn't it be better to ask if you wanted the bar full and if so  charge the deposit.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for staying with us and for posting your comments on Google, John. Your observations are appreciated and we will forward them to the relevant supervisors in order to keep improving the customer service and experience. It would be a pleasure to welcome you with us again.

reviews.review_text:
