Very relaxing, the hotel resort in divided into two area.... One for family with kids and a quieter section for adults only.... Friendly staff, clean and spacious. About 20 minute walk to the sea front with plenty of restaurants on the way.  Many type of restaurants to choose from and not to expensive.
This is a quiet area of Gran Canaria.
Would I return? Yes
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your feedback, Phil. We are delighted to know that your stay with us was relaxing and memorable. It will be a pleasure to welcome you with us again!

reviews.review_text: Quiet, comfortable and well laid out hotel.  There is a pool area for noisier people and a separate pool area at the other end of the property for those seeking quiet.  Rooms are large and comfortable with good sizes balconies.  Buffet is out of this world with both indoor and outdoor sitting areas.  Staff is friendly and efficient.  There is a 24 hour gym, outdoor workout area, beach volleyball court and yoga deck.  12-15 minute walk to the main town along a pedestrian only path.  Very comfortable and highly recommend if visiting Puerto Mogan.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for commenting on your recent stay at the hotel, Melanie. It is a pleasure to hear that our quiet, comfortable and well laid out facilities met your expectations and that the overall experience was pleasant and memorable. We look forward to welcoming you again.

reviews.review_text:
Nice location and only 10 minutes walk from Puerto Mogan which is beautiful.
Facility itself is excellent and it has on offer a lot of excellent amenities for families.For those who don't want to listen to screaming kids there is the quiet pool area which is a separate pool away from the main pool.

Plus Sides:
- Very modern hotel
- Excellent staff and service on the whole
- Excellent amenities
- Good quality food for a buffet and hotel of it's size
- All of the staff are very friendly and willing to help
- Free daily bottled water
- Ability to charge to room and not need to carry cash
- Use of hotel towels also very good, with option to swap for clean at hotel reception
- No sunbed reservations allowed
- Spa and gym facilities
- Any issues you have the hotel will work very hard to rectify
- Hotel is very quiet at night

Down sides:
- Entertainment is mediocre. Only semi-decent act was the magician which proved to be popular but then staff could not handle the drinks demand and orders fell into chaos. There was not a huge amount of people but staff could not handle. They ended up serving my kids alcoholic drinks which we luckily caught.
- The system of ordering drinks and delivery does not work. You often see people wandering about with your order not knowing who to take it to. This only applies to the bars however. In the restaurant it works well.
- Eating outside is great but there are too many flies. They need to address this.
- Rooms are generally clean with the exception of the floors. Floors are only swept daily and not very well. Not sure if its a time limitation or what but more effort needs to be made. A vacuum would make a big difference. Corridor floors also need to be addressed. I know people will pull in a lot of dirt and it's difficult to manage but in block 3 the gardeners have their storage room and it could be 2-3 days before the mess they made was cleaned up. Saying that all of the main public areas are kept very clean so there is no excuse.
- Watch out for the grumpy lifeguard. Safety is priority but this guy is a real grump. All other lifeguards are good.

The hotel wants to be 5 star but somehow doesn't quite make it, they have some improvements to make.
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Kerr, thank you for choosing us for your holiday in Gran Canaria and for taking the time for such a detailed review on Google. We are delighted to read that you had a relaxing stay with us and that you found our resort modern and service and staff excellent. Thank you also for mentioning some points that we could improve. We have commented them to the departments of Food & Drinks and Housekeeping in order to increase the quality of those points. We hope to  welcome you again at our resort hotel soon. Kind regards,

reviews.review_text: The hotel and staff are great. Food good, but we chose half term so it was overrun with kids!! One complaint: We requested interconnecting doors or rooms b ext door to each other weeks before departure, but no they couldn't do that!! As we were returning guests for third time, I think they could have saved two rooms together.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your feedback, Ann. We are delighted to hear about your third stay with us and we appreciate your kind comments on our team and food. We are sorry to hear we were not able to accommodate your room request during your last stay. We will do the utmost to meet your expectations next time you visit us.

reviews.review_text: Excellent Hotel, we thoroughly enjoyed our week at the hotel. Staff are very friendly, the facilities were excellent and the breakfast had an excellent and varied selection. The pool areas were spotless, and nice size of pools. Gym is small, but has plenty for a holiday workout. The range of daily exercise classes was very good - yoga, pilates, tai chi. We will come back.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for staying at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan and for sharing your experience on Google, Graham. We love to know that our facilities, staff, breakfast buffet and pool areas met or even  exceeded your expecations and we look forward to your next arrival.

reviews.review_text: A very calm location though still within easy reach of the beautiful fishing town and its amenities. Hotel has two pool areas: a lively (family) and a quiet (couples/adults) area. Rooms are available in both zones. Though not visibly separated, the guests of the two zones only appear to mix at meal times. Buffet is grand and rooms are very modern. Was pleasantly surprised to find a bath tub on the bathroom which a lot of other modern hotels tend to phase out.

Nice large rooms with modern decor. There are three temperature controlled pools with clear clean water. Lots of variety in the three restaurants within the resort. They have games throughout the day with performers/ entertainers every night. The resort staff are warm and friendly. Amazing experience. Would come again
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Abhishek, thank you very much for sharing your amazing experience at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria on Google. Your comments on our large and modern rooms, three heated outdoor pools, variety of restaurants, daily and evening entertainment and warm staff are highly appreciated. We look forward to your return! Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
It is a nice hotel with lots of space around the pool and walking distance to lots of local resturants. The staff are all friendly and nice. We stayed here soon after it opened and there were some teething problems, like having your room cleaned at 6pm one day and then 8am the next (we had gone out for a run and were surprised the room got cleaned again so soon, we hadn't even used our towels). Also the gym was quite small and often had no towels or water available (people tended to fill up bottles at the gym, regardless if they were using it or not).
Breakfast was included and had everything you could want and was generally very nice. The Italian resturant at the hotel was also quite good (again we were there opening week before Christmas, so were the only people there, which was nice).
Overall a nice place, it is getting busier and with that comes the annoyance of other guests being around.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Marshall,
Thank you for sharing your comments and feedback.
We thank you for staying in the resort during this opening period. The management and staff are working extremely hard to ensure that we deliver 5 star service. We regret the inconveniences and we hope you will give us another opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.
Kind regards.-
ESoler - Director of Sales

reviews.review_text: It is certainly a five star hotel. But this is not a place to stay. And it is quite far (15-20 mins walk) from the pretty village of Puerto Mogàn and its lovely beach. The premises do not highlight that you are in a selective place. Everything outside looks sterile. On the "upper deck", artificial grass could certainly not be avoided due to the climate, but no real privacy there, where you hear everything from the "activity pool" on the ground floor. The architects' sole accolade is for letting the natural breeze coming from the sea upwards the valley to the hotel. It is certainly a good place for business reasons -- just wondering why in this case choose the relatively secluded Puerto Mogàn compared to other places on Gran Canaria -- but not for holiday reasons or a simple pool holiday.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear that you found our services up to a five star standard. However, we regret that our modernly designed facilities in the charming Mogan were not to your liking. Best regards

reviews.review_text:
It is a beautiful and nice and friendly member of staff ..
The location is great normally I don't like to stay in the hotel..bot in this hotel we spend around 3 days inside u have whatever you need to enjoy..
reviews.owner_answer: We appreciate your kind comments following your stay at our Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan, Omar. Thank you for highlighting the hotel staff and  location. We look forward to your next visit. Sunny regards

reviews.review_text: Amazing resort. Plenty of space and very friendly staff. Breakfast is great, huge selection. Nice cocktails. Walk to the beach doesn't take long.
reviews.owner_answer: We value and appreciate your feedback, L K. It is lovely to hear that or resort´s spacious areas, friendly staff, huge breakfast selection, nice cocktails and the proximity to Mogan port made you stay memorable. It will be a pleasure to welcome you again in the future. Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
Outstanding service and high standard facilities. Really gigantic warm saltwater pool. Nice walk to the charming city of Puerto de Mogán.
The breakfast is terrific with fast, friendly and nice staff.
reviews.owner_answer: We would like to thank you for commenting on your experience at the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan, Mats. Lovely to hear that you  enjoyed the outstanding service and our high standard facilities. We will be delighted to welcome you again for another memorable stay.

reviews.review_text:
Very modern and clean hotel. Lovely friendly staff. Spacious rooms and excellent breakfast. We used our HB for lunch some days and went out for dinner.

Felinis Italian was very nice. You get €15 per adult and €7.50 per child if you don't fancy the hustle and bustle of the buffet at the Larder.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your comments on your experience at the hotel, Craig. We are delighted to hear that the resort's modern facilities,  friendly staff, spacious rooms, excellent breakfast and Filini dining experience were to your liking. It will be a pleasure to welcome you again.

reviews.review_text: Just returned from a superb stay; the hotel and holiday was perfect from start to finish. It began with a friendly and very informative check-in over a glass of cava. The room was great (1328) - specious and clean with a massive balcony, which had the sun on it until at least 3pm. Although it overlooked the children’s pool (we were holidaying with a well-behaved 7-year old) it wasn’t at all noisy and didn’t distract from an extremely relaxing and pleasant stay. Both breakfast and dinner were fantastic - a plethora of tasty treats to choose from, which varied enough from day to day. Although the hotel was full, it never felt too busy at any time in the dining area. The Italian restaurant Filini was equally delicious and worth sampling. We enjoyed our stay so much that we have already booked to return, something I have never done before. Puerto Mogan was a short (easy) walk away and definitely worth exploring - such a beautiful place. Across the road was an excellent Super Dino shop that sold everything needed. The staff were exceptional and made our stay even better. If you are thinking of booking this hotel, do so; you don’t regret it.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for valuing your recent experience at our modern resort hotel, Emma. We are happy to hear that everything was to your liking and we thank you for praising our exceptional staff. It would be a pleasure for all of us to welcome you again.

reviews.review_text: A really good hotel. I loved how you'd get daily water from them and the pool is so nice. We got upgraded from a normal room to a suite due to them being full and their mistake of booking. Would 100% recommend

The hotel is new, only 16 months old. Its a huge place, very modern and exceptionally clean. Rooms are contemporary and well appointed. We loved the 50" Samsung Smart TV with YouTube, really helped at times with the kids. Hotel WiFi throughout rooms and common areas was strong and stable. Beds were very comfortable, my only small gripe would be the super soft pillows but pillows are subjective anyway. Bathroom large with wet room shower. We had a fantastic large balcony overlooking the pool, great for watching the sun go down worth a drink in your hand. There was a gym, running track, tennis courts and a climbing wall. Entertainment every night. Poolside bar offering food and drinks served to your sunbed if you wish. The main restaurant offers high quality food. We were half-board, the breakfasts were vast and offered every conceivable breakfast you could want, dinner is a buffet with a different underlying theme each night. There was so much choice, starters, salads, mains, deserts; hardest bit was not trying it all. Hotel is located in a small beach village area, far away from some of the busier more commercial resorts on the island. This was a bonus for us, the hotel and area was full of couples and young families, no rowdy groups at all. Lots of Spanish holiday here too, which is a good sign. The beach is an easy 15 min walk from the hotel to a small bay sandy beach with great shallow sea, brilliant for kids. Lovely vibe down there, lots of bars and restaurants and very pretty marina. The hotel staff are all extremely friendly and helpful, nothing was too much bother. Wasn't the cheapest holiday we've had but it definitely was one of the nicest places we've ever stayed at, so money well spent I think. We wouldn't hesitate to highly recommend the Radisson Blu, thanks for an awesome holiday!
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Andy, Thank you very much for sharing such a detailed positive review on Google. We love to know that your stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan was memorable and that you could relax and unwind in our modernly designed and stylish facilities in Gran Canaria´s "Little Venice" Puerto de Mogan. Your kind comments on our well appointed rooms, smart TV, strong and stable high speed WiFi, sport facilities, delicious and varied food etc. are highly appreciated and we hope to welcome you again in the future! Warm regards

reviews.review_text: Really lovely hotel, very different compared to the Coridal ( the other 5star hotel across the road) it's super modern and extremely clean, the two different pools are great, the top floor pool is a quiet pool and the lower floor is for children and has aquatic fitness activities too, the main win for this hotel is the rooms, they are gorgeous! Huge balconies too with sun loungers which is great. Also my mum is coeliac and the range of gluten free options in the breakfast was amazing, it had a separate toaster and microwave. Will definitely be returning next January!
reviews.owner_answer: We appreciate your feedback, Babs. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed the overall experience, especially our comfortable and spacious rooms with large and fully equipped balconies. Lovely to hear that our food offer adapted to your Mum's specific dietary requirements. We all look forward to your January stay next year. Sunny regards from Mogan.

reviews.review_text: This is a great hotel with great swimming pools, a buffet and plenty of things to do such as playing football and other sports! It has great apartments and great service as well as the balconies being amazing! The reason that I haven't given it a five is that it doesn't have many placed to go for dinner APART from the buffet.
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Jack, thank you for the high score you rated us on Google and for your kind comment on our modern resort hotel situated in Puerto de Mogan, Gran Canaria. We take an opportunity to inform you that apart from the main buffet restaurant The Larder there´s an option to dine à la carte in the Italian restaurant Filini. Kind regards

reviews.review_text: Super place to spend a few days. Nice and not to much noise. Easy to find a spot with sun or shade. 10 min walking distance from the town and the harbour with many give restaurants. If you bring your own bike you have to take it to your room, but rooms are large so it works well.
reviews.owner_answer: We appreciate your comments, Jørn. Lovely to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! Upon your next arrival we recommend to ask our Front Office team to store your bike in the bike storage room.

reviews.review_text:
Wasn't a fan. Food from breakfast buffet had me sick and generally filled with screaming children. Would highly recommend staying away from the food at this hotel and enjoy lovely Mogán instead.

There are quieter parts of the hotel, but they didn't book a room on that side, but instead right next to the main pool. The ammedities are typical of a hotel of this calibre.

Overall can't recommend for the price as there is far better just outside it's walls than within it.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for the time taken to share your impressions, Andrew. We regret your stay with us was not fully to your satisfaction and apologize for any eventual inconveniences caused. Should you give us another opportunity to welcome you to the hotel we would definitely consider your preference of a room at the Quiet Pool area. We wish you a fantastic start of the New Year! King regards

reviews.review_text:
Overall I enjoyed my stay at the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan.
Large resort, beautiful, relaxing, spacious

The worse thing...Breakfast is a daily disaster. Think the different happy faces on the breakfast information card given at check-in with the different smiley faces (happy to sad) are representative of the faces of the staff at breakfast time. At peak time, they are stressed. The service was so uncoordinated overall.

The sliced fruit was disappointing. No variety and usually empty or the slices of the fruit were gigantic. Who needs a half plate size slice of watermelon?

There were BBQ tongs (very long) for guest to use for the buffet food. Difficult for children to use and often they dropped them on the floor (and put them back). These types of tongs are not at all appropriate for a buffet.

There were next to no labels on food for breakfast where it mattered. There were some items that were out that even the staff didn’t know what it was. Labels were on for dinner though.

Sliced meat and cheese were kept at room temperature, start of breakfast to the end.

The orange juice constantly ran out and the bottles brought out were not cleaned to the touch. Very sticky. Overall the drinks are in the wrong area of the buffet. They should be in the back where the gluten section is in my opinion….out of the way...especially if they have to be refilled frequently. I nearly saw about 12 bottles nearly crash to the floor.

ALL of the eggs, any way you had them were pretty much overcooked.

Pancakes and Waffles, cold and burnt. The pastries/doughnuts were lovely...tasty but self served from a distance with those super long BBQ tongs again.

Dinner was pretty decent but at 30Euros...was way too expensive...grossly overpriced for mostly side dishes on the buffet.

The grounds were very clean but the housekeeping was not the best. Beds were changed every other day...which was good. Floors weren’t cleaned properly though. The floors outside each room looked worn as well as they haven’t been cared for.

Our beach towels were taken and not replaced on the 2nd day.

Also my particular housekeeper kindly helped herself to my chewing gum everyday since buying it. It became a joke with my partner. 3 sticks missing one day, 2 sticks missing another...out of a 15 pack of gum, I only had 2 sticks...she or someone else had half of the pack.. Needless to say, although not entirely a big issue I did feel a bit uneasy about leaving things about.

The pools were great….quiet and non quiet pools. The evening adult entertainment was average. They appear to not always kept to the schedule of the children’s events though despite them being posted.

Again, overall, the hotel, location and amenities were great. Having stayed at other hotels, the standard of service were weren’t the best for a 5 star hotel...at least in the housekeeping and kitchen. The food was disappointing but there are plenty of nice cheap restaurants nearby.

Would I visit again, perhaps...yes. Recommend… depends on what you are after in a holiday.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Mr. Hamilton, thank you for your review shared on Google. We regret we didn´t exceed your expectations during the last stay with us. Rest assured all constructive comments will be forwarded to relevant departments for analysis to keep delivering service our valued guests expect from our brand.
Your positive comments on our resort hotel are much appreciated and we hope to welcome you back in the future. Kind regards

reviews.review_text: My wife and I enjoyed an amazing week at this stunning hotel. The rooms, the service and the food were all top-notch and we particularly appreciated the separate 'quiet pool' to the rear of the complex. Quite pricey but you really get what you pay for!
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for posting your review following your week stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan, Fionntan. We are thrilled you consider our hotel stunning and rooms, service and food top-notch and we look forward to your next visit! Sunny regards

reviews.review_text: Great holiday and very friendly staff! They go the extra mile to roster a variety of activities to keep the kids entertained. The evening shows were great too!
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for staying with us and for commenting on your experience, Craig. Our friendly staff would go an extra mile to make our guests stays unique and memorable. We all look forward to welcoming you again soon.

reviews.review_text:
... The hotel is very well located. Fabulous breakfast. Great facilities really liked the pool
One thing they need to do is. The fridge in the room was locked after the first day. Not a good idea to charge.60 euros to open it.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your comments on Google, Joe. We are delighted you liked the hotel's facilities,  location and the plentiful breakfast. We are sorry for the little issue with the mini bar. It would be a pleasure to welcome you soon again with us in Mogan!

reviews.review_text:
Spent a lovely time at this resort.
Staff very professional and friendly.
Larder buffet was always good - excellent food prep and presentation. Recommended.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for assessing your experience at the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan, Anastasia. We appreciate your recommendation to other travelers and we look forward to your next visit.

reviews.review_text:
I’m still chasing a refund for one room! The service was dreadful and even when I spoke to Abigail a moment ago, very patronising and did not understand.

This is not a 5star hotel and if you complain about anything, they ignore you.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Paul Whitbreak,
Thank you for your feedback.
We do take note of your comment, and we will inform our Management of your disappointment.
Yours Sincerely

reviews.review_text:
You could not fault the service, friendly staff, the hotel room, the pool - all of it exceptional.
My only gripe (if any at all) was the food - hot food should be served hot and not luke warm.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for assessing your stay at our hotel, Deirdreann. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the overall experience and we appreciate your positive comments on our facilities, service and staff.

reviews.review_text: Amazing place beautiful scenery the staff where very very helpful! The only problem I had was the "beach" floor around the main pool it was very hard to walk on and most of the "sand" was in the pool! But it was a perfect holiday other than that :) we would book again!
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for your comments on our facilities, services and staff, Nathan. Your constructive observation on the "Beach" pool area is appreciated and we take an opportunity to inform you that the maintenance department is already following up.

reviews.review_text: Great family and couple hotel, quiet. Don't miss if you're in Mogan. Close to city center, 5min walking to the beach. Store near so don't miss! Enjoy.
reviews.owner_answer: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Gran Canaria Mogan. It would be a pleasure to welcome you again.

reviews.review_text: The room is excellent. We stayed in a superior room which was very modern and clean. The breakfast was delicious with lots of varied fresh options, we especially enjoyed the freshly squeezed orange juice. All in all a perfect place to stay by the beautiful town Mogan.
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Elijah, Thank you for sharing your positive experience of a recent stay at Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan on Google. We are pleased to read you enjoyed our modern and comfortable facilities and the charming fishing village Puerto de Mogan. Warm regards

reviews.review_text: Hotel is located 10 minutes of walking distance to the beach. Rooms are really spacious and nice. All of the rooms have big terrace. Staff is helpful and nice. There are 2 big pools, one is "quite zone" where you can really relax...
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your comments on Google, Dusan. We love to know you enjoyed your stay with us, especially the spacious rooms with large terraces, helpful staff and the Quiet pool area. We look forward to your next stay with us!

reviews.review_text:
This comfortable hotel is located in a quiet place. Professional, Marvelous and friendly personal. Reception Manager, restaurant and housekeeping staff are so kind. Special mention to Mrs. Y.Naranjo, Spa Manager.

Thanks for doing of our rest an unique experience!!
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for sharing your experience. We are delighted to read you enjoyed your stay and we will forward your nice words to the team. We hope to welcome you back soon.

reviews.review_text: Environment is nice. Dinner is decent. Breakfast, is not as fresh as you think. They use frozen strawberries and call it "fresh", at least according to the person I spoke with. I showed him that it's rock hard and even looking at it (at least if you're not an idiot and know what fresh fruit actually looks like) I can tell it was frozen. He then proceeds to take it away and 100% either throws it in the microwave or oven to defrost quickly. How do I know that? Because 1) fresh strawberries aren't mush 2) fresh strawberries dont taste or look like that. But hey, it's 2022...maybe it identifies as "fresh" and not frozen/defrosted smh. You can fool the average idiot (99.9% of people) but not me
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your impressions, Bob. We are delighted that you enjoyed our hotel´s environment. We are sorry to hear about the incident with the strawberries and we apologize for the inconvenience. Our F&B team will follow up in order to prevent future discontents.
We hope to have another chance to welcome you and provide you with a truly memorable holiday experience. Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
Wonderful, modern hotel in a great location. We had a beautiful mini suite with mountain and pool views. The beds and pillows were heavenly - real down pillows. The main room and bathroom were spacious and beautifly appointed. The double terrace was huge with a table and chair combo and 2 large loung beds and there was still loads of room!
Our room, common areas, gym, pools and restaurant were sparkling clean. They might of had a problem in the past but wasn't an issue when we were here.
The breakfast was very good with the most options I've ever come across. All the usual breakfast items but also whole salmon ( 2 types), pate, meatballs, and a whole Scandi section.  They had fresh OJ in pitchers, but if that wasn't fresh enough for your taste they had a juice press.
ALL the staff were exceptional! Polite, friendly, helpful, professional and ready to smile and share a joke. Actually, I felt the whole (beautiful) town was one of the most friendly of places. I would love to go back and have no reservations about recommending this hotel!
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Ivy, thank you for taking the time to share such a positive review on Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Gran Canaria Mogan on Google. We are so pleased to read about your fantastic holiday experience with us in the lovely fishing village Puerto de Mogan. Great to read you fully enjoyed our modern and well-appointed rooms, spacious comune and pool areas, plentiful super breakfast buffet and our friendly and helpful staff. We look forward to your next stay! Warm regards

reviews.review_text: A clean and we'll maintained 5 star hotel 10 min walk from the beach. Three heated pools, kids area and massage pools. Great breakfast and rooms. Breakfast, pool bars and room service were great.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your experience. We are delighted to know you enjoyed everythign in our hotel. We hope to welcome back soon.

reviews.review_text:
I had booked this resort to celebrate my wife birthday in Gran Canaria.

Good things first.

1. Big facility
2. They have lots of event happening most of the time.
3 multiple nice restaurant and bars.

Need improvement
1. They have very weired parking place. If your room is on other side of resort then even worst for you.

2. We were 2 families and booked 2 rooms. They gave us both rooms pretty far and when asked ... They said ... You did not request both room together. ( I have never request such a thing )

3. I had booked this restaurant to celebrate my wife's birthday. I bought 1 cake from outside and handed over to their restaurant and order one cake in resort restaurant itself. We wanted it to be special and restaurant/resort lost both the cakes. In response they just said they will not charge us for the cake (which they never delivered)

4. They found the cake next day and left us in our room. By the time we came to room (11 pm ). It was spoiler and we had to throw it.

May be my expectation was too high with a 5 star resort and I am very disappointed.
reviews.owner_answer: We regret we did not achieve your expectations during your last stay at the resort, Manohar. Should we have another chance to welcome you, we will do the utmost to make your stay memorable in every moment.

reviews.review_text: Fantastic hotel and staff are excellent
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your fantastic feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you had a great experience at our hotel and that you found our staff to be excellent. Providing exceptional service and a memorable stay is always our goal, and your kind words are greatly appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

reviews.review_text: Stunning location and excellent modern friendly 5 star hotel. Rooms very modern, clean and all with lovely views. Great choice for couples and families. Tucked away in the south with A1 motorway links it was a breeze to transfer in our rental car.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you very much for sharing such a positive review on our modern and well-appointed facilities in Mogan, Liam. We are pleased to know you consider our property a great choice for couples and families and we look forward to your next stay. Kind regards

reviews.review_text:
Very clean hotel, there are people everywhere working away.
The staff are very friendly and literally can't do enough for you.
Large selection of food available at meal times. Fish was delicious!!!
The team doing the pool/outdoor areas activities were great. From aqua gym which was fun to water polo in the pool. And football, archery, volleyball and rock climbing all on site.
There is a quiet area with massive sunbathing and pool area. A gym. A full size tennis court. Pool tables and table tennis table which the kids loved!!
There was evening entertainment which to be honest we didn't really see as we were too tired, but it was not loud and couldn't here it in our room.
We were half board but you are able to switch your evening meal to lunch, which then enabled us to walk down to the port (10 mins) and have food there. The restaurants in the actual port area are very good, again the fish is very good!!
There is also a supermarket about 5 minutes walk away which we used to get water and snacks (was cheaper) and there are some clothes/perfume/souvenir shops.
We'd hired a car and travelled off the beaten track right up into the hills which are beautiful. Lots of little taverns and friendly people.

There is still a lot to say and do but I would recommend this place to anyone. This is the only review I've ever done of a hotel so I must be impressed!!!
Oh, and the waterpark is not far away, if you go buy some water shoes there cheaper than at the market), and its worth investing in the 'fast pass' arm band, as some of the rides had quite a queue and we literally walked straight to the front meaning we got lots more turns on all the rides instead of being stood in a queue. And take a picnic, because we only bought 2 diet cokes and that was 10 Euros!!!!! God knows how much the food was!!!

Great hotel, great holiday, great people!!! Nothing else to say!!!!
reviews.owner_answer: Dear Alan, thank you for such a fantastic review on Google and in particular for praising our staff. We are so happy to read about your memorable holiday experience with us and appreciate all positive highlights you mention. We hope to count on your next visit soon! Kindest regards

reviews.review_text: My family planned a last-minute holiday escape during COVID and we couldn’t have been more delighted by how safe, clean and fun the resort was. Our children were able to be around other children, there were lots of activities to do (padel, tennis, basketball, soccer, swimming, spa) and the food was very good. It almost felt like “normal times.”
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for your comment. We are very happy to know you and your family totally enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to welcome you back in a near future. Don't hesitate to contact us for any assistance.

reviews.review_text: I've been to 5 star hotels and surely its not one of them.The staff is nice but their knowledge of english can not be accepted in a 5star hotel!! Inflatables are not allowed in the pool so avoid with kids.Its okay to pay an extra for the spa, but it should be a daily fee not for 3 hours.Service is average but very slow, bar and room both. I still dont regret that I've come here but it became an experience to avoid and warn people to not to pick this place.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Feher Barna,
Thank you very much for your comments and rating. We regret that we were unable to exceed your expectations during your stay. Rest assured we will forward your comments to all the departments concerned to review and action. We hope to have another opportunity to provide you with 5 star service.
Best regards.

reviews.review_text:
lovely hotel , spacious , airy relaxing. Lovely to have a separate quiet area around one of the pools. The rooms are very nice and quiet. I do think the hotel will need to work a bit harder to keep their 5 star rating though. We have over the years stayed in a lot of five star hotels and there are a few things which could cause trouble. when we arrived it was very calm and lovely but it soon became extremely busy and i feel the staff is not really coping. Breakfast buffe very nice but very crowded and long queues for for example pancakes. No breadrolls for breakfast which meant half cut bits of bread lying around. Sticky serving spoons which frankly is unhygienic.
Both my husband and I had a massage in the spa which was nice but therapist did not know a word of english? It was the same with some of the restaurant staff and cleaning staff. If you pay a lot to stay in a five star hotel you would expect the staff to know basic english.Some reviews regarding the cleanliness are true, the rooms never really smelt freshly cleaned.  The hotel still deserves a five star rating since all of the above comments are easy to deal with.
Susanne and family

We stayed at the Cordial Morgan Playa three weeks ago. It was the most relaxing holiday I have had in years. Everything was superb from the food the hotel and the staff. Everywhere was exceptionally clean. The food was very varied and tasty. Just a short walk to the harbour with it's bars and restaurants. We enjoyed it so much that we have already booked to visit again next year.

A very nice hotel with lovely staff and good facilities. The interiors are a little dated, but very clean and well maintained. We especially enjoyed the large and deep swimming pool.

The breakfast buffet was good, but we found the dinner buffet rather disappointing. It looked good, however the food tasted bland across the board; we missed more seafood options as well.

Not so much the fault of the hotel as they do try to fight it, but beware that a significant number of guests are “reserving” their beach chairs. At peak times, this might mean that you won’t be able to relax by the pool while a third of the chairs are actually unoccupied.

Overall, not perfect, but absolutely nice and will consider staying here again

Looks like after 8 years in a row this might be the last, the restaurant in the evening which was never the best has now slipped to 2 stars.
Poor selection, item run out and staff don't seem to care, plus the hot food is just poor in layout unless you want to que 4 times and eat cold food.
Come on get it sorted please, as overall we love the place, but can only be pushed so far.
Just to add the front of house staff are great as always.

Fab hotel in a great location .
Beautuful grounds and gorgeous interior.  Staff were lovely and the food was great . Lots of choice . Half board. we ate in the hotel every night and never got bored . The rooms were very clean , we were on ground floor over looking the spa with piped music playing .
Really enjoyed my stay would certainly go back !!

This is a superb hotel situated in the lovely picturesque town of Puerto de Mogán about a 5 minute walk from the beach and the harbour.

The photos of the hotel really do not do it justice, the grounds are just beautifully filled with fauna and it’s stunning to look at, with a real tropical feel

We are a family of three and we decided to upgrade to the junior suite and stayed in 9030, the room was very good and the private garden was beautiful and very secluded. The room was not perfect and there are a few minor issues that maybe should be addressed. Firstly, there is a lack of electrical sockets and in this modern age we do need them for all our devices and secondly the wiring under the table and beside the fridge is pretty ugly. But these are not gamechangers and we loved the room.

The hotel has two large pools in different areas of the grounds, we stayed by the ‘noisier’ pool as it was closer to our room, but it was not noisy and getting a sunbed was not an issue. Both pool areas are lovely.

As we had upgraded our breakfast was served in the blue building near to our room and what a lovely breakfast it was with a huge choice of cereal, fruit, cold meats, bread, eggs, juices, churros (which my daughter loved) and sausages / bacon etc if you fancy a fry-up. Fresh coffee is served to the table and there’s even a decent decaf on offer.

We were half-board and dinner was served in the large main restaurant in the main building. The restaurant is beautiful, especially the outside area. There are 2 seatings, the first is from 6.15 to around 7.30pm and the second after 8.15pm, upon arrival you choose your seating and then you get allocated your table which you keep for the duration. This works really well and helps to avoid a mad free-for-all at dinner. Again, the food is really good for something on this scale with a huge array of choice. We had roast pork, lamb, kebabs, paella, pizza and fresh fish, there’s also a great salad bar and a dessert station that includes some very good ice cream. Of course, it is not going to reach the standard of a half decent restaurant, but last year in Turkey the food was so bad and so chaotic that we were forced to eat out more than 50% of the time, not here, we only ate out twice in 10 days.

Lunch however, does need a bit of work, the pizza that my daughter ordered was full of red pepper and was pretty awful and the sandwiches ordered from the bar by the lower (noisy) pool were pretty tasteless. Huge portions, but no taste and very little choice too.

But the reality is that no hotel is perfect, but this one is really not that far off.

Things we’d recommend on your stay:

The Puerto Morgan Submarine – Forget the mixed reviews, it’s fantastic, going down to 25 metres and well worth the money. If going from the hotel allow 15-20 minutes to get there as it’s a deceptively long walk as it’s the other side of the harbour, it’s cheaper to book online

70’s Buggy Tours – Well deserve their 5 star rating on trip advisor. It’s a great adventure into the mountains and it is something that families or couples will enjoy. Great scenery, two lovely men that run it and the buggies are great fun to drive (full review on trip advisor).

Private Taxi from airport – We used Zip transfers and at 45 euros we felt that it was great value as it’s a fairly long drive on a TUI coach with all the stops (as we found out on the return).

Hire a car – We hired one for 4 days using Inauto at 157 euros, couldn’t fault them and they delivered it to the hotel.

This hotel is beautiful ! Inside and outside has so much greenery,  its like a tropical paradise . The staff are super helpful and friendly . Although it's a big hotel , nowhere feels busy , there's always space wherever you go . We went bed and breakfast and i don't think there was anything that you could want that they didn't have ! It's in an ideal location for access to town and the beach and the weekly market more or less starts outside the entrance . If i was to be picky , the rooms could probably do with a freshen up , but they're lovely big rooms and house keeping are excellent at keeping them spotless . We would really love to visit again

Third time at this hotel over a period of years. Another great visit. Hotel is attractive and well run. Easy location to the harbour and attractions of Puerto Mogan although this time only left the hotel once in 9 nights (for a pharmacy visit!). Highly recommended and will stay again.
Third visit to the only place we have stayed more than once. We like the lovely garden setting and pools. Mogan is far superior to nearby resorts and has character and a relaxed atmosphere.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear David,

We feel incredibly fortunate to be the only place that has had the honor of welcoming you on more than one occasion! It is always a pleasure to see you enjoying our facilities and we are already looking forward to welcoming you on your fourth visit.

It is a delight to host guests like you.

Warm regards from the entire team at Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa,
Departamento de Operaciones Cordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: A fantastic place. There's almost everything in it. Excellent service. Just five minutes walking from the sea. Very good food.

The lush and beautiful green areas surrounding the hotel create a serene atmosphere that is perfect for unwinding. The rooms are spacious and well-equipped, and the hotel staff are friendly and helpful. The pool area is also fantastic, and the on-site restaurant serves delicious food. Overall, Hotel Cordial is a top-notch choice for anyone looking for a peaceful oasis in Gran Canaria.

Fantastic hotel with lots of character.
Staff were very helpful.
The building layout is very good considering approx. 1000 guests can stay there it. I would have never have known.

The two big pools are heated to 26 degrees, which is perfect even for swimming training. Good policy on not reserving pool beds.

Wide choice of food for breakfast and dinner. The latter changes daily.

Nice short walk to the harbour and ideal for the big market day on Fridays.

The only small issue we did have was with our shower running hot and cold. It was looked at but didn't get fixed. I'm sure it was a time-of-day issue but just a bit of a nuisance really.

Really nice place, beautiful garden with unbelievably pretty flowers and palm trees. Really good evening shows and animation for kids. Food is also high variable and fantastic. I recommend it to anyone especially for families.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Petra,

We greatly appreciate your kind words regarding your stay at Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa! It is wonderful to read how much you enjoyed your experience with us.

We can not wait to have you back for another memorable experience in the future.

Best regards,
Departamento de Operaciones Cordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: Love this  hotel and returned for  the  4th  time! Great all round  and  relaxing  hotel  in a league of its own. Thanks  for the great service,  food, entertainment  and cocktails  not to mention  beautiful  gardens and amenities  on offer

Rooms: Spacious and clean that give a luxurious feel. It was equipped with a fridge, tv, desk, seperate coffee table/dressing table. The coffee table had a kettle and a coffee machine.
Cleanliness: Rooms were cleaned daily. Even the floors were washed daily. Loved coming to a clean room daily 😊
Service was excellent. One of our family members had her 60th birthday and we tied a couple of balloons for her. The hotel was informed about this. But when we came back to the room later in the day, she had a bottle of champagne, a small cake and a gift voucher at the spa waiting for her. What a surprise 😊👏 The staff was always helpful and humble.

One of the best hotell expiriences we ever had. The service is top notch and they really do stand out by trying a little extra.

Perfect if u search for a peaceful family place with good food and nice pools.

The only thing that did not work as good was the table placing system as other family's took our table by misstake three times in a row. The system could use a remake, but then again, everything else is close to perfection.

Highly recommended, we will visit again.
The Cordial Mogan Playa is a superb destination, with excellent staff, hotel facilities & luxurious surroundings. The gardens alone are one of the island's best tourist attractions!
Lovely hotel and staff. Great pools and grounds. Mogan itself is very quiet in May. So if you like your holiday busier from July onwards is the way to go

It was an amazing experience, if you face any problem just speak up the staff are really friendly most of them let’s give some special thanks to (Amine, Abdelmunim, Fernabdo from Argentina at the restaurant, Pedro at the restaurant and Same name at the Bar next to the reception, Yoana (housekeeper) and few staff at the reception and the swimming pool area
Thank you to everyone that made my holiday special
I only give 4 stars ⭐️ for location because it’s too far from last Palmas and nothing much to see outside but the hotel perfecto 👌🏻

Large hotel but seems less so because of the hugely well considered architecture. Two large pools ( one children friendly, the other adults) plenty of facilities ; gym, spa ( pay extra for this but it's worth a visit!!) fitness classes, tennis courts, even a small archaeological site. The whole place is set out in the form of a small village , surrounded by lush greenery which makes everything look lovely. Breakfast was great , with a huge choice , and lots of good local restaurants for evening meals in the picturesque local village ..great service too and friendly staff...only slight disappointment was to be made to pay extra for safe in room? ( What hotels do this any more? Should be free service like every other hotel) Bizarre, and at odds with the high levels of customer service elsewhere.. apart from this, highly recommend this hotel ..

Lovely hotel, like an oasis.  Spectacular planting makes it a very intimate hotel even though it's quite big.  Very well thought out building small blocks of rooms instead of one high-rise.  Food was good for breakfast and dinner.  The staff are all friendly and helpful.  I'd feel safe going back on my own.
Absolutely beautiful, very clean, staff are very friendly and helpful, nothing I could fault, definitely would recommend it and we  definitely come again.
A lovely hotel to stay in beautiful Mogan, can't fault anything about it, we only stayed Bed and Breakfast, the restaurant, staff and all facilities are outstanding and we will definitely stay again.

Mostly positive experience with a few exceptions. Location is perfect with excellent service and spotlessly clean rooms and facilities. Complex is well kept and attractive. Some less positive aspects are the fact that there are no double beds (they are two single beds pushed together). Also, sunbeds by the pool are all reserved early in the morning and staff make no attempt to prevent this. Decor in our room was quite dated and there was visible damage to the exterior of the property on the underside of the walkway opposite our 2nd floor room which was a bit worrying. Overall though this is a good hotel with great service.

Great hotel offering value for money.Lovely staff were very helpful and friendly.Good entertainment programme for evenings in both the reception ie individual performers prior to 9.30pm including pianist, violinist, Spanish guitar, followed by shows including Elvis, ABBA, Flamenco ,Pop and Rock and more.Rooms are well fitted and spacious.Hotel grounds are extensive with two pools.A more mature customer base using fitness centre, tennis courts,games room,  library that offers free tea and biscuits from 3pm to 5pm daily.Drinks reasonably priced for such a quality hotel.Would highly recommend if a more relaxed environment is wanted.Disco starts at 9.30pm closes at 12pm and does not affect the noise levels to the rooms.Good facilties for those whose flights home are after the 12am checkout time.Great selection for breakfast and dinner,and fine selection of wines.Would love to see a shuttle service from the hotel to Puerto Mogan.

Delightful find. Identified as a solo traveller so great spot in walking distance of beach, marina and activities PLUS hotel has various plans so you can B&B, half board or full board!
2 pools, heated, and spectacular views of rocky uplands.
Has restaurants of choice, including a Michelin restaurant, (sadly fully booked) and entertainment most evening that's suitable to mixed ages and not just a banging disco.
Staff are incredibly friendly.
Pool staff, activity staff (did stretch and dance class!), valets and reception. All lovely and the waiter and Maitre D in buffet restaurants. Even the cleaning staff are lovely.
Went end Feb -start March.
Clean area and Mogan is known as "Venice of Gran Canaria".

Great place that transports you to a different kind of Gran Canaria, full of greens maintained to a high standard! There is also Botanical tour of the hotel varied flora.

Food varied and even though sometimes lacks vibrant flavours available outside of the hotel still perfect for a week's getaway with kids.

Service was great, although I wish Miniclub had 2 hour sessions at least instead of 1.5 hour ones as it doesn't give enough time for parents to do much.

Family suites with two rooms an absolute treasure!

What's more the hotel even prints A4 Format Christmas program for it's guests!

The most amazing thing was that on Christmas Eve children actually received presents from Santa! We've stayed in a few places before during those dates and this was definitely above and beyond! The cherry on top was the fact that hotel staff even provided batteries needed🙂! Everything was so thought through!
Kids were thrilled. Our little one is still singing into a little microphone she received. 😂
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Sergii, 

Thank you very much for your fantastic review! We couldn't be happier to read your comments and know that we were able to give you and your family a lovely memory of your Christmas holiday in Gran Canaria.
 
We are delighted to read that your daughter was especially happy after Santa's visit and we really hope that she enjoys her gift. We thank you very much that you appreciate our efforts to make our guests happy, even more so at this special time of year. It is a privilege for us that you have chosen us to enjoy such special days. 

Thank you very much, Sergi and family. It has been a pleasure to make you happy. We look forward to your return and, in the meantime, we wish you a very happy year 2023. 

Yours sincerely, 
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: Fairly good experience here. Staff are particularly helpful and friendly. Buffet dinner wasn't great but there are plenty of outside options. Double-check for unexpected items on your bill due to the lack of validation by staff when charging to your room, there are some sad people out there that feel thr need to try to steal from others / the hotel!
It is perfect hotel, more or less ir is like a small village. With teo big pool and perfect t design you can have everything here

The long transfer from the Airport might leave you worried about where you're going to end up. Don't!

This place was absolutely lovely, clean rooms, staff were helpful, grounds covered in greenery and water features. Went Half-Board+ which meant drinks with evening meal were included, make sure you get the right card when checking in for your first evening meal.

Best single piece of advice I can give is that although the checkouts are late at midday, look to make use of the Spa facilities (€18-20 pp) if you're staying later and want to use pools and showers rather than pay for a late checkout (~€80).
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review score on Google!

It is a pleasure to learn that you consider us to be an "absolutely lovely hotel" and we are glad that you were entirely satisfied with our attentive service and our wonderful grounds. Thank you as well for highlighting our cleanliness.

We are looking forward to receive you again.

Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: Had a great time at the cordial mogan playa lovely hotel. Food amazing and staff are so helpful and friendly .
Very quiet town and hotel, nice beach very nearby and the food and service are very good also.
Got on a bus to visit mogan Market thoroughly enjoyed the visit and got some great bargains to take home

Amazing resort with beautiful lobby area and botanical garden setting. The junior suite was a nice size with a superb balcony overlooking botanical gardens. Service was impeccable, over and above from all the staff. The only downside was the fireworks and loud music going on till 4am weekend nights wasn't exactly ideal with a young toddler. Would definitely return though.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Lee,

Thank you very much for your stay at our Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa. We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and were very satisfied with the offer and the installations of the hotel.
The fireworks and loud music were from the "Fiesta Del Carmen" that they were celebraiting in the port of Mogan. This is normally around the same time of the year every year.

We look forward to welcoming and pampering you again.

Kind regards,
Denise Meykel
Public relations
Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa

reviews.review_text: This Hotel is absolutely amazing. The rooms are really cozy, the food is awesome and the service is really friendly. We felt in love, especially with the whole facility and the botanical style. The whole package was so good that we book to years in a row 😁
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Dani El,

On behalf of all the team at Hotel Cordial Mogan Playa we would like to thank you for choosing us for your well-deserved holiday and for taking the time to share such a lovely review about your experience. We deeply appreciate it! 

We are pleased to know you had an amazing stay with us and that we were able to fulfill all your expectations. We loved to read that you "felt in love" with our hotel and we are thrilled to know that you have already booked your return! Wow, we will love to welcome you back again, hopefully soon.

Thank you so much, Dani.

Best regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: We have now stayed here twice, our second visit being in February 2023. It's a superb hotel in fabulous gardens that contains over 450 different species of trees, shrubs, flowers and cacti. Staff were excellent, and the choice of food in the main restaurant is remarkable. You can walk down through the gardens to a private gate which takes you into Puerto de Mogàn. We shall return!

Positives first: excellent location, 5 minutes walk from the lovely beach. Two large swimming pools, one more for kids, one quieter for adults. This year in February there were plenty of free sunbeds (last year in October they were actively moving towels that were put out before 9am). Very comfortable beds. Could do with a slightly firmer pillow. Good size room and wardrobe. Breakfast buffet good with plenty of staff. Love the grounds of the hotel - lots of trees, feels like an oasis.
Negatives: just for British visitors - only 2 English TV channels, BBC news and Sky. 20 German TV channels, so brilliant if you/your children are studying German at school. Tricky to get into the wifi if you have an iPhone - you have to go to a separate site - make sure you ask at the desk for detailed instructions/ring reception.

Loved loved this hotel. We went for half board plus. The “plus” being drinks with our meal. We swapped a lot of days dinner for lunch so we could go out in the evening . Plenty of things for our 10 year old to do during the day .  Evening entertainment is not for us but then we never like it anywhere we go so it’s no reflection on this hotel v others.  Hotel is very large with 2 pools and 2 different places to have your meals so stops it being same same every day.    Beautiful visual looking hotel including the grounds. Very well maintained. My only complaints ( so minor )  : tennis was expensive, information regarding the facilities at hotel not easy to find and the app didn’t work and the bowling needed to be open longer than 1hr 30 a day.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Andrea,

Thank you very much for having chosen our Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa and for having taken the time to share your experience on here. We are glad to learn that your overall experience was positive and that you enjoyed the pools, the restaurants and the awesome views. We are so happy to read that you "loved this hotel" and your 10 year old son was entertained throughout his stay!

Do not hesitate that we will take into account the suggestion you have stated here (information regarding the facilities at hotel and bowling schedule) to improve our services! Your satisfaction is crucial for us.

Thank you very much for rating our hotel with the highest grade and we hope to have the privilege to welcome you back again someday soon.

Kind Regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text:
As a four star hotel I have to give it full marks .
Staff are excellent its location must be up amongst the best in the canary Islands and its gardens are award winning
Perfect location for winter / early spring sun.

This is rather large hotel. In general the impression of the lounge is quite nice. Welcoming and check in was with champagne. Outdoor areas were tidy and clean. Plenty of flowers and plants. Found nice mantis from flowers. Nice pool area, which wasn't even full of "reserved" towels from elder people. :)

Hotel is a bit of mix of old and new. There are some activities offered, like bowling or spa and treatments. There was couple friendly hotel cats in hotel premises. Always nice bonus.

Hotel room was ok. Bit too cold during the nights, especially the floor which was tiled with ceramic tiling. We traveled during end of march, so coldness in the room was probably due to time of the year.

I would probably choose same hotel, if I would go again this area.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Roger,

Thank you very much for choosing us for your holidays and for taking the time to share a review about your experience with on Google.

We loved how you have detailed your experience and we are very proud of your good words about our outdoor areas.

We would love to welcome you again very soon at our Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa.

Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: It's worth every penny spent on our time here
Fabous gardens. Shame that you could not have warm or hot food on the buffet breakfast/dinner. Cooked food was tepid

Amazing Canarian hotel. Staff so helpful and food amazing. Dining area is spectacular, a great variety of food and breakfast is particularly good. Good size main pool too.
A 10 minute walk to the Marina, shops and restaurants along the bay which has plenty of sun beds
Everything you could want is here. Would definitely recommend so far.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Trina,

Thank you very much for having chosen our Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa and for having taken the time to share your experience on here. We are glad to learn that your overall experience was positive and that you enjoyed the food, the facilities and the attentive service of our team.

We look forward to your next visit.

Kind regards,
Denise Meykel
Public Relations
Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa

reviews.review_text:
Excellent hotel, service and food.
A great experience
Fabulous hotel and staff very helpful and always smiling.

This is not 4 star hotel but 5 star hotel for me. The service from the manager Alberto Jose was impeccable and responsive. The pool guy in family pool excellent, friendly, interactive and keeping everything well so friendly with the kids and parents making there stay great. The entertainment team excellent especially the Aqua aerobics guy he was so good with kids and had the pool rocking everyday. This is our first visit but not last we will be back and couldnt fault anything food service staff all fantastic the hotel really cares about its guest and rather than writing any bad reviews talk to them first they are so accomadating and will fix any issue. Excellent facilities here and 2 swimming pools to keep everyone happy so relaxing backed with 5 star service well done Hotel Cordial Mogan Pleyer Room 2304 enjoyed the perfect vacation in the perfect place
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Ben,

Thank you very much for your stay at our Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa. We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and the tranquility with us and were very satisfied with the offer and the installations of the hotel. Our clients satisfaction is our main goal. Thank you for the nice words about our hotel and staff.

We look forward to welcoming and pampering you again.

Kind regards,
Denise Meykel
Public relations
Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa

reviews.review_text:
In one word: wow!
Everything about this hotel is amazing. It is huge but not in an overwhelming way. Plenty of space around the pools and there's no shortage of sunbeds.
The food is on another level. The best a hotel could offer.  The entertainment is fab! The rooms are cleaned thoroughly every day.  There are lots of ramps in the hotel too which is handy for buggies.
The pools are so beautiful and there are always lifeguards around. The pool bar food choice is extensive and the vibe is so relaxed.
The spa is so relaxing and treatments amazing.
The location is so close to the beach and marina, and the walk is a pedestrian promenade which is excellent for families.
The service, what can I say except excellent?  The staff are always on hand and with a smile.                        I had an exam while on the trip, and the staff were all helpful especially Mr. Eduardo Martínez who was so accommodating and eased my nerves. The only thing I would change is next time, I would add HB as the food was so good and so varied with lots of vegetarian options and dietary info specified,  we ended up eating there a few nights rather than going out for dinner.
We are a family who travels a lot, and obsessed with this hotel, it just has it all and we will definitely be returning.
Absolutely love this hotel. Staff and service is faultless!
Small clean beach ⛱️ with possibilities of watter activities,  shopping and delicious food
Very posh. We got moved there after our flight was cancelled.

A lovely hotel with nice people working here and they do their best to help. But the hotel is ruined by the Shambles at evening meal. A few people are ruining the name of the hotel by not knowing how to organise the restaurant. Breakfast is great for myself as I have a suite here so a special breakfast restaurant. I have a bottle of red wine mostly every night. The price they charge is 21:40 euro. The same bottle in the super market is 6:50 euro. In my almost ten days here I have seen one other table having wine. Food they have is acceptable but I have known a lot better. As the days have gone by after writing my first things about this hotel I have come to the conclusion that the top brass does not know what is going on. My lady and I was put in a suite overlooking a house with six dogs. I have asked three times reception about these dogs barking. They tell me they have had many complaints and offered to change our room after seven days. We are not young and can't understand why this hotel would put us in these rooms knowing it would upset us. Why would they do this??? To late to change with all the packing etc. We got used to the dogs and like the suite so we will stay till the end...  But the shambles In the restaurant has not ended.  Tonight at Evening meal we saw a young couple 'who like us was given a table for their whole stay and like us was told to leave the table because some other people had booked it. SHAMBLES...... don't let all this put you off booking this hotel as it really is a lovely place if you are prepared to fight for what you want. We are still here and hope nothing else goes wrong . But  when you pay almost two thousand pounds for ten days like we did you should expect better.   Hope you all have better luck than we are having when you book this lovely in hotel.   Rick.         ...My second from Last night and getting ready to go down to the restaurant ..I feel sick and am worrying what will happen this evening as last night we were treated quite bad. I of course could be a coward and stay away and just go hungry. No I will go and take a chance.    Maybe get back on comments tomorrow.....wish me luck.
I've stayed at this hotel twice. It's in a great location. The staff are very friendly, rooms clean and there's a good selection of entertainment and great kids club.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Angela, 

Wow - thank you for taking the time to review us. It is so great to know that you enjoyed so much our services and facilities. Our aim is to impress each and every one of our guests, and we are delighted to see that we succeeded in your case. 

We hope to see you again soon.

Best regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text:
In our case it was very calm! Beautiful surroundings with amazing plants and greenery and birds. The pool was not working, which was only a benefit to us (contributing to all the silence).
Check in was a bit slow, but it’s usual for Spain. Got welcome drinks and could enjoy a strange interior of the lobby.
Food in the restaurant was great. Simple but good.
Nice stay!

A really lovely hotel, very clean and well situated a short stroll away from Mogan Playa. The staff were all friendly and there are two pools - with a quiet one for adults and a louder one for kids and families.

The Spa area is really lovely and they were very friendly and professional. There's a nice little walk attached to the hotel which takes you over a site of historic interest and gives you lovely views of the port.

This is great. REALLY friendly staff. Lovely pools. Quiet. No shortage of sun loungers. Good value. Hard to fault.
RECOMMENDED.!!

I am commenting on the spa only - my daughter and I had ayurvedic massages this afternoon and were fabulously looked after by Francis and another masseuse.....can't fault the exprience and a relax next to the spa pool afterwards was the cherry on the cake
Best location on the island. Both Michelin starred restaurant and buffet restaurant on site. ...and also 20 other excellent  restaurants around the sandy beach and marina.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Andrew,

Thank you very much for your nice words! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed so much your stay with us (at the best location on the island!). Hopefully you will come back soon to our Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa and our lovely town. 

Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: Lovely complex in a quiet area. Grounds and pools are awesome. Place is spotless. Rooms are big, well kept but a little dated. Have visited several times and will again. Highly recommended.
Very nice hotel. Friendly staff. One problem is that you can not get a place in the sun by the pool since many guests reserve the chairs and the staff do not seem to do anything about it.
We had a great week here. Rooms are spacious. Showers hot and strong. Service was great. They just need to have better directions to get around and more shade in all areas please!!

Went back after 7 years and still a wonderful vacation.

We stayed for 9 nights as a couple and the time was amazing.

Hotel is still in good shape, staff is friendly, the food is good for a buffet but there is also a fantastic Michelin star restaurant on the premise.

The mogan valley improved a lot in the past 7 years, now with many small restaurants and bars.
All-in-all very clean and comfortable place. On the downsides, wifi was irregular and some amenities could be updated. But pool and food and staff were top notch.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Filip,

We would like to thank you for choosing our Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa and for rating us with the highest score on Google! We are glad you had a great time with us and our pools, food and staff met and exceed your expectations. 

We will continue to work to improve the quality of our services and thank you for showing us the way forward. We hope to see you back soon.

Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: What a fabulous hotel, our holiday was fabulous from start to finish. Just cannot think of anything we did not like. We will certainly go back  to Cordial Mogan.

+ We absolutely loved this hotel for it's great location, beautiful garden, room and swimmingpool. We had a great time here and we would definitely come back!
-The food is nice, but we have had better in different 4 star hotels on the island. Please bring a little variety in the music at dinner and breakfast.

Great hotel.  Really relaxing.  Close to the port and loads of restaurants
Rooms clean
Staff very friendly
Will definitely go back again
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Ben,

From beginning to end your review was an absolute pleasure to read, so thank you for taking the time to post it. We are delighted to know that you enjoy your really relaxing stay here in Cordial Mogán Playa so much that you want to come back again in the future! We aim to create lasting memories for all guests so we are thrilled to read that this is being fulfilled for you.

We look forward to welcoming you back in a non-too-distant future!

Warm regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: Beautiful hotel tastefully upgraded during recent covid closure. Hotel grounds are immaculate and foliage diverse. Staff courteous and nice to see some faces from a few years ago. On the negative side food not of the same quality as before and mostly always luke warm.Finally entertainment in bar area below par. Still enjoying our stay and no doubt will return but probably on a bed and breakfast basis?

Great Place!! Very very clean. Very good selection of food, drinks and wines in the restaurant, we spent a week a week here and tried something else every day. Pools are very spacious and the hotel gardens are beautiful. Great location and very helpful and nice staff. We are definitely coming back!!

Fabulous hotel,the staff are wonderful, and the hotel is spacious with beautiful gardens, even though its a really big hotel it's is over a large area so never feels crowded ,breakfast buffet has everything you could want and the cocktails are some of the best I've tried
It has a great location just a short stroll to the harbour
I would definitely recommend it
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Marie,

Your words of praise towards our beautiful gardens, breakfast buffet, location and wonderful staff are a great boost of motivation for our entire team. Thank you so much for sharing your experience on Google.

We are glad to know that our cocktails are "some of the best you have tried". It gives us an immense pleasure to read through your comments and to know that you had such a pleasant and comfortable stay with us.

Thank you for your recommendation. We would love to receive you again at Hotel Cordial Mogan Playa.

Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: great hotel for kids. clean. good food. not many bars etc outside the hotel. good for relaxing holiday. loads of places to vist. local bus service brilliant and cheap
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Frank,

Thank you very much for having chosen our Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa and for having taken the time to share your experience on here. We are glad to learn that your overall experience was positive and that you enjoyed the food, the facilities (and how clean the hotel is) and the location.

We look forward to your next visit.

Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text:
This is our 4th stay here the hotel and food are fantastic. Staffing a little on the low side this visit, but that could’ve to do with the recent holiday celebrated here.

Some parts of the hotel are looking a little dated, but constantly see maintenance workers out putting things right and aiming to maintain high standards.

The hotel is spotless with such amazing work by all the staff from front of house, life guards, kitchen staff, chamber maids to the waiting staff. Everyone gives it their all.
Fantastic hotel, rooms great, staff brilliant and food so fresh and plentiful. Pools clean and lovely, all in all would give it more marks if possible
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Malcolm,

From the beginning to the end your review was an absolute pleasure to read, so thank you for taking the time to post it. We are delighted to know that you have thoroughly enjoyed your stay at Hotel Cordial Mogan Playa. We aim to create lasting memories for all guests so we are thrilled to read that this is being fulfilled for you.

It is a pleasure for us to read that it is a "fantastic hotel". Wow! We absolutely loved your words about the rooms, pools and food. We also appreciate your kind mention of our "brilliant staff”.

We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Best regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text:
It is simply beautiful, the staff is unbelievable friendly. Sanitizer dispensers all over the place, so there's no chance for covid. ;)

Very clean. Breakfast and dinner buffet: simply amazing. Loved the service. Beautiful garden, pretty pools.

You can even find cats here, they seem super friendly and are photogenic.

It is our first time in Gran Canaria. The hotel was recommended to us by our travel agency of our trust. It's only the second day here but we already love it. The hotel is very clean and the staff very friendly. The hotel complex is extensive and you don't get the feeling that it is overcrowded. My husband and I already agree that we will come back.

Lovely family friendly hotel.
We are one adult and 3 children 12 to 14, so the entertainment did cater for them, only for younger children up to 10.
Fantastic food, great location. Rooms lovely size however no air con, 2 large fans which can be loud whilst sleeping but you can get use to it.
Reception help was helpful enough however the reps within did not recommend good trips, as they seemed to not be sure what was on offer and what was now not being run?? was just as easy to search yourself.
But overall a lovely hotel and would recommend to anyone.

Spent 2 weeks here for our honeymoon and ir was lovely. The room we were allocated on arrival wasn't suitable but they changed us to a much better room. We had a huge balcony and meant we could sunbathe and relax really well. It was so hot though but cooling down was easy with a shower on the balcony. Would recommend this hotel and area to anyone. Enjoy!

If you love a modern, elegant style hotel it is not for you. But if you looking for a place with warmth and charm you are at the right place. The rooms are good sized and if you have kids you have to book with a terrace. The extra space and greenery compared to the balkon option is really worth it. The pools are great and service is friendly.
Beach is a short walk but as the property has two pools you don't need to go. The property is having amazing gardens.
Great place. Clean, tidy and friendly. Kids have loved it

Really nice hotel, nice views from interior and exterior, beautiful gardens and heated pools. The stuff is friendly, breakfirst and dinner are really great quality and you can enjoy some gourmet :) Rooms are clean and romantic (cheaper rooms might be a bit old). There are also elevators, parking garage, hiking trail, small fountains, bars.

Highly recommend this hotel for families, nice pools and kids play area. Staff very friendly and rooms clean and comfy.
Perfect location close to town centre and beach.

What a fabulous hotel, very friendly staff. Amazing gardens with exotic plants. Two huge pools with easy access and loads of comfortable sunbeds. Food choices were excellent, overall this hotel has everything you possible need. Highly recommend. Loved every minute of our stay.
