Our 2nd stay at this hotel and one of the best that we have stayed.
Half board basis and the food plus service was excellent.
The only one negative was the cost of drinks.

What a beautiful resort. Botanical gardens, two large swimming pools & Jacuzes , tennis court, indoor bowling ally, Gym, Bike hire, scuba diving lessons,  beautiful Spa with a selection or treatments.
The resort was so clean and the staff were very friendly and helpful.
The breafast buffet had a large selection, the pool side bar and restaurant was similar.
The buffet for Dinner had a large selection and there was also a Michelin restaurant if you wanted to exerience some fine dinning.
The room we had was on the third floor and had a balcony with a beautiful view of the pool, gardens and the sea.
The room was a junior suit very clean, comfy bed, nice on suit bathroom, Aircon, tv, mini fridge, ect.
Everyday there is Auqa aerobics, in the larger of the two pools. Its a bit of fun
In the evening there is a different cabaret act on each night.
I like like to give a special mention to Ruth on the front desk who was so nice and helpful to us always so polite and professional.
Thank you Cordial hotal Playa de Mogan for making our holiday so enjoyable we will be back.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Fran Lan,
Thank you for staying with Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa on your recent holidays on Gran Canaria and for taking the time to write a review on Google.
First of all, we would like to thank you for your lovely words and plenty of information about the hotel facilities and unique experience. We are pleased that you enjoyed our fantastic pools. jacuzzis, tennis court, Bowling, Los Guayres Michelin Star Restaurant, Gym and more facilities. We do our best to accomplish our guests expectations.
We work with our heart every day to make unforgettable experiences to our guests like the one you describe.  We would love to welcome you back and feel again the Cordial Experience.
Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts.

reviews.review_text:
Staff is very kind.
Hotel and rooms are super clean and ultra confortable.
Buffet's food is remarkable. Fabulous breakfast and dinner.
The Spa is perfecttly well kept.
Huge pool with confortable sun chairs.
Location is perfect, right near and walking distance from charming Mogan village and port.
Go for it !

Really enjoyed out stay recently and would definitely recommend. The breakfast and dinner were fantastic with some really superb chefs on morning eggs and evening meat duty. The cocktail list was also great and well worth making your way through. If you stick around after dinner as well there's usually some interesting entertainment tapping in the downstairs bar. I'd also like to mention that I loved the built-in caves with the waterfall inside.

I visited the Spa at the hotel, what a wonderful place! Absolute luxury and covid safe! A lot for your money. Would highly recommend this spa. Robes, slippers, chocolates, fruit, water etc all part of the small entry fee.

Just got back from 2 weeks at the Cordial great hotel very friendly staff all in smart uniform. Food excellent plenty of choice,2 sittings for the evening buffet we changed from the later sitting to the early sitting no problem suited us better. Good location for Port Mogan stunning harbour setting. Rooms excellent and well equipped.
One slight grumble although the bar downstairs was open till 1pm the reception bar which was magnificent and was only open 5 till 11 could do with opening till 12 minimum. The downstairs bar was more for the entertainment. Best hotel we have stopped in.

We actually stayed at Cordial Morgan Valle which was okay but we only stayed there one night due to a cancelled flight.  The room was way up the top of the complex meaning we had to get THREE lifts to the room.  There is no air-conditioning just ceiling fans which, in October, is bearable but in the summer must be unbearable! Difficult to say more but it looked a rambling place which could possibly be good value.

Excellent hotel with beautiful accommodation and great staff. Wonderful breakfast with a choice to suit everyone. The pools can get busy still pleasent. The health spa is a joy and worth the visit. Really enjoyed our 10 night stay.

This is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in. The food is excellent,  buffet style evening meal with booking at 6:00 or 8:15pm. The grounds are superb with lots of beautiful plants and 2 swimming pools.

Beautiful botanical gardens. Slightly surreal evening entertainment and dining times are quite regimented. But lovely pool, excellent food and wine. Rooms and entire hotel managed to a really high standard. Bike and diving centre too. Can basically manage your entire stay with no stress at all.
Rooms are slightly dated. Clean and well maintained, though.

Lovely place, very good value, good food and very local to Morgan 10min walk all flat and no traffic. We staying in July was very warm but not excessive. Facilities are really good and the food very reasonably priced
Cannot go wrong in this place. Fantastic facilities for all. Been here three times and will probably be back.

Fantastic hotel, extremely helpful staff, great rooms and delicious food. The gardens and pool area are stunning and the bathroom has the best hair dryer I have ever used in any hotel so no need to bring your own. I couldn't recommend this hotel highly enough and will definitely be back.

Great hotel, great facilities, very comfy beds, great staff.
Peaceful and tranquil location,  our second visit , temps @ 24  degrees,  pleasant evenings , no coats required.
R.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Mr Eyles,
Thank you very much for having chosen the Hotel Cordial Mogán playa and for having taken the time to share your experience on Tripadvisor. We are glad to learn that your overall experience was positive and that you enjoyed the food, the facilities , the beds and the attentive service of our team.
Best Regards,
Ruth Monzón
Public Relations
Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa

reviews.review_text:
Room interior is outdated with quite a lot of wear and tear.
Breakfast is quite nice, though the staff could show more attention to guests.
The hotel WiFi is a joke, using 4G is a lot faster and reliable.
There's a quite hefty fee for access to the safe in your room, which is ridiculous.
Pool areas are nice, with lovely surroundings and plenty of sunbeds.
Cocktails in the hotel bars are terrible and not even close to international standards...with the exception being their great selection of gin & tonics.

Will probably never stay here again, but would recommend the hotel to anyone who's not gotten accustomed to five star resorts.

Absolutely fantastic location and accommodation. Suited us (a family of three) perfectly. Brilliant for children. There's so much for them to do. Food is great and overall excellent value for money. The staff were very friendly and helpful. They made my husband's big birthday really special. Would go back in a heartbeat.
Have stayed here 3 times. Great for couples and families. Totally recommend it. Staff wonderful.
Beautiful garden with a lot of rare plants next to the two pools, great breakfast with a great variety, perfekt location only 5 minutes to the beach and harbor
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Maria,

It is a great pleasure to read your feedback and see that we provided you with an exceptional hotel experience on your recent stay with us. Our aim is to impress each and every one of our guests and we are happy to know that we succeeded in your case.

We are more than happy to learn that your experience was memorable and that you found our gardens, our pool area and our breakfast absolutely great. We hope to have the privilege to welcome you back again someday soon.

Best regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text:
Beautifull plants and very big rooms. Staff is kind. A lot of old people. They were complaining about water on their hair... so childish. It is a pool so hair can be wet!  The solution of the hotel was not playing with balls and other things?? Very strange. So the hotel is not  child friendly...

For the rest we had an amazing time!

Had a weeks holiday here and from the warm greeting (accompanied with a glass of bubbly) and during our stay the staff were amazing, friendly, helpful etc.
The rooms are kept spotless at all times (only criticism was the shower-just had better at other hotels)
The breakfast and evening meals were plentiful and to a good standard.
It's probably fair to say that most of the guests are of more "mature" years and the entertainment ended around 10pm.
If your looking for peace and quite in good surroundings then look no further, the pretty port area is a short walk and has some good bars overlooking the sea.
Reccomend for sure.

Overall a solid hotel. We spent a weekend here to celebrate a family birthday. Here are our thoughts:

Positives
- overall hotel is finished to a high quality - it feels well updated and well taken care of - not tired like many resorts where the reality can be very different from the photos
- food is generally good quality, especially for a buffet. Breakfast buffet was particularly good.
- lots of amenities including several pools, several restaurants and bars, gym, tennis, and kids club
- although quite expensive to stay here, stuff is quite well priced once you are here eg around 5-6 euros for a cocktail
- the bar in the main lobby has a fun G&T menu
- we appreciated pretty balanced mix of families with young kids and more elderly couples

Things to be aware of
- grounds a very large so you end up walking a lot
- there are no views of the sea from the hotel, but from the main pool you can be downtown with a 5-10 mins walk
- WiFi is pretty bad - hard to get a connection and even when you do, the speed is slow (less than 1MB/S)
-Beds are quite uncomfortable in the family suites. Two single beds put together and very very noisy (plastic cover around bed) and creaky when you move
Great place. Great staff. Don't think there are enough pools to serve the whole place but all in all, not a bad place.
Been here 4 times, love coming, great family hotel. Is a little dated but is being renovated. Staff are lovely.
Good quality nice staff and good shops, restaurants and beach near to the hotel or apartments.i recommend to come here

First time staying in Mogán and in this magnificent hotel. The hotel itself is beautifully layed out and the trees and plants throughout are superb . The superior room we booked was wonderful and had a huge balcony we could sunbathe on if required as it had the sun all day . The pool areas and bars very expansive and friendly . As you can be allocated a particular table for dining and at a specific time there was no need to be rushing down to dinner looking for a table . Mogán is itself a pretty little town , quiet but very picturesque and has a lovely beach surrounded by nice bars and restaurants. All the staff at the hotel  were extremely helpful and courteous and managers would be on site daily to ensure all was going well and are very approachable if you needed to raise anything - which would be doubtful considering how well run this hotel is .

Just back from our third visit. Excellent experience, friendly and really helpful staff. The appartments are spacious, really well equipped and well maintained. We would not think of going anywhere else. Value for money,excellent location and guaranteed a pleasant stay.

Wonderful hotel. Great food. Great service.
Disguired any negative blogs. I've stayed in the best London has to offer and it does not stand up to this. So many good things:
The variety of tropical plants alone makes this place worth a visit. I can just say:  Highly recommended *****
Still a lovely place for families. Friendly staff. Stayed in Juli under Corona Conditions, of course different but we had a great time!!! Hope to see you again!!!
Fantastic hotel Fantastic staff,food outstanding
Good value for money. Great facilities, friendly staff, excellent supermarket just 50m away.  Great choice of restaurants and shops nearby.
Friendly helpful staff. Great facilities good location. Ideal for families and singles alike.

Excellent hotel. Pleasant green surroundings and pool area. Kind and professional staff. We asked for a change of room, and had it the day after. Good service all over. Wouldn't mind going there again. ;-)
Stunning main reception architecture. Superb beautifully run resort hotel with a green ethos, employing local people. Great food choices. Punches well above its weight and many people return.

I'm don't write reviews normally, but I just had to write one for the Cordial Mogan Playa. I just came back from a week there and it was absolutely perfect.
The food is delicious and fresh. Great buffets. Staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms are spacious and tidy.
The area and pools are kept spotless. There is not a leaf on the floor.
Special thanks to Leo, Stephy and Angelina from the Entertainment staff from Jasmijn. :D

4 and a half star I give it.. Lovely Hotel, Big Rooms and Spotless. Great Pools and Lots of Sun Beds. Breakfast Was Nice and Plenty of It. Dinner We Had a Few Times, Same Food Most Nights. Nice To Go Out and Try The Local Restaurants...

Fabulous place for families. Splash area and pools excellent. Play areas and clubs great. Mini disco a hit. Beach very close. Apartments well equipped but after 6 yrs there we would welcome refurbishment.

Third time here and the service, helpful staff and beautiful grounds are again excellent. We were celebrating our 50th wedding anniversary - Thank You Cordial Mogan for making it special, your gifts were much appreciated.
We brought our family with us this time and the Grandchildren loved every minute.
Wonderful relaxing environment. Rooms have a very high spec. Sunshine and warmth in November. Great swimming pools and an excellent choice of food. Would definitely stay again.

Lovely hotel with beautifully maintained grounds. Food and cocktails excellent (and affordable) and pleasant staff at all times. All areas were immaculately clean. Lovely relaxing atmosphere but kids were also well looked after. 10 minute walk to very pretty harbour.

Reasons why not a 5 star:

- Rooms very very noisy, neighbours/maids seemed to be dragging furniture around for hours every morning. Lie in was impossibie. Bed was way to hard for me and had a sore neck and bad throughout the stay
- No decent outside areas for eating/drinking in the evening. I like a nice views and you're lower than ground level so its not possible.
- Cost for safe is a bit steep and wifi is rubbush
- Rarely tongs for the bead at meal times?
- Now my biggest bug bear - the smell. Mogan STINKS. Of sewage. Especially in the evenings and sometimes our room smelt foul but actually never from the bathroom drains (?). It seems something happens at night that makes the resort unbearably smelly. Did it ruin my stay? Probably yes. I believe this is the fault of the new radisson hotel which is a huge shame for the cordial.
- cat poo around the pool areas stank as well. (Note to the incredibly rude german family who thought it would be acceptable to throw it next to our beds) Such a shame as the hotel has set up designated cat areas to keep them away from guests/happy which is great.
- lots of sunbed reserving and we found it difficult to find beds in the sun.

Overall a great stay and would definitely return if the sewage issue is rectified in the resort.
Excellent hotel.short walk from the beach, a good variety of food to suit most tastes. A tropical oasis.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear John,

Thank you for taking the time to post such a positive review. We are so happy that you decided to stay with us and we loved to hear that you enjoyed all our facilities and services (especially "the good variety of food"!

It is a pleasure to read your words "excellent hotel" "a tropical oasis" Wow! Thank you so much.

You will always be welcome in our Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa.

Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: Great staff and position in this wonderful resort. Kitchens and bathrooms in desperate need of attention! Will happily stay here again but hoping that there's some modernisation planned.

This hotel is wonderful, i cannot fault it. 3 pools and 2 bars and there is always entertainment on. The rooms are lovely and the balcony area is huge with a table and 4 chairs 2 sun loungers and an outside shower facility.
Great apartment complex. First time here however I stayed across the road in the radisson last year. Service here is 10 times better. So friendly. Will definitely be back

Came as a couple... Beautiful hotel. Stayed here for 1 week.
Very friendly & helpful staff, amazing food, grand facilities, lots for kids to do... Planning on returning next year with our toddler - best hotel I've ever stayed in
Very lovely surroundings and clean staff friendly nothing is a problem The food is very good.
Great hotel. Friendly staff, enjoyed my week's stay.

Great staff, very accommodating and attentive. Rooms are excellent and spacious, along with the balcony that also has a shower for cooling off.
Always brilliant to come back
Great for a family holiday. Our apartment was recently refurbished with new bathroom and beds. Kids club was great and the place was clean. Loved it, will be back again next year!
A really nice hotel with great staff that always try to help out with all that they can. Can't complain about the breakfast and dinner itheir.
Lovely place to stay.  Loved the Infinity pool. Lovely sunbathing areas. Close to a lot of bars and restaurants.

The bedsheets had waste and a little urine on them.  Everything else was great. I particularly liked the elevator that goes down straight to the beach. There was a pool but many people would think the beach is better.

Have a nice day.
Gorgeous apartments with superb facilities.  Fantastic location. Nothing to fault.
Lovely hotel. Super location, friendly staff, clean spacious room with a massive balcony. Excellent.
A little bit of Paradise if you like,quiet peaceful surroundings and quality comfortable rooms with picturesque gardens and inviting pools. Great food and helpful staff. Our 3rd visit says it all!

I would give it more but there is not a working fridge in the room!  They inform me that it is a cooler box ! Plugged into the socket in the wall that gives off heat into the room but is not cold inside the unit!  I other than that it is quite a nice place to stay!  The distant drone of a hammer drill!  This is overpowered by the noise of children playing in the nearby school!  The food is excellent and having a dairy 'milk' allergy they have guided me towards the foods that I can have!  The staff are constantly going that extra mile to ensure that your stay is one to remember, also the next time that you return you can attain a type of club card that gets you ten percent Off the next time that you return and it appears that there are more of these hotels in the same franchise so you can benefit when going to the other hotels as well ! lots of things to do on site also! Someone talked to me yesterday and stated that this is their fourth year here and do not think that they have seen everything yet as there is so much to do!
Great staff, modern facilites, couldn't be cleaner. Only downside is the place structure, having to use many elevators to get anywhere. Recomendable for families and those looking for a quiet place

A genuine restful summer holidays experience. All the personnel is very caring and makes every effort to make your holidays a unique experience in this beautiful and well maintained hotel. Also the value for money of this hotel is absolutely unbeatable.

Been three times for Christmas, the first two times would have been 5 star, third visit was slightly marred by too many badly behaved young people and a slight reduction in over all service. Peace and quiet was still to be found, accommodation excellent and food very good.
We have stayed three times and will be back later this year.great hotel,great location and lovely staff.brilliant for kids
Amazing place to stay. Everything you could need for a perfect holiday

Our third visit and we cannot wait to go back. Wonderful customer service with no request too much trouble. Our apartment was spotless and maintained throughout our stay, and was more comfortable this year than previously. We asked for an apartment offering great views and we were not disappointed. Thank you to one and all concerned for making us so welcome.
We love this place! Simply the best sun holiday hotel we have stayed in. Great staff, food and facilities.  Enough said.

Disappointing stay.we tried a few hotels in Gran Canaria and this was the most expensive and the worst . The dining situation where you can’t eat at 7 30 but only at the sittings they say which were 6 pm or 8 .30 pm put us right off! The bar was totally dead no atmosphere and drinks really expensive! Would not recommend

This hotel is so marvellous! I love it!☺ It is very clean. The pools are great and the Spa and the Gym, too. I also love the good meal and the spectacular evening-show.💋
The program by the pool is realy good and makes the day funnier!
I enjoyed this holiday so much!
I love it and I hope you love it, too!
💋💋

Everything is pretty good. The staff are really helpful and friendly. The hotel facilities are great. And the area itself is very nice, not as touristy as other areas on the island. The one let down is the wi-fi which struggles to stay connected for more than a minute or so.
A decent hotel, with excellent pool areas and great location. My biggest complaint was that the rooms were quite chilly during our visit (winter) as there was no heating or air conditioning.

Excellent apartments.The staff are friendly and efficient from front of house right through to maintenance. The apartments are spotless clean and great value for what you pay couldn't fault anything about these apartments would definitely recommend

Very nice stay the apartments are very clean with amazing balcony very large well equipped and private the quiet pool is exellent we stayed there for a week at the beginning of June and will be back in September
Best Hotel on the island.  Great facilities   great breakfast and Porta Morgan is wonderful
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Clive Morris, 

We have no words to express how wonderful it is to be called "the best Hotel on the island". So a big THANK YOU for that.

We can't wait to welcome you again!

Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: Excellent accommodation, fab location. Can't praise the staff highly enough.
Just love going back to this place... quality and such a nice atmosphere. One or two members of staff could be a touch more friendly however doesn't take away from your stay here
It was just fabulous.  We have been many times before & with the improvements that have been made it is even better than before even though not necessary.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Julie,

We are thrilled to know that your stay with us has been excellent and that you have been able to relax and enjoy our facilities and improvements.

We are looking forward to welcoming you again very soon!

Kind regards,
Denise Meykel
Public Relations
Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa

reviews.review_text: Lovely week there. Friendly staff, clean room and surroundings.

Clean, great rooms. Gorgeous balcony. We had a superior room with AC and it was fantastic. Good buffet for breakfast and tea with a range of food. Always a good kids option too- pasta, hot dogs, burgers, chips etc. Good mini disco and various evening entertainment. Small soft play area near the bar. 10 min walk to the beach (with kids) and a brilliant splash park and 3 pools to choose from. A supermarket 1 minute away (Superdino) straight across from hotel. Would highly recommend for families with children.
Hotel and pool looks really nice, I am not sure about rooms and food, but from I have heard off they are good. Currently I am staying in Puerto de Mogan apartments.

Nice location at the southwest of Gran Canaria near to the beautiful dock of Mogan. Cosy, clean and quiet double room with a large balcony and great views. The food was not excellent but good enough. There are two large pools with a lot of "amacas" surround them. We enjoyed the perfect weather of the island in this hotel, for sure we will repeat.
Great hotel with lots of greenery, very spacious, fits well into the landscape, culture and sports all on site.
amazing hotel in amazing little town. 3rd year in a row and still love as much.

Excellent hotel, grounds are kept amaclate and clean, surrounding gardens are beautiful kept, food is excellent with plenty of choice with themed nights and freshly cooked meats and fish, staff are pleasant friendly and helpful, would highly recommend this hotel. Surrounding area and harbour are beautiful

Nice hotel we enjoyed especially when we visit Delphinus Diving School and we booked with them scuba diving and snorkeling in puerto Mogan and on another day my wife with me went on the night dive in house reef.
Amazing holiday and highly recommended

Thank you

Sadly not as good as it has been over the years. The food was particularly disappointing this year. A lot less choice and very bland and quite frankly boring.
The apartments have been improved with lovely new bathrooms and comfy beds
The entertainment is dire
I think this place can get up to 4 stars with a little effort but management very set in old ways at the moment

Absolutely loved it, great for the whole family.
My only problem was that the bathroom doors are weird (ours broke but they fixed it fairly quickly) you can still see in when the door is shut.
A well run apartment-hotel. Friendly, multi-lingual staff. Stayed for the 3rd time and will be back. The only minus was the dinner buffet. Chaos reigned plus the food was not of great standard.

Stayed here twice over the past few years, always clean, nice staff and the choice of pools means we found a decent quite spot to relax. Walking distance to the port which is a huge plus. Have recommended to family and friends!

Nice big rooms with wonderful huge terraces. Hotel could do with better information regarding activities and services. Food and service at their own restaurant is poor but great food is only a short walk away at the many restaurants near the harbour. Heated pool is very nice but the splash world is pretty dull. Kids club and mini disco was good with great staff.

Wonderful food and service. Good, well equipped rooms. Amazing calm grounds which are beautifully planted.

A well planned hotel with quick access to the beach and shops near by.

Nice reception staff
Kind cleaners
Nice pools
Good apartments
I would say the lifts are a bummer but only flaw rest amazing
Lovely apartments, really family friendly, a short stroll to the beach and restaurants, supermarket across the road, would highly recommend

Lovely hotel.
Staff friendly.
Would recommend.

This is our 6th visit and it has been as good as ever, I think that says it all!!! We had one small problem with housekeeping and it was immediately put right after we contacted reception. We are now booking our holiday for next year.

Good clean friendly and professional resort. Get a parasol early as these are limited and many others decided they would have 2 for their family which was selfish and unfair.
Splash park is great for little ones and pools were busy.
Food was good and a decent selection but there is a cheap supermarket just outside with many cafes and restaurants outside on the way to the beach only negative the town small, quite but recommend going to explore the island as beautiful and clean.

Friendly staff, car parking, wifi,nice rooms, good breakfast and dinner sitting outside, two pool areas, pool towels , supermarket close to hotel, sand beach only five minutes walk, bar with live music, good access to gc-1 motorway hotel area is like a park with lots of palms trees and plants
At all we were very satisfied

It's a magical place. With great service and very nice personnel (say hi to Lorena (female version of Speedy Gonzales) at "Tamarona" restaurant 😉). Beautiful gardens..almost like a fata morgana. An oasis of peace an tranquility. It's a nice stay for couples and people with children. There are lots of activities for children. Food is fantastic! If you're vegetarian or meat lover. Breakfast and buffet at "Tamarona" main buffet restaurant is great. Lots to see and taste. There are little information boards at each dish giving you the information you want to know when you are intolerant for fish, milk, nuts or gluten. Also there is a great menu at à la carte restaurant "Los Guayres". And if you want a nice cocktail "Fataga Discobar" is the place to be! The location of hotel Cordial Mogán is great. It's a 7 minutes walk to playa de Mogán and a 3 minutes walk to the shopping mall (small but everything you need is there to find). Just follow the boulevard. A place definitely to recommend and I am coming back to this magical place!

Fabulous reception with very friendly welcoming staff - plus free glass of bubbly or juice on check in. Spacious rooms cleaned and fresh towels 5 out of 7 days. Pools and surrounding gardens beautiful. Child friendly only thing needs looking at is putting safety lock or chain on exterior room doors as children can open them easily.  Just a few minutes walk to beach, shops, restaurants.. Perfect family holiday.
Very helpful staff. Great facilities. Lovely rooms.
Beautiful area not to be missed

I have stayed in many hotels around the world - this is one of my favourite hotels.

This was our third stay at beautiful Hotel Cordial Mogan Playa – and I am sure that we will be back again next year.

The hotel is perfectly located next to the pedestrian walkway that runs into the charming little village, just about 10 minutes walk to the promenade.

This time we had a standard double room on the third floor (no 7321) with beautiful sea views and afternoon sun at the balcony (see my attached photos). The room was well equipped and comfortable. In the main bedroom there was a mini fridge, tea and coffee making facilities, a 32-inch TV, two comfy chairs, a table and desk. The wardrobe was a good size, and the bed was very comfortable. The bathroom was a good size and had a shower over the bath.

The hotel is always kept spotless both in rooms and the public areas. A huge congratulation to the whole housekeeping team!

I notice that some reviewers mention that there is a problem with reserving sun beds by the pool early in the morning. We had no problem getting a perfectly located sunbed after breakfast around 11 AM. For us there was no need to get up early to reserve a sunbed with the beach towel.

The wifi was fragile – We never did manage to get it to work.

In summary, Hotel Cordial Mogan Playa a very well-run resort offering a high standard of quality and service. We loved every moment of our stay and would highly recommend this place.

Regards
Svein-Magne Tunli from Bergen, Norway.

--------------------
Review from 1018:
My favourite hotel at Gran Canary!

This was the second time my wife and I are visiting this amazing hotel in beautiful Puerto De Mogan!  Cordial Mogan Playa is first of all a very beautiful resort (see my attached photos and you will understand) and we experienced this time a very high level of service from all of the staff.

Our room (no 7218) was very spacious and offered nice views and afternoon sun at the balcony. The room has also a spacious bathroom.

Breakfast was excellent with a large choice of cereals, continental meats and cheeses and cooked eggs and meats, though a little busy if you arrive later than about 08:30 in the morning.

Last time (March 16) the wifi at the hotel was something of a hit and miss affair. This time there was no problem with the connection at all but the capacity in the afternoon can be a little slow.

In summary, Cordial Mogan Playa is a very well run resort offering a very high standard of quality and service. I gave it 4 “stars” in my last review. This time it will be 5 stars!

Highly recommended. We will be back!

Regards Svein-Magne Tunli from Bergen, Norway.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Svein-Magne Tunli,

First of all, thank you for choosing our Hotel Cordial Mogan Playa as your holiday destination and for taking the time to share your kind and detailed comments with our Google readers.

It is a real pleasure for us to read that we are your favourite hotel in Gran Canaria! Thank you so much, we wholeheartedly appreciate your lovely review and the fact that you are returning for the third time! We really appreciate your words for bestowing us with your generous compliments in respect to our rooms, location, breakfast and service. Furthermore, your comments about our housekeeping staff who make the difference is highly appreciated and a great motivation for the team!

Thank you for recommending us, we loved that you enjoyed so much every moment of your stay. We would love to receive you back again next year, we cannot wait to see your wife and you again!

Regards from sunny Mogán,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: We r coming again soon on our 3rd visit !I love puerto mogan and love this hotel  it's got everything u could need  !The gardens and plants are gorgeous !Staff always friendly and helpful !Food lovely ,cooking and feeding area really clean considering how many people pass through in a day ! Just so excited to come back Gran canaria my favorite place and a favorite hotel !!
expected more for the price,.rooms pretty basic but hotel staff friendly.

In an odd surrounding - By which I mean it seems to be in a up and coming area, but couldn't be certain if it was up and coming or just started and given up on... Not a problem though, the surroundings are fine, clean and a 10 minute walk gets you to the pretty harbor where there's a beach and nice restaurants and bars.

Our 6th visit, and every year seems to get better, we have always had our apartment in the area requested. The rooms are well maintained, clean and a lovely big balcony with good views. The staff are very attentive, pleasant and professional. We shall return hopefully next year.
Great family hotel where you can choose from room only to full board.  Great animation team for the kids with Gaby & Mr Tiger!
Absolutely fantastic hotel. Kid friendly and good location
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Matti, 

We are pleased to know you had a delightful stay in our "absolutely fantastic" Hotel Cordial Mogan Playa and that we were able to fulfill all your expectations. We strive in having a great ambiance to satisfy all the needs of our valued guests, so we are delighted to read you enjoyed your stay with us.

We are looking forward to welcoming you again very soon.

Kind regards,
Departamento de Operaciones beCordial Hotels & Resorts

reviews.review_text: Beautiful Hotel with charme. Very professional and friendly staff. Spacious and clean rooms and a fantastic garden. Great choice of food.
Fantastic place you really need to try it visited here for the last 12 years in May
Lovely large apartments, pleasant staff. Big supermarket just outside the front entrance, a pleasant 7 or 8 minute walk down the pedestrian area to the shops, beach, bars and restaurants.

Apartment extremely comfortable and quite well appointed. Appreciated the Air conditioning and the spacious balcony a boon. Maintenance of all parts very good and all staff very helpful and friendly. Kitchen facilities were more than adequate for preparing own breakfast and occasionally lunch. Lovely to take these out on balcony too.
Great apartments, some do look a bit tired, but good pools with great balcony, sitting room and bedrooms.

Best Hotel in Puerto de Mogan. I really love the botanic garden style and the interior.
Also very nice and friendly staff
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Lars Sörderström,

We would like thank you so much for your rating on Google on Google about Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa.
Kind Regards,

reviews.review_text: Lovely size one bedroom apartment clean  and comfortable .. huge veranda with your own sun loungers so if your not pool people but still like the sun with peace and quiet then it's ideal  .. only down side is the lack of airconditioning in the standard rooms but we leave the ceiling fans on constantly and pull the shades down on the verander to keep the sun off the windows and the rooms have stayed quite cool
Cracking hotel. Interesting architecture and lush gardens. Clean and tidy. Staff are attentive but not pushy. Huge choice of good quality food on offer at breakfast and dinner.
It's great apartments nice cleaned 5 times a week.  AS mogan the place not for me .

Everything is good.If you have any problems with the room,just tell reception and it is normally dealt with that day. All the staff are courteous and welcoming.  A very generous Appartmens size with large balconies. Joan and Ron have been staying here for holidays for the last 9 years and we wouldn't do that if we hadn't fallen in love with the place.
The rooms are clean, but feels very outdated. Needs a little renovation. The pool and the rest is great!

Spent many times in this hotel before moving permanent to puerto de mogan
Breakfast and evening meals are buffet selection  but WOW!!!!
What a selection of fine cuisine
Amazing hotel, food was excellent as was the service. Fantastic relaxing family holiday in a lovely resort. Definitely going back.

Really great place till now,lovely location, lots of greenery, great place for germans, since the receptionist is German also...great facilities, good staff and really clean and lookind quite new...The breakfast was also good with lots of options and fresh.. Suitable for families and kids also..
Lovely relaxing holiday, large clean apartments with big balconies and the staff are really nice and friendly. Puerto mogan is also a nice place to visit. Great for families

This is a very nice hotel. Our bathroom has a VIEW! We also have a balcony we can sit on.  There are TWO pools AND an all you can eat buffet breakfast is included.  We are walking distance to the beach. There is a large shopping mall just steps away. Easy transportation to trains or taxis in minutes. They are currently renovating parts of the hotel but it does not interfere with our stay. Lovely place to stay.

Fun rooftop swimming. Great breakfast buffet. The room was very nice and great view from our 26th floor sea view room and the elevator of the city. The restaurant was fantastic too. My sea food dish was really wonderful.

We stayed for 8 nights. Overall, not worth the amount that was paid per night. In the room, half the electrical outlets didn’t work - we had to change rooms at one point, and had to pay extra for this. No coffee or tea in the room, anything you want you basically have to pay extra. We had to pay extra to take a towel to the beach. The elevator works inconsistently at times having to walk down the stairs from the 20th floor. The pool upstairs is disappointing - not as big as it looks like in the pictures. The gym is barely a gym, hardly any equipment. The one positive is that the front desk staff of the hotel are pretty nice and at least tried to address our concerns. There were 1 or 2 individuals that were extremely rude. The location is also descent because it’s near the subway and near the beach.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Anna,
Thank you very much for having taken your time to make us aware of your concerns. Your comments help us to evaluate and improve the experiences of our guests.
We're sorry to hear that your experience with us did not live up to your expectations.
We appreciate your comments regarding your stay, and we'll use your feedback to make improvements where necessary.
First of all I would like to let you know that all photos published are updated and not retouched, so what you see is exactly what we have. 
Our fitness room has various cardio machines as well as free weights and a multifunctional machine, all with daylight and great views. The beach promenade offers an ideal place for jogging and biking. In case you look for a better equipped gym, our reception staff is always happy to help.
All our rooms have a minibar that is free and that our team restocke every day. There is no coffee facilities in room, but you can take a coffee, tea, or whatever you prefer in our bar or even order it to our room service.
We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future to provide you with a better experience.
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: We came for a three night break with our young family. The hotel was perfect for us, it had a small pool and a bar, perfect for the kids to cool off in the mid day. The rooms were large and comfortable. The breakfast was good and if you stay for dinner it was excellent. 5 minutes walk to the beach, close to a metro station for easy travelling to the city. The staff were excellent and a special mention to Tupee who was our waitress at the pool bar and she was truly delightful. Highly recommend.

We had a very big room with a view of the sea. The sound isolation is good and the hygiene is impeccable. We also received a nice gift bag with a toothbrush, mini toothpaste, and a comb. The staff is very friendly. Both pools are clean (you get free clean towels, which is a nice touch) and the gym features new and good quality equipment.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Anna,
I am very happy to see that you have enjoyed your stay with us and that we were a great asset to your experience of Barcelona.
I hope we can welcome you back again in the future for another wonderful time!
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Great hotel, good location only 5mins walk to the metro, 10 mins walk to a beach. Slightly out of town, but this gives you peace and quiet at night. We had a large well appointed room, with a great shower. Breakfast had everything you would want. We walked to the center of town along the beach and it took about an hour. I've stayed here before and would again.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Martin,
Many thanks for your feedback, it is always such a pleasure to welcome back our returning guests.
I am pleased to see that your lasting impression is a positive one and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again at Barcelona Princess hotel the next time your travels take you to Barcelona.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: The only good this about this hotel is the view from the lift. It is not a 4 star hotel by ANY means. I stayed at the Negressco Princess which is in the same chain which is a 4  star.  This hotel has no iron or kettle. I had had an event to attend and was unable to iron my outfit. I was told o should pay in the morning to use the laundry service! pretty useless as I needed the clothes that evening. The room pictures are very deceptive. The pools are very small with only 4 sun Loungers around each! The gym is TINY and very old ! We came back to see a guest fighting with staff this is when I decided to leave. I am going back to the Arts hotel! AVOID
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Joanna,
I appreciate you taking your time to make us aware of your experience, your feedback is certainly highly valued and we apologize for not meeting your expectations.
I do hope that you would stay again as we like the chance to change your mind.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Shower you have to put towels down to prevent flooding, partition & toilet screens cracked. Staff unfriendly. Seem homophobic. The cleaners for rooms are friendly tho. Expensive cocktails & food best to venture out to local eateries & bars. Only positive is location I guess & when we checked out! Won't stay in this hotel again!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Andy,
Many thanks for sharing your feedback. We're sorry to hear that your experience with us did not live up to your expectations.
Regarding the bathroom, we understand your frustration and will take steps to address these concerns.
We usually have high marks friendly customer service, we regret that we missed the mark in this case and will review with our team members where improvements can be made immediately.
I do hope that we will have the opportunity to turn around your experience for you in the future.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: This hotel definitely should not be rated as high as it is. Expensive for the lack of care they have. Pool and pool area was dirty, gym was also not up to standards. One day we did not have room service even though we had our sign and another day we had it done but upon further notice our pillows were stained? Unacceptable. Room service was a 1/5. Overly priced and not good at all. I would say the only thing that was decent was the breakfast. But besides that everything else was lacking. The people there were also not very kind and understanding. I’m upset I paid so much for lower then bare minimum. Spend your money at a different hotel.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Angela,
Many thanks for letting us know your concerns.
I am sorry to read that you didn't have a good experience on every single level: pool area, gym, value for money and service.
I am going to share your comment with the team as this is something that should be outstanding.
Concerning the cleaning of your room, I´ve checked our files and I can confirm that it was cleaned every day.
I hope you will give us a chance by staying with us again to show you that your unsatisfactory stay was an exception.
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director
Santiago Hernández
Director

We are disappointed that we didn't meet your expectations this time. Please accept our apologies and rest assured that we will continue working to ensure that the satisfaction of our guests continues to improve.

reviews.review_text: room cleaning and breakfast staff are excellent other than that I can't say that it’s good. the television in the room isn't working and the hair dryer isn't working eitherü on top of that the stairs the only we can get down the hotel beside the elevator is sometimes locked which should be open at all times
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Mead,
Thanks for contacting us. We are sorry to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We take all guest feedback seriously and will use your review to address any areas for improvement, so we would appreciate it if you would detail us in a more concrete way the inconveniences that you had during your stay to be able to treat them carefully.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: A fine hotel in Barcelona. There is a shopping center adjacent to it with many restaurants and shopping stores. The hotel itself is well-maintained with very good rooms that are well maintained. Their. Real fast buffet is diverse and excellent. The surrounding neighborhood is good for walks.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Fahd,
We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your recent stay. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers. We hope to see you again when you are in the area.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: We were very happy with our stay here and pleased we chose the Princess. The room was spacious, clean with comfortable beds and included a balcony with views of the ocean and nearby attractions. Guest services staff were helpful, friendly, and generous even offering an early checkin. We would absolutely stay here again and enjoyed our stay.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Kuahiwinui,
Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us positive feedback! We are so glad to hear that we were able to make your experience at Barcelona Princess enjoyable and memorable. We hope to welcome you back soon!
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
6 nights here in August 23, we go home tomorrow morning. We had a great stay, the staff can't do enough for you, the breakfast was very good, room was comfortable and the free mini-bar was a surprising bonus. We used both pools and the bars on the ground floor and on level 3 and I can highly recommend the Cocktails.
When we were there the trams were not running and part of the local Metro line ( L4) was closed for building work but it was easy to find a way round it to get into the city centre quickly.
The beach was on the doorstep, Bambu beach bar is a must. We will be back soon. Thank You
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Richard,
Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience at Barcelona Princess and for recognizing our team for his exceptional customer service. Nothing makes us happier than knowing our guests have great experiences with us while visiting our amazing city!!
We hope that you will give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: No private parking , and it’s like a 5 minutes walk to the nearest parking unless you buy a 24 euro per day parking ticket. Otherwise the hotel is in a nice location and is nice. The staff were rude at check out because we were a few minutes late and basically tried to kick us out.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Khalid,
Many thanks for contacting us.
I´m pelased to see your overall experience was a positve one.
We have a private parking that we share with the mall next to us, that can be reached even by our hotel elevator.
Check out is at 12.00h. Is  very important to check out no later that 12.00 , specially if we are fully booked, as our maids need time to prepare rooms for the next guests. The time of departure must be respected in order to respect the time of arrival of the following guests.
We hope that you will consider us for your next visit to Barcelona.
Best wishes
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: For the amount paid per room, this is absolutely disgusting. This should be a 3 star facility. Yes big spacious rooms that probably have not seen a single renovation since 2001. Wood on the doors pealing off, mold on the bath tub. And for a great price of 170eur you get complimentary mini bar of a bottle of water and a coke, plus an addition 20 eur for breakfast. Enjoy your stay :)
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Marco,
Thanks for letting us know your concerns.
We are very sorry to learn your experience was not what you were expecting but I would like to point out that all our rooms have a free minibar regardless of the price of the room, which changes according to the season. Contrary to what you say, the minibar contains 5 drinks and it is restoked every day.
Every year we make maintenance and  improvement works in our facilities to keep them in perfect condition and we are currently making some restyling works as you may have seen.
We sincerely hope we have the opportunity to restore your faith in us in the future.
Best regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Our first stop of our honeymoon was Barcelona Hotel Princess and it was amazing! The room is very unique and had great views. What we enjoyed the most was the bar service and the people. Thank you to all of the bar staff especially Cristian! He made us several cocktails of his own recipe that we believe should be on the menu. My favorite was the one we decided would be called "Princess Jazmin", which consisted of coffee and lime. Everyone was wonderful and we would definitely recommend Hotel Princess.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Jazmín,
Thanks a lot for letting us know your experience.
We are truly proud to know that overall you had a good experience while visiting us. Cristian will love the comments you have left regarding him. He will really take a boost from this.
We hope to have the honor of welcoming you again for your next stay in Barcelona.
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: I felt like I was in an upgraded project building in the Bronx. The outside structure is nice, however we had a hole in our room wall. Not cool. The staff was very polite and accommodating. If you're spending more time out than in and looking for relatively inexpensive than that's the place to be. Otherwise I recommend a better quality hotel.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Angel,
Many thanks for letting us knw your concerns.
We have noted your comments and will inform the team to improve our service for future occasions. Thank you for letting us know and look forward to welcome you back again.
Best regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Friendly staff, clean rooms  nice views and best of all everything in the fridge comes with the room  muah!

I recently stayed at Barcelona Princess Hotel and was disappointed to find that there was no iron in my room. When I called the receptionist to inquire about this, I was told that the hotel does not provide irons and that I would have to pay for laundry services if I wanted my clothes ironed. This is unacceptable for a hotel of this caliber. Guests should not have to pay extra for basic amenities that are expected to be provided in a hotel room. I would not recommend staying at this hotel if you expect to have access to basic amenities.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Abdulrahman,
Many thanks for yuor feedback.
We regret that on this occasion we have not fulfilled your expectations, and I would appreciate it if you would detail us in a more concrete way the inconveniences that you had during your stay to be able to treat them carefully, as well as the fact of not having iron in the room. It is for security (fire risk) and electric network limit reasons why we do not have irons available for our guests. We have a laundry service available, we pick up your clothes and give them you back during the same day. We also provide an express service if it´s more suitable for you, both pressing and laundry.
We wait for your news
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Perfect place to stay for my conference at the CBIC.  Oh, and I forgot to mention how friendly and helpful the front desk staff was in regards to recommending restaurants and finding a converter for my American phone plugs.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Joy,
Thank you so much for taking the time to post and giving us a high score, we are very touched!
We are truly lucky to be in such an ideal area of Barcelona that is so convenient and accessible to all the main attractions, ans we are as well in front of the CCIB!!!
We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you. Have a beautiful day!
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
This hotel should not be qualified as a 4 star hotel. I am staying at this hotel at this very moment.

The room temperature is at 27 degrees and there is no air conditioning in this room. And in the website of hotel it is clearly advertised as room consists of an air conditioner. It feels like you are inside a boiling room. I informed this to the receptionist multiple times and the lady at reception tends to ignore the all concerns I raised.

And we requested to open the window for sometime until some cold air gets inside. And we were informed to stay outside of our room in the middle of night as we have booked a high floor room therefore as per the hotel policy we must stay outside in order to open the windows. So we went out of the hotel around 10pm and returned after 45mins, we were surprised to see that room temperature still at 27 degrees. It seems no one has even opened the windows. And we stayed outside for nothing and feels like we got deceived.

The staff is really rude and does not know how to treat to customers nicely.

I do not recommend this hotel to anyone unless you want to ruin your holiday.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Tharindu,
Many thanks for letting us know your concerns.
I am sorry that your experience with us was not positive and that you were unable to rest due to the heat. For sustainability reasons the hotel has air conditioning in summer and heating in winter.
This year the temperatures have risen suddenly and we are currently in the process of making the change from hot to cold.
I am so sorry that you did not receive an exceptional service from our Reception team as they usually receive many compliments regarding their warmth and friendliness. Please be assured that your comments have been noted.
I hope you will give us a chance by staying with us again to show you that your unsatisfactory stay was an exception.
All my best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: We asked the bartender for ice and received extremely rude response.  The rooms are mediocre at best.  The showers leak everywhere and the beds are extremely tiny.  I am not one that likes to complain, but I was very disappointed with this hotel.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Mr. Marshall,
Many thanks for your review.
Please rest assured that we thoroughly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay and we will be passing all your comments onto our management in an effort to improve and be better. 
Thank you for your candid feedback, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you better in the future.
All the best,
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Room was little bit demaged by previous guests. Anyway maid cleaning lady did always her job perfectly. In room was minibar for free and was always supplemented. In hotel is one pool on 3rd floor and another one on 23rd floor. Hotel is near beach and metro and ofcourse near busstation. Near is shopping center. Hotel is really good and in good location, where are not strange people.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Andrej,
We are happy to hear about your amazing experience! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again when you are in the area.
Have a Great Day!
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
I'd say an over-priced 2-star hotel masquarading as a 4-star. Our room is pretty dated, has not even a water kettle for an instant coffee, no paper towel if you happen to need one at some point. The free minibar is something I wouldn't call a minibar.

The shower gel holder and shampoo stand was stuck to the wall with a little adhesive stick and fell off the first night. No attention to details I'd say.

The gym is the worse of it all. So much space, so few equipments. The only age-old full-body machine there is defect and unusable. You are stuck with an incomplete set of dumbells. You have couple cardio machines though.

Considering the 295€ per night price tag, I'd expect far more than this. We leave for another hotel tonight as our stay
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Sep L,
Thank you for your feedba ck. We are disappointed that we didn't meet your expectations this time. Please accept our apologies and rest assured that we will continue working to ensure that the satisfaction of our guests continues to improve.
We sincerely hope we have the opportunity to restore your faith in us in the future.
All my best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Not a four star hotel. The indoor pool is "under construction", the outside pool had a horrendous smell and was filthy so I did not use the pool for the week I stayed. The gym had very little equipment including one treadmill and a broken bike machine. The most frustrating part was that the wifi was terrible-constantly disconnecting. There is no kettle, tea/coffee provided either. I wish i had just forked out more money and stayed elsewhere where at least the wifi would work in the rooms but unfortunately i booked this last minute and didnt read the reviews beforehand. The two stars is for friendly staff and good location but other than that it is a complete waste of money as the most crucial facilities were the most dissapointing.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Ktzstyles,
Thanks a lot for contacting us. I can understand that not everything you experience went well so your review will go a long way in training and practice to ensure that we can avoid such disappointments in the future.
Thank you for taking your time to pass this information to us. I hope we can welcome you back again in the future with a preferably better stay.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Fantastic location with an amazing view. Barcelona center is easily accessible by metro.

The hotel and the room were clean and the daily room service was excellent. The staff was professional and friendly. They do have a free mini bar in the room, containing water and sodas. Although the hotel rooms need some renovations, they are still not terrible.

However, the room did not have a kettle, tea, or coffee, and even when we asked for a kettle, room service said it was not possible to get one.

Recommended.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Jean,
Many thanks for your kind review.
I am pleased to see your stay with us was a great one and the staff will be delighted to see you comments. 
All our rooms have a minibar that is free and that our team restocke every day. There is no coffee facilities in room, but you can take a coffee, tea, or whatever you prefer in our bar or even order it to our room service.
We all hope to see you again on your next visit to Barcelona.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Certainly worthy of its 4 stars, the hotel offers a generally feel good experience. The staff - from check in, to the bar, cleaners and security - are polite, professional and extremely helpful. Lucas, on the bar, is a gem. The rooms are perfect. The only thing I would warn you about, if booking a sea view room, is the excessive noise from the beach bars, Fri-Sun night 'music' can give you a headache. David and his colleagues were helpful in letting me move room, but unfortunately a city view room wasn't available until the Monday. Food is also beautiful and when the locals dine there, you know it's good.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello WEndy,
I was thrilled to learn that you had a fun stay with us and am extremely grateful for you taking the time to share your experience. Your kind comments have been shared with the team and we all very much hope to have the absolute pleasure of welcoming you back
Best regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
This hotel is getting a bit old and used. Bed had weals.
Breakfast was good not great.
And swimming pool works 7 to 7. Very narrow.
The worst part for me is that sauna area was permanently closed. And it was reason why I picked this hotel over other.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Marty,
Thanks for letting us know your concerns.
We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay, although we regret that some aspects did not completely live up to your expectations. We take note of all the suggestions and comments with the aim of improving our quality.
We are making improvement works in our facilities and currently sauna is not available, but this is specified in the site.
I do hope we are able to welcome you back again to the hotel sometime in the future.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: The welcome was not really welcome, no attention to detail, small lobby, lift slow as it is the wifi (wifi is a joke), very expensive for what it offers (300+ taking into account that this is not the city center at all and no breakfast included), not really a 4 star hotel, no place for unloading luggage from the car, the rooms are small, no drinking water in the room, ... a bit ashamed that this is in BCN, where I am from... not staying again
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Edgar,
Thanks for your review.
We're sorry to hear that your experience fell short of your expectations. 
Regarding our rates, the hotel does not have a single rate but it depends on the availability, the events taking place in Barcelona ... so the prices vary depending on the dates. Part of our guests do not require breakfast, this why we keep it as an optional add-on. At the moment of making your booking you can always choose a rate with and without breakfast. 
Standard rooms measure 25ms, which is above average for hotels in Barcelona, and they pack everything you will need for a great stay in the city, and they have drinking water as well as water in the minibar.
I do hope you would reconsider your decision to not return to the hotel, we would be more than happy to see you return. 
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Clean rooms with an awesome view.

3 person rooms are basically same as 2 person rooms with an extra bed added.

The rooms don't have to much free space to move in and windows on higher floors are locked so you'll depend on AC.

There is a see-through window between beds and toilet but it has a curtain.

Door between bed and toilet cannot be closed so better be comfortable hearing everything both ways.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Filip,
Many thanks for your review.
I´m glad to see your overall experience was a positive one.
For security reasons our windows in rooms can´t be opened. But next time you are with us I recommend you to reserve a superior room instead of a standard one as all superiors have balcony or terrace and so you can go outside. 
All our rooms are designed to take advantage of the daylight and that´s why the bathroom is open plan. But if you want privacy there is a full glass wall looking out to the sea with an electric blackout blind so you can adjust your privacy/lighting as needed. And there is also a door that you can close to have two different and completely private spaces.
We hope that you will give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Directo

reviews.review_text: Modern hotel with large room.Good location near beach and public bus/ metro/ tram. Very clean room except the dust. I think because you can not open the windows. This is very anoing.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hellow Calin,
Many thanks for your kind words and rating. We are glad to see  you had a great stasy and you appreciated our service and facilities
For security reasons our windows in rooms can´t be opened. But next time you are with us I recommend you to reserve a superior room instead of a standard one as all superiors have balcony or terrace and so you can go outside. 
We hope to see you back again.
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Hotel is with really good location… we had a great time and all staff was extremely friendly and helpful ❤️ if we have a chance we will visit again . Love from England
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Ralitsa,
Many thanks for your kind review.
We are so glad to see you had such a great time with us and a well as our location, you appreciated the service provided by our staff. All the team is focused on making sure our guests have a fabulous stay .
We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you. Have a beautiful day!
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
The room itself was clean, a very vice view of the beach which has a funfair etc as we were on the 11th floor. From higher floors you can see the whole of Barcelona, seeing things like the Sagrada Familia which is nice but only when you are in the loft. The rooftop pool is tiny and not inviting to use, especially in colder weather. We had around 21-24 degrees weather and it was windy and not very clean. Only a few sun beds but regardless it was not a relaxing, open space. The main indoor pool with amenities like sauna is closed so that isn’t an option. There is gym equipment but again, not much. The “rooftop bar” is inside and basically a stall which has barely any seating so again, didn’t use. The most ridiculous thing was that we had to pay for normal things such as glasses and ice; 3 euros for such things. They did not even have irons which was surprising as 1, it is a hotel and 2, it’s next to a conference centre. This was an inconvenience as when travelling, things like needing to drink water or iron clothes are essential. The TV was terrible and is about as big as a laptop, no english channels available except one news show. The reception staff/service was awful, when I checked in they didn’t tell me anything really. They didn’t tell me check out times, wi-fi, anything about the hotel (pool, amenities, how to get around/to room), just simply had me pay the fee and gave me my key so that was not a welcoming experience; they almost view you as a burden. We booked a large room but this was just two beds rolled together on wheels and the AC wasn’t very effective and you can’t open any windows. The only positives of this place are the maids, the bellman called Juan-Carlos, the location which is 5 mins from beach and nearest metro. I did like how you can control the blinds to the windows and bathroom using switches but when so much is lacking elsewhere it seems like a bit of a cop out to seem modern. A lot of shopping/food/cafe options in the area due to the Diagonal shopping centre being next door. There is also a taxi rank right outside which is great. To get to central Barcelona it is approx 15 mins on metro (direct train) and 30 min drive to airport (30/35euro approx).The view is nice but will only be nice if you are on higher floors.

All in all, the location and room itself were good and I did have a good stay. However there is a lot of opportunity and potential for this hotel to improve.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello A Sahrma,
Although there are many aspects of the hotel that you found positive, I am sorry that there are so many that you were not to your liking.
I would like to personally apologize for this as we are always aiming and trying to satisfy our guests and go the extra mile, and it is evident that we haven't achieved that. Rest assured that we have taken immediate corrective action for our continuous improvement. 
We sincerely hope we have the opportunity to restore your faith in us in the future.
All my best,
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Lovely hotel.  Great rooftop pool.  Clean modern rooms.
I liked the bathroom layout.
Similar to other reviews, I would have liked a kettle and iron in the room.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Liza,
Many thanks for your review. At Barcelona Princess we truly value our guests opinion as they make us keep working hard on the service we want to provide.
Please come to visit us again in the near future for another lovely experience! 
Best regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: The view of the city is very nice from the higher floors. Rooms are also nice

I recently stayed at this Hotel  and it was a great experience. The staff was very friendly and helpful and the room was clean and comfortable. The hotel was in a great location, close to many restaurants and attractions. The breakfast buffet was also delicious, with a wide variety of options. Overall, I had a great stay and would definitely recommend this Hotel to anyone looking for an enjoyable stay in the area.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Virendra,
We would like to thank you for recommending the Barcelona Princess and for the wonderfully positive review following your recent stay. We work hardy every day so that all our guests are as satisfied as you are.
We'd love to share another positive experience with you in the future! 
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: The hotel is nice and clean. Good room size. There was no bath just the shower but everything worked fine and a shower has many modes not just an ordinary shower. The hotel was full. I asked for water bottle at the reception in the evening. I was told they will be sent to the room. 2 hours later I went down to request again and offered to carry it to my room but again was denied. Few people had bags stolen from reception. The local police not at all helpful.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Ak Vlogs,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve.
Concerning your comment about the service provided by the front desk team, be assured that your feedback will be taken into consideration when we next review our standards. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.
In case of any theft within our facilities, the hotel provides all its assistance to the client to file a complaint to the police and they do their job. I am very sorry if something like this happens, and we will always be ready to help in this regard.
I hope you will give us a chance by staying with us again to show you that your unsatisfactory stay was an exception.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Terrible experience. Rude staff that did not care about the customers, 4 employees chatting together while there is a bunch of people waiting to check in. The room was not ready when we arrived we had to wait until around 4pm to check in. Air conditioning not working as well. Don’t stay here!

Checkin time is at 15.00h. I have checked our files and I see that our team cheched you in at 15.05h, so I hope these minutes were not a great inconvenience.
Thank you for your suggestions, as we strive to continuously improve our guest experience. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future to provide you with a better experience.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Bad experience
Reception never willing to help and they make you feel they are bored about helping guests.
Besides that it’s gives a really bad reputation to the hotel
Having reception employees talk to each other (like complaining ) about each customer they just served, gives to the hotel and guests a terrible experience !

Director

reviews.review_text: Buffet Breakfast is so good! Close to all public transport. Loved the gym & both pools!!
reviews.owner_answer:

Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Great location 10 minute walk to the beach, 30 min drive from the airport, 3 minute walk to the metro which takes you all over Barcelona. The staff were very friendly, welcoming and helpful nothing was to much. We stayed on the 23rd floor with sea view, there’s a small rooftop pool with amazing sunrise/sunset views.. it’s a little cold when you first get in but you soon warm up. The Gym is very basic but does the job. The city views whilst going up in the elevator are spectacular. Lots of choice for breakfast including hot drinks, cold juices, hot food, cold meats and cheese, pan cake maker, cereal and large selection of fruit. The only reason I didn’t give this hotel a 5 star is because there was a funny smell from the toilet, and the shower and toilet are only separated by glass e.g if someone gets up for the toilet in the night you will definitely hear everything.
We would stay here again, thank you to all the staff
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Codie,
Many sincere thanks for your kind review to Hotel Barcelona Princess. I am very happy to hear that our services made such a positive impression and that you had a memorable experience. We take pride in taking care of our guests and are very pleased that your expectations were highly met. 
All our rooms are designed to take advantage of the daylight and that´s why the bathroom is open plan. But if you want privacy there is a full glass wall looking out to the sea with an electric blackout blind so you can adjust your privacy/lighting as needed. And there is also a door that you can close to have two different and completely private spaces
We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you. Have a beautiful day!
Best regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Pros:The advantage of this hotel is that it is close to the light rail or metro station, making it easy to get around. Also
I chose a sea view room, the view from the window was top notch and I could watch the sunrise from my room.

Disadvantages:The disadvantages of the hotel are firstly that the facilities in the rooms are only average, for example the sound insulation in the rooms is poor and also the swimming pool is more of a decoration and not that practical.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Celso,
I am very happy to see that you have enjoyed your stay with us and that we were a great asset to your experience of Barcelona.
We have two pools that, although they are not so large they have the size for a city hotel, more for cooling of than a swim
I hope we can welcome you back again in the future for another wonderful time!
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Definitely one of the best bars I've ever been to .I was amazed how creative and thoughtfully prepared each cocktail is The staff was very friendly, especially roberto he really want to make you feel comfortable. He even give you a detailed explanation about every cocktail you order and how it is made. Overall, we had an amazing experience. I'm sorry I didn't take photos.
reviews.owner_answer:

Many thanks for your amazing review.
I´m so proud to see your words about our bar, and it gives me great pleasure to read your kind words on Roberto. Rest assured that I will share your feedback with him who takes great pride in ensuring each guest has a memorable stay.
Please come to visit us again in the near future for another lovely experience! 
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Decent hotel on the main Aviguda Diagonal road.

Somethings I liked

- Breakfast
- Housekeeping

Somethings I absolutely did not like
- Slow elevators which don't work half the time
- No kettle or Iron box in the room, not even a tooth brush
- WiFi was unreliable and wasn't working towards the end of my stay

Director

reviews.review_text: I would give this a better rating but when I stayed there I had to file a noise complaint because of how loud my neighbors were but they didn't do anything. I had my child with me and she had to hear moaning and groaning from next-door my poor incident child. They influenced my kid and she said "daddy what are those men doing over there they sound so happy I wanna do what their doing!" And I was scared to hear what she said. I'm never coming back again!
reviews.owner_answer:

reviews.review_text: This hotel is not professional. They cancelled my reservation without informing me. No one including the director found a solution. Customers do not count for princess hotel.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Mr. Bourezg,
Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry you weren't able to stay with us, and let me explain what happened: you booked a non-refundable room, and these reservations require payment before arrival. When you called to change your arrival date, the reservations department informed you that if you did not make payment the reservation would be canceled. As we did not receive it, we called you twice to inform you again that your reservation would be canceled if payment was not made, but you did not answer the phone, and as there was no had no response and you had already been informed, we proceeded to cancel the reservation.
We apologize for this inconvenience. If you give us the opportunity to regain your trust, we will be happy to offer you the best that our customers enjoy every day.
Best regards
Santiago Hernandez
Director

reviews.review_text: Excellent hotel. The staff is very friendly. Very helpful. The hotel has a great location. The rooms are neat and clean. The breakfast is classic.
