The view from the room where I stayed on the 26th floor is really fantastic. Regardless of the number of rooms, the elevators work great. It's a little crowded at breakfast time. The pools are clean and maintained. Maybe there should be more sunbeds available. The air conditioning works great. The subway, tram, and bus stations are in the immediate vicinity, 5 minutes' walk. The beach is a 10-minute walk away. The shopping center is a few minutes' walk away with a large number of restaurants and fast food. In the future, they should change the interior of the hotel rooms a bit, but that is already a matter of taste. The hotel is highly recommended.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Goran,
We would like to thank you for your comments. Many of our future guests will benefit from hearing about the experience of past guests in our hotel.
We were absolutely delighted to learn how much you enjoyed your stay and in particular we are most grateful for your kind words regarding our staff and service levels.
Thank you very much for having chosen us, we look forward to have you back in the near future.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
The hotel is OK in itself. It’s affordable and even though the rooms are a bit outdated they’re not an issue.

The staff, specially in the reception and in the restaurant are super rude. I wanted to borrow cutlery and the man in the reception said “you got your food from the streets you can get you cutlery from the street too”. I thought that was super rude to say to a guest who is politely asking for cutlery. Than he told me to go ask in the restaurant and followed me and watched me as if I was doing something wrong. The restaurant staff said I had to pay for cutlery because I didn’t order from the restaurant. This is the first thing this is happening to me 😂 you would think it was forbidden to order takeout or the sole income of the hotel comes from their restaurant. 😅
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Oznur,
Thank you for your feedback, i am sorry to see we did not meet the expectations we aim for. I will take a look into all of the points you have raised as we are extremely proud of our service reputation and always endeavour to go the extra mile for our customers ensuring they feel “home away from home”.
Anyway let me explain you tha we have a restaurant and also a room service. If you ask for something to eat of couse you don´t have to pay for cutley, but if you order food from a different restaurant, cutlery is charged as a service fee.
We sincerely hope we have the opportunity to restore your faith in us in the future.
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Lovely hotel, staff are friendly and helpful. Great location for the CCIB conference Center which if just over the road. Rooms are very nice with a great view of the sea. The gym is a bit sparse with only one of everything. The breakfast is buffet style with cereal, cold meats, hot stuff too as well as breads and pastries. In all a very nice stay for a few days.
Warning…. If you don’t like walking over glass walkways don’t get rooms 14-19 on any floor. My walkway was cracked in places and was known as the ”walk of death”, thankfully I survived.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Mike,
I was thrilled to learn that you had a fun stay with us and am extremely grateful for you taking the time to share your experience. Your kind comments have been shared with the team and we all very much hope to have the absolute pleasure of welcoming you back. I take note of your words about the walkway and we will take the appropiated measures.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
We had an okay stay for 3 nights. The room was good size, the bathroom was good size, overall was clean and neat. The inclusion of outdoor patio was pleasant. We were a bit surprised and displeased at the lack of inclusion of an iron for clothes, and a kettle (nor any instant tea/coffee, complementary water bottle and small snacks) which we thought was standard for 4* hotels. The hairdryer was usable. The room was also more dimly lit than what we expected and would be comfortable with.

Our stay we booked did not include meals so we cannot comment on food and restaurant service. They had 2 swimming pools which were fairly small and shallow, one at 0.85m and one at 1.25m, clean dry towels provided extra at the pools.

The location was close to the beach (10' walk) and a local L4 station (4' walk) which runs fairly frequent.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Loran,
Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your recent visit to Barcelona and for taking the time to give us your feedback. We appreciate your score and your comments .
We will be more than glad it you give us the chance to welcome you back in a very next future.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
One if the worst hotels I ever stayed in BCN.
Staff at the reception were not welcoming even the security guide near the main entrance never smiled in our 3 days stay.
Room is over priced.. TV is too small. Bed is a small queen. No internet connection wifi for the 3 days, amd they said they cant do anything about it.
Even when i request a print out of 2 page’s documents the printer in the business center is not working, i had to email it to the reception.
Yet their breakfast area and food was good. Its location is great near the NAT Museum and the Diagonal Mall.
And you get to see the sea from higher floors.
Staff has to be trained to perform better with clients and to smile.
Beds has to be replaced.
All extra services has to be provided to the customer with excellence.
I will not recommend at all to any of my acquaintances.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Bassma,
Thank you for your feedback and for letting us know about these areas of improvement. 
I would like to personally apologize for the bad experience you had during your stay in our hotel. We are always aiming and trying to satisfy our guests and go the extra mile, and it is evident that we haven't achieved that.
I am so sorry that you did not enjoy a delightful and memorable stay as much as we had anticipated, and I do hope that we will have the opportunity to turn around your experience for you in the future.
All my best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
It was Okay at best really. The hotels room is clean and spacious and the food from the breakfast buffet was good if you got there early otherwise it's cold.
I would recommend you bring your own travel iron as they charge you for any ironing in the hotel, which I found outrageous. They also don't have tea or coffee in your room for a morning pick up.
Its pretty local with a taxi journey to anything but there are probably better hotels in the location. On the whole I wouldn't stay here again.
reviews.owner_answer:
Good morning,
Thanks for sharing your concerns with us.
We are so sorry to read we would stay here again ans o ssad to see the hotel was not to your liking.
Regarding ironing, we do not have irons for security reasons but we do have a laundry service available. We pick up your clothes and give you back during the same day, and we also have an express service if it´s more suitable for you, both pressing and laundry.
There is no kettle or coffee facilities in room, but you can take a coffee, tea, or whatever you prefer in our bar or even order it to our room service.
I do hope that we will have the opportunity to turn around your experience for you in the future.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princes

reviews.review_text:
Excellent location, opposite to the congress center and very close to the beach.
Barcelona center is easily accessible by metro.
It is about time to renovate the hotel rooms, but they are still not bad.
The quality of breakfast is very good,  but I would like to have some more selections, like fried eggs (not only scrambled and hard-boiled).
Nice pool and bars.
The personnel is very polite and helpful and the service is very good.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Stelios,
Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, I am pleased to see your stay with us was a great one and the staff will be delighted to see you comments. Our breakast is a buffet with a great selection of products, but if you wish to eat something that is not included, you can ask for it to our staff and you will have it as an extra.
We all hope to see you again on your next visit to Barcelona.
Best wishes
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: The hotel is more or less a standard in its category. The rooms are clean and quiet. I liked the massage shower. Besides, they use the Rituals cosmetics that smell very nice. A big plus is the sunblind and non-alcoholic drinks in the minibar. But you can see that the hotel has its age and several things needs renovation/upgrade - e.g. televisions in rooms, some stuff in corridors. The staff was nice. Breakfasts were tasty but sometimes cold (eggs and sausages). The hotel is near to a beach, subway station, shopping mall and conference centre.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Petr,
Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay and for highlighting the aspects that met your approval and those aspect you liked less. I'm really pleased you enjoyed your stay overall and I will pass on your comments to the relevant departments to ensure they are acknowledged.
We'd love to see you again soon so we can share an even more positive experience with you.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Everything is acceptable, but the necessity of the front desk staff to order the rides for commission is not safe, either good for their costumers. Becasuse those rides or unofficial taxis later charge the costumer those commissions.
Advice for costumers to not accept the front desk staff's offer for rides. Outside of the hotel, there is an official taxi stand, and prices are just perfect.
Location is amazing if you have event in the convention center , you need just to cross the road
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Mohamed,
Many thanks for sharing your reveiw.
We are so glad to see you had such a great stay and that our location was convenient for your needs, so we hope to see you back again when your travels bring you to this area again.
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
I’ve just checked in.

The receptionists are really nice.

First glance of the room it’s very deceptive compared to the photos. Fantastic views of the city but I am frequently staying in hotels so I use the room quite a lot and It feels very outdated, the TV is rubbish.

The bed so far is comfortable and the bathroom is of decent size but the hotel does not feel like it is worthy of 4stars.

I ate the serloin steak from the menu. Steak was 5/10 and all the cutlery, plates, bowls and glasses smelled like wet dog (unclean).

Probably will avoid this hotel in the future and defiantly won’t be ordering more room service.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello LWW,
Thanks a lot for contacting us. We are disappointed that we didn't meet your expectations this time. Please accept our apologies and rest assured that we will continue working to ensure that the satisfaction of our guests continues to improve.
I hope we can welcome you back again in the future with a preferably better stay.
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Cant fault this hotel and our stay, they went above and beyond to accomadate the wifes request for birthday items in our room, yes no hot drink facility in rooms but did have fridge full of cold drinks ..
Room view was great, breakfast excellent and plenty of it, metro 2 minute walk would defo return if we come back to Barcelona

Only floor.. the lifts at breakfast take forever
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi John,
Thanks a lor for your amazing feedback. I´m so glad to see you had a great time and you enjoyed your birthday!!!
He hope to see you again for another special ocasion.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
The likes: Great location if you want to stay by the beach, really nice sea view. Breakfast was very good, not a very wide variety but very good and healthy food. Bed was very comfy and the room overall is quite nice. Actually the hotel exceeded our expectations, we were a bit worried after reading some of the other recent reviews, but we will choose this hotel again.

Some minuses: The hotel clearly is a bit worn out. Fridge was not working, but that was OK for us. Sometimes, especially in the weekend, the waiting time for the elevators can be quite high, more than 5 minutes.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Traian,
Thank you for taking the time to leave such positive scores and comments on your recent stay with us. I am pleased that you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay with us, so that we can expect your return.
Best wishes
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Awful experience!
All in all me and my friend were very unhappy with our stay. Or what would you expect if you book a 4 star hotel?
- the room had a very nice view but it was old and dusty and also smelled dusty and old
- there was almost no space for clothes
- I had to pay 1,50€ for a cup of hot water which is INCLUDED in literally every good hotel
- the amazing gym: 3 devices in a very small room (why do they fake the pictures you can’t call that a proper gym it was awful
- the „Spa“ was only one old sauna… so sad to call that Spa!
- the rooftop is super small and you can’t even eat there and it was closed even BEFORE 10pm which is also not cool because it says open till 10pm!!

My worst experience though: I contacted them in a friendly way and they did not care at all. I talked to them at the reception and they did not care, I changed my hotel to Morel one and… they were super friendly and sensitive like especially a 4star hotel should be! And motel one has less stars…. I think it’s sad to have grumpy and rude people working there, what are your hotel principles? Aren’t you supposed to teach them?Princess treatment not included at all!
I asked them if they could open the window while we are gone and not in the room because I catch a cold with the air conditioning and they said no, what’s the problem when I’m not even in the room?
Now I’m sick since a week because of the worst hotel experience ever!!
And I payed 750€ for 5 nights!
I hope people read this because the worst thing is that I complained in a friendly way and they were rude, which is unacceptable for 4 stars. And I swear guys, I stayed friendly because I’m not a stupid person, I have manners!
You don’t deserve the stars, your people don’t even know how to be a good receptionists!
I also know hotel testers and have good connections so your bad that you treated me rude:)
The only people I want to say thank you to are the cleaning ladies, they were super nice.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Chiara,
Thanks a lot for letting us know your concerns. I would like to personally apologize for the bad experience you had during your stay in our hotel. We are always aiming and trying to satisfy our guests and go the extra mile, and it is evident that we haven't achieved that.
It comes as a surprise that you did not find the staff friendly. I know how hard the team works and they provide a great service which is constantly recognised by our guests as we receive many positive reviews.
Rest assured that room cleanliness is a matter that we take very seriously and is of paramount importance to us and is something we follow very strict procedures about in the hotel. We have brought this incident to the immediate attention of the respective department head for improvement.  We have a small gym with the necessary machines for a non-professional training but for our clients to keep in shape (photos are updated and no retouched). About spa... we do not have a spa. We just just have two pools, the gym and sauna. And about the rooftop, the bar there is close during this period but you can have dinner at the pool on the 3rd floor, that closes at 23.00h. Pools are closed at 19.00h as you can see on the site, not at 22.00h!
We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Not a couple's hotel...
We stayed here for a week. The hotel has lost its prime, and the interior is outdated. Riding the elevator takes ages, with only three offered for what must be hundreds of guests. The breakfast was okay, but the large amount of conference guests at the breakfast table was astonishing. We only experienced one day of blissful calm, with the other six mornings being very loud and obnoxious. I'm guessing no one could really enjoy their mornings there. The staff also didn't really care about their customer's wellbeing. This is most definitely not a four star hotel, and I will most definitely not return.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Anna,
Thank you for your feedback. I am sorry that on this occasion we have not lived up to your expectations and that you thought that we do not take care of our customers because we always do our best to offer the best service and make our customers feel at home.
It is a large hotel, and when it is full or almost full it is normal to find many people in the breakfast area, although the team always works and strives to ensure that no product is missing and provide the best service.
We would love to have you stay with us again so that you can leave with a better impression.
Best wishes
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Amazing hotel!!My colleagues and I had a great time!!Maria from group bookings was excellent!!Gabriel from dinner service did amazing job with serving!!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Evi,
Thanks a lot for your amazing review.
Nothing makes us prouder than knowing that you had a good experience staying with us and that our staff helped you with what you needed. I will be sure to pass your lovely comments to Maria and Gabriel, it will make their day.
Please come to visit us again in the near future for another lovely experience!
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Horrible experience :( We booked a room long time in advance but got a room for disabled people. Staff rejected to change the room. Never again this hotel!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Nikita,
Many tanks for sharing your concerns.
I am sorry that you were left with a bad feeling about the hotel.
Rooms are assigned upon arrival, regardless of how far in advance the reservation is made. Handicapped rooms are standard rooms, and have the same amenities as non-handicapped rooms. When you arrived at the hotel we were fully booked and for this reason we were unable to change rooms.
We would love for you to give us another chance and make your stay memorable.
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Very good hotel with nice restaurant excellent breakfast, lovable spa area with outdoor pool and little gym. Everybody very nice and helpful a little bit far from city center but the metro station is close and some rooms have a wonderful ocean view. Definitely suggested
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Luca,
Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, I am pleased to see your stay with us was a great one and the staff will be delighted to see you comments. We all hope to see you again on your next visit to Barcelona.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: My first option everytime I need to go to Barcelona, great location, good service, nice people
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Juan David,
It is always such a pleasure to welcome back our returning guests.
We are happy to read that you had a good stay with us. Nothing makes us more happy then our happy guest, so we hope to see you soon again.
Best wishes
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Pretty nasty topic coming up: no toilet brushes available in the entire hotel. And the poor cleaning ladies need to clean it for you by hand each time. They also don't have brushes in their equipment, which makes it even more disgusting and such an unhuman work.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Daniel,
Thank you for your concern, but I would like to inform you that we have very strict protocols for cleaning concerning the healthcare of our staff.
Due to hygienic reasons the rooms do not have toilet brushes , but the housekeeping team has the appropriate tools and products for this purpose.
We hope that you will consider us for your next visit to Barcelona.
All the best
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
The most annoying thing was the stinky smell in the room that comes from bathroom and toilet also the bed mattress was super uncomfortable also there is no water kettle but the mini bar was free and they refell it every day also there is no bathrobes even though its 4 star hotel!
Parkering super expensive 23 euros per day so I recommend to buy it as package with the reservation it will be cheaper it's located under the hotel and it has direct access to the hotel and it has very good advantage that its the same parking for one of the biggest shopping mall in Barcelona
The location of the hotel is very good if you have a car or using the public transport also it's near to the sea and not so far from the centre of the city
Breakfast was really expensive it's 16 euro per person so I did not buy it because I could have breakfast for 4 euros at the shopping mall next to the hotel
Having a drink in the evening at the corner bar at floor 0 was. Very nice because of the great and happy bartender that works there

So in general my experience was not so good but also not bad it just the problem is that the hotel doesn't feel like 4 Starts Hotel it feels like maximum 3 Stars Hotel
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Nadim,
Many thanks for for contacting us. Although we would have liked your stay to have been better, we are glad to see that it was overall positive.
Regarding the bad smell, this is due to external causes as they go up the sewers. If this happens, you just have to contact our reception department as they have specific products for the smell.
I do beleive that our parking pricing is competitive against other parking, especially taking into account that it is a full day price.
We would love for you to give us another chance and make your stay memorable.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Excellent hotel, room was modern great views. And to all the staff who work in the bar are unbelievably nice and wore helpful with the best places to visit
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Shane,
Many thanks for your amazing review. 
We are happy to read that you had a good stay with us. Nothing makes us more happy then our happy guest,  and that all of the service that you have received has been of the highest quality.
We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you. Have a beautiful day!
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Wow - wonderful hotel, comfortable beds, incredible views and very convenient to the concert venue (which is why we chose this hotel).   Easy to get to other locations - walk, taxi, metro all possible.  Both pools were amazing.  Cafe at one of the 3rd floor pool had great Hamburg!!!Loved laying in bed and watching the night skyline!!!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Hannibal Adventures,
Many thanks for having the time to contact us.
We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Hotel. Hopefully we will see you again in the future.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Its an ok hotel definitely should not be rated four stars. We stayed at another hotel this vacation that was also rated four stars and the difference in quality is a lot. Rooms do not have a window which opens which gives the rooms a musty smell. Its close to the beach but relatively far away from other things
reviews.owner_answer:
Good morning,
Thanks a lot for your feedback.
We regret that your experience was not completely positive in our hotel; we do our best every day to give the best service and facilities to our guests.
For security reasons our windows in rooms can´t be opened. But next time you are with us I recommend you to reserve a superior room instead of a standard one as all superiors have balcony or terrace and so you can go outside.
We will be more than glad it you give us the chance to welcome you back in a very next future, maybe in a different room type.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Plus: Rooms were adequate for a family of four. Beach was roughly  20 min walk. Nice view of the water. Nice mall right around the corner.

Negative: Very large hotel with over 20 floors and only 3 elevators. Regardless of what time we tried to use them, there was always a long wait. Also, one had a constant leak coming from the ceiling which left a splash-worthy puddle on the elevator floor. Staff walked by and were not concerned. Wifi is more complicated to set up and use then it needs to be. Other hotels allow you to just connect. Here, you need to input a username and password. Only then can you TRY to use the internet....as long as your sitting in the right corner....facing the right direction. Otherwise, you're booted and have to try again.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Mr. Silva,
Many thanks for sharing your review. Although we would have liked your stay to have been better, we are glad to see that it was overall positive.
Thank you also for your constructive feedback on the Wi-Fi strength, which I have shared with our technical team who will review this, and I am sorry for the water falling from the elevator was due to the condensation from the air conditioning, which has been fixed.
We'd love to see you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
It was a very dated room, I could see the vision they had, it just wasn't executed properly..I became scornful with a lot because it just didn't seem that clean.

My biggest issue was the bathroom. It didn't seem THAT clean and the liquid soap looked like it hadn't been refilled in a long time.
The staff however were very lovely and the location qas absolutely perfect.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Cherise,
Many thanks for letting us know your concerns.
We regret that your experience was not completely positive in our hotel; we do our best every day to give the best service and facilities to our guests.
We are very concerned to hear your comment about cleanliness. Please rest assured that room cleanliness is a matter that we take very seriously and is of paramount importance to us and is something we follow very strict procedures about in the hotel. We have brought this incident to the immediate attention of the respective department head for improvement
We hope to see you back in the not too distant future to enjoy a much better experience.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
The only good thing about the hotel is its location. We have had over 280 guests located there for 5 days and everyday I received complaints about how they were mistreated by the hotel staff. Rudeness as its high, and poor attention. Repeated calls to have room service, as they wouldn’t send up the order, annoying cards constantly not working.
The staff must be very burnt out as they don’t care about their customers
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Monica,
Thank you for contacting us.
I am sorry to read your comment, although we are not aware of any complaints on your part during your stay. We will carry out the necessary investigations and we will contact your company to discuss in detail any aspect that you deem appropriate.
Have a good day.
Santiago Hernandez
Director
Translated by Google ・ See original (Spanish)

reviews.review_text: Two major inconveniences: the windows don't open easily, you can get them open with the right tool, but not everyone has that in their baggage, second: the room service is painfully over-cleanly, they threw away two receipts that I was missing later, they also threw my dirty clothes (on a chair) into my suitcase where my clean clothes were. Not cool.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Stefan,
Thanks a lot for  your feedback. We regret that your experience was not completely positive in our hotel; we do our best every day to give the best service and facilities to our guests.
There is a reason why windows can´t be opened, and it´s for security purposes. For any question you just have to contact reception but never use any tool to open it.
About housekeeping department, I sorry if they moved your receipts and clothes. I will talk to the head of the department so that something like this does not happen again.
We hope we have the chance to meet your expectations in the future and make you have a very different experience.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
This is a great hotel to stay near the convention centre. The bathroom and rooms are too small for 2 people to stay. Check before you go!
Otherwise the accessibility to metro station, tram station and mall is great. Location is very near to the beach which makes it even better.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Tarjani,
Many thanks for sharing your experience.
We are so glad to see you had a great stay and you enjoyed our convenient location.
The rooms measure 25ms, and this is the correct size for a 4-star hotel. However, we have superior rooms that are larger and also have a terrace.
We would really like to welcome you back again.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Been here before and love the place.

Really great location and the rooms are really nice with amazing views in every direction.

We received amazing service and hospitality from nico at the bar downstairs and David at the bar upstairs.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Carl,
Many thanks for your amazing review.
We are so pleased to read your feedback and realise you had such a great stay, and we are so proud of your words to Nico and David. We will pass your comments to them as this kind of reviews which helps us to keep going in the right direction.
We look forward to welcoming you again.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: I didn't like how one of the reception staff were cold and impatient. Except  that everything was good. The location is not the best if you want to see the Barcelona attractions but anyway it is easy to get anywhere from here so not a big problem. The rooftop pool is small but heated and there is towels available for use which is convenient specially in colder seasons.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Neysam,
Many thanks for your kind revivew.
We are pleased to see you had a great time us and your overall experience was a positive one, but I´m so sorry to read the reception staff wa not so kind. Your comment about the staff will be reported to the managers to improve your next stay with us.
We hope to see you back in the not too distant future.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
A very average hotel and I've no idea how they are considered four star. The whole place feels a little tired. The reception seems like an easyJet check-in desk. The rooftop pool is tiny and freezing. The room is bland without coffee making facilities. Cheap plastic furniture on the balcony.
There's nothing around the hotel that's worth doing either. A generic shopping mall with chain food outlets and other identikit hotels. That's it.
It's close to a tram and a metro stop though so consider that you will need to travel to see Barcelona... the hotel is clean at least.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Rob,
Thank you for taking the time to review your stay and I am sorry that we did not make a better impression upon you during your stay.
Our guest's comments are very important to us so we can always try to improve by delivering the best customer service possible. This insight will be taken to heart and utilized to focus our improvement efforts.
I do hope that we will have the opportunity to turn around your experience for you in the future.
I wish you a great day
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Good location and everything was great.  The rooms are very clean and spacious.  The variety of breakfast provided was excellent. Would like to thank the reception staff especially Marcel,  Maria and Olga for their help and assistance during our stay. The swimming pool is small however, plenty of nice beaches around. Definitely will stay again in the hotel whenever we get back to Barcelona.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Gasan,
Thank you for the positive feedback and maximum scores.
We are glad to learn about your experience and more than anything, we are thrilled to read that you would definitely come again to stay at Barcelona Princess Hotel for a new amazing experience with us.
I will pass your comments to them, as it is the greatest encouragement for everyone to continue delivering service that we are so proud of.
See you soon again!
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: We spent 7 days at the property and most went without incident. One night came in around 10:30 pm and asked the restaurant in the lobby for coffee and dessert to go they said dessert could not be prepared to go but we could call room service or they could order for us we agreed. When arriving at the room phone rings a woman is screaming that that particular dessert is not available and hung up. Within 30sec she called back and asked if there was something else I wanted instead my answer was no. The next day we went out and upon our return found the room was clean but the wet towels from the floor where just hanging and not replaced. We still had a good time in Barcelona but will not be recommending this particular hotel, for the price need better attitude is expected from staff.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hoi Silvia.
Thank you for contacting us as all comments help us to offer a better service.
I am sorry to hear that your experience was not positive and I am sorry to hear about your incident with the room service staff. The vast majority of our guests are delighted with the service of the hotel staff. I apologize if this was not the case on this occasion.
Regarding room cleaning, if the guest wants the towels to be changed they have to leave them on the floor. If not, our staff understands that the guest does not want them to be changed and leaves them hanging.
We hope that you will choose to return to our hotel in the future so that we can make your next stay with us a brilliant one.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Currently staying in this hotel it’s 2:20am no air conditioning  so the rooms at 28 degrees the website clearly advises rooms with air conditioning my boyfriend has been down the staff were in unhelpful how it’s a 4.5 star hotel I don’t no, rooms are basic small tv every time u get in the shower it floods the whole room just to get snacks or drinks out the vending machine thing it takes a €50 deposit that gets refunded a couple days later for €2 items  breakfast costs €19pp per day wouldn’t recommend to anyone would avoid
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Ruby,
We are disappointed that we didn't meet your expectations this time. Please accept our apologies and rest assured that we will continue working to ensure that the satisfaction of our guests continues to improve.
For sustainability reasons the hotel has air conditioning in summer and heating in winter.
This year the temperatures have risen suddenly and we are currently in the process of making the change from hot to cold.
We would be delighted if you would give us a second chance to provide you with the quality service that our customers are used to.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
More like a 3 star hotel…
We didn‘t get a room with sea view although we booked a room with sea view. Our room was on the 4th floor so basically the lowest level. It‘s not possible to have sea view from this level so maybe the hotel should consider not calling the room on the 4th floor a „room with sea view“! We would get the same view if we had booked a room with city view (which is way cheaper) summarized: we spent more money for a view we didn‘t even get.
Wifi didn‘t work at all in our room. The staff gave me another wifi but it didn‘t work as well which was really annoying.
reviews.owner_answer:
Good morning,
Thanks for contactins us.
We are sorry to read your review, but we would need your full name and reservation number to check your file and give you an appropriated answer. You can send an e-amil directly to the hotel and we will aswer as soon as possible.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Kindest regards
Hotel  Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
It’s a nice hotel to stay with one of the highest pools in Barcelona. It is a true experience to use the elevators with windows until level 23. service is usually good and so is the staff. Food at the fool is really nice. Rooms are okay.
The location of the hotel is not really close to the Center but if you combine it with a nice walk you enjoy this walk by the sea.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Sebastian,
Many thanks for such a good review.
I am happy you did enjoy your stay overall, and hopefully you can return in the future and have another experience as good as this one.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Nice Hotel, with a great Location. Amazing View and the Pool was nice on the Top.
The beach not so far from there.
I stayed here 3 nights, during the OffWeek Festival, and definietly worth it.
The Staff was friendly as well. I would be back next year.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Afterlight,
Many sincere thanks for your kind review. I am very happy to hear that our services and location made such a positive impression and that you had a memorable experience. We take pride in taking care of our guests and are very pleased that your expectations were highly met. Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to welcome you back very soon.
Kind regards,
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Great hotel if visiting the conference center.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Trevor,
Thanks for your review.
We are glad to see yu had a great stay and that our location was convenient for your needs, so we hope to see you back again.
Best regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Certainly have comfy bed & pillow, we get room with city view in 21 floor, just fyi swimming pool  open from 7 am til 7 pm. Would be perfect if they could provide kettle, sachet of tea, coffee & two cup so we can enjoy the view while having a cup of tea in the room.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Nina,
Many thanks for sharing your concerns.
We are glad to see you had a great stay and you felt comfortable and appreciated our facities.
We will be gald to welcome you again.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
I looked up the definition of 4 star hotel, yes technically this is one, but it definitely doesn't operate as one. Room, even though big, with comfy big beds and with nice view on Barcelona, has moldy ceiling, moldy tiles, toilet that doesn't stop running. Toilet was fixed on a second day after asking for a second time.
Gym is 5 machines cramped in a glass room. 2 swimming pools are too small for amount of guests this hotel holds.
Service is underwhelming, nothing is explained, in any hotel you are given information on where the facilities are, what time do those operate, here you are just given your keycard. I asked for a spoon, they don't know how to get you one.
Location is very nice, 12 minutes walk to the beach, 3 minutes to the metro, that gets you to the city center and next to a nice mall.
Parking is under the mall, €20 a day. If you don't mind a 9 minute walk, there is a parking garage 2 streets away, it said you  can park for €9 a day(August 2022), google: parquing subterrani ccib &diagonal mar.
Oh yeah, you have to wait forever for elevator.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Anastasia,
Many thanks for your detailed review.
We take our guests' feedback seriously and act on them without delay, in order to serve you and all our guests better. We would like to achieve excellence in all aspects of our Hotel and we would love to take your points and experience on board to continue to improve our service.
We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, and we will strive to provide you with a superb experience.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
The hotel is overall amazing! The room views are totally breathtaking and the room is very spacious. There is room service everyday which can't be taken for granted nowadays after covid. They offer breakfast in room for a price and you can check in early. I am completely satisfied with my experience here!

Edit: one more thing I forgot to mention is that they provide you with a mobile that you can use to make calls inside Spain and Google maps completely for free!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Omar,
Many thanks for such a good description of your experience after your stay with us.
I'm really pleased you enjoyed your stay overall. I will pass on your comments to the relevant departments to ensure they are acknowledged.
We hope to see you back in a not distant future.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Good quality of service, very nice view, pool on the 23rd floor, clean, well renovated. Fine value/money relation. Definetelly worth to stay!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Olena,
Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, I am pleased to see your stay with us was a great one and the staff will be delighted to see you comments. We all hope to see you again on your next visit to Barcelona.
Best wishes
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Got upgraded to a balcony room. Fantastic views. No kettle or ironing board however. Room clean but could do with a refurb.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Farhan,
Thanks a lot for sharing your feedback.
We are so glad to see you enjoyed your room with balcony and the whole stay was great for you.
All our rooms have a minibar that is free and that our team restocke every day. There is no coffee facilities in room, but you can take a coffee, tea, or whatever you prefer in our bar or even order it to our room  service.
I also understand your concern regarding the irons, however it is for security (fire risk) and electric network limit reasons why we do not have irons available for our guests. We have a laundry service available, we pick up your clothes and give them you back during the same day.
We hope that you will consider us for your next visit to Barcelona.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
The hotel is located in a 26-store building next to a shopping mall in a nice, though a bit distant neighborhood (~12 euro by cab to the city center). It has two small pools (usually almost fully occupied, and closed already at 19:00 / 20:00). Considering that due to COVID-19 the hotel wasn't fully occupied, I assume on a normal year one should be lucky to get a place by the pool.

The beach is some 10 minutes walk, and is fine.

Our experience wasn't all positive. For four days we were lacking soap, although I mentioned that to the reception a couple of times. The WiFi requires a lot of operations to connect every time you go from one floor to another. Breakfast was decent, but they lack chairs in one hall, which is probably why we were asked to sit in the second hall despite free tables in the first one (in which the food is located).

We had to change the key cards several times. We have been told they were extremely sensitive to electronics, including close contact with a phone, they get demagnetized. A possibility of a broken lock was also mentioned by the reception, but never confirmed.

There were also some minor technical issues like the toilet door not closing, waiting time at the elevator, some cracks here and there - those are hard to fix and probably not worth it, but they added up to the total count.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Mikhail,
Many thanks for your rating.
We are pleased to see  your overall experience have been positive but we would have like it was even better.
We hope you give us another chance to make your next review a 5*
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Value for money.
Amazing views. I think room with city Scape view is amazing than sea view if you love architecture. Great breakfast. Rahman Bhai at reception is great guy to help if you need suggestions.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Souvik,
Thank you for such a fabulous review. We were absolutely delighted to learn how much you enjoyed your stay and in particular we are most grateful for your kind words regarding our staff. We are thrilled to learn that Rahman Bhai on reception stood out to you especially as delivering outstanding service. We very much hope to see you on another occasion very soon.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Great place to stay with lovely interior designs and settings. Friendly and helpful staff. The room is modern and well furnished. Breakfast was very good with a lot of local and fresh ingredients. The hotel has glass-paned elevators so you can see most of Barcelona going up and down in the day and the night lights are just stunning. The best thing is the rooftop heated pool! Highly recommend!

Really pretty nice staff in tha pretty nice hotel.
Rich breakfast till 11:00 made my day 👍
Clean, light, good looking, accommodation close to the beaches! …
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Tomas,
Many thanks for contacting us.
I am very happy to hear that our services made such a positive impression and that you had a memorable experience. We take pride in taking care of our guests and are very pleased that your expectations were highly met. Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to welcome you back very soon.
Kind regards,
Hotel Barcelona Princes

reviews.review_text: Stayed here for our mini honeymoon which was brilliant but the hotel itself lacked basic things such as a kettle in the room and no conditioner (only shampoo and shower gel). The hotel was very clean but lots of bits seem run down and the 2 pools are a lot smaller than they look in the photos! Transport links to the centre of Barcelona are brilliant with tram, bus and metro line on the door step and the Bleu Bar across the road sells lovely cocktails! Breakfast was really tasty at the hotel but cold which took away a bit of the enjoyment! As a base this hotel is great but if you are looking to spend a fair bit of time in the hotel I wouldn’t recommend it for that! Staff were really friendly and helpful and the luggage room for checking out day is really handy if you’ve got a late flight! Overall I would stay again but I wouldn’t expect a 4 star stay!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Connor,
Thank you very much for having taken your time to make us aware of your concerns. Your comments help us to evaluate and improve the experiences of our guests.
I´m glad to see your overall experience was  a positive one and to read that you would come again. And also happy to see you appreciate our location, breakfast and specially our staff, always willing to do their best to make guests feel at home.
We are a urban hotel so we don´t have much space for swimming pool, and we have two... one of tem an infinity pool with an amazing view to the sea.
There is no coffee facilities or kettle in room, but you can take a coffee, tea, or whatever you prefer in our bar or even order it to your room as we have a room service opened until 22.00h
Wd hope you consider us for your next stay in Barcelona
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Staff were rude and unprofessional restaurant didn't have 80% of the listed items on the menu, breakfast was a waste of time as was much better to walk to the mall next door and have breakfast in the food court and lunch and dinner was very nice on the terrace of the shopping mall. My hotel room had the last person that stayed in the room's socks in there and the hotel was not 4 star standards it was more suitable as a 3 star hotel
reviews.owner_answer:
Good morning,
Thanks for contacting us.
I am sorry that your experience with us was not a good one and I am especially sorry that there was something from the previous guest in your room. We have very strict protocols with the cleanliness of the rooms, so I will contact the head of the department so that this does not happen again.
As for the restaurant, maybe in some occasion we do not have some of the dishes on the menu available, but never 80%. Except in some punctual occasion we always have available all our gastronomic offer.
And as for the staff, most of the reviews received are positive in terms of treatment and service. I am sorry that you did not feel that way.
If we failed to provide you a comfortable stay, we would like the opportunity to rectify your experience.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Nice, but very very very very slow elevator.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Victoria,
I am pleased to see that your lasting impression is a positive one and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back at Barcelona Princess hotel the next time your travels take you to Barcelona.
Best wishes
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
I'd go back there.
Wonderful experience.
Very clean, staff very friendly, fair price.
The beach was just in front of the hotel.
It's a very pleasant stay indeed!
Thanks
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Carla,
Many thanks for sharing your experience with us.
I am happy you did enjoy your stay overall, and hopefully you can return in the future and have another experience as good as this one.
I wish you a great day
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Nice hotel but there is a huge lack of basic facilities. I couldn't buy even a bottle of water from the reception, because apparently they run out of water. I had to change the card a couple of times during our stay. No vending machine to get a water or any drink, no drinks in the fridge, no kettle or espresso machine in the room.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Andi,
Thank you very much for having taken your time to make us aware of your concerns. Your comments help us to evaluate and improve the experiences of our guests.
We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: The hotel is just amazing for its’ price. The view on the top in pool as well as in the rooms is just unbelievable. Breakfast is good as well. Rooms are ok, just maybe small refreshment would be good. My stay was just so cool
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Andrii,
Many thanks for giving us the maximum score.
We are absolutely thrilled and extremely happy to hear that you had such an amazing stay with us.
Thank you very much for having chosen us, we look forward to have you back in the near future.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Hotel is quite old and runned down the shower head was falling apart, decoration and interiors are definitely from the 90's, staff was not very friendly. The pool area is quite small and only has 5 sunbeds for 363 rooms, so if you're planning to spend some time on the roof you need to get there at 7 am when they open to get a bed. Giving it 2 stars only because of the view, Overall i think there are way better places to stay in Barcelona.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Angelo,
Thanks for contascting us.
It’s disappointing to hear that you weren't completely satisfied with the conditions of our hotel. We pride ourselves on providing excellent service and a comfortable environment to our guests at all times so please know that your concerns will be addressed to the appropriate members of our team.
I do hope that we will have the opportunity to turn around your experience for you in the future.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Treat yourself and stay here! Great hotel, with nice views, both on the city and sea side. The rooms are cozy (better than seen on booking). The rooms might need some renovations, but the equipment is  new, towels are snow white and soft, luxury toiletries. Free minibar with refreshments and beer renewed every day.
Good and fresh breakfast. Hydromassage in the room which was quite new and worked perfectly👌
And as addition to this, they gave me nice cake with candle for my birthday❤️
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Elena,
We are honored to know that you had an enjoyable stay with us and we thank you for the positive feedback.
We are glad to learn about your experience and more than anything, we are thrilled to read that you would definitely come again to stay at Barcelona Princess Hotel for a new amazing experience with us, so we hope to see you back soon again.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Hotel's selling point is their rooftop pool but, contrary to what was written on their website, this was closed for the entirety of my 5 day stay.

When I mentioned this to two receptionists they were unaware of what the hotel's website stated, and instead of being proactive asked ME, the client, to come back the next day as no manager was present.

Upon finally meeting the manager all he could offer was a free breakfast.

There are a number of 4 star hotels in the area at more competitive prices and u I would never have chosen Princess if I'd known the pool was out of order. However, it was more the slow and uninterested response from staff that angered me.

The room itself had a nice view but tiny TV and very old fittings, while one day we were left without soap in the shower (this is refilled by cleaning staff). I'd recommend this hotel only if a very convenient price as ares is not particularly central.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Matthew,
Many thanks for this review.
I´m upset to see your stay didn´t meet your expectations.  Our mail goal is guest satisfaction and according to you rate we didn´t achieve it.
During the period you stayed with us, rooftop pool was working properly. The point is that it closes at 7pm. I guess you tried to use it after that time and that´s why you though it was closed.
I hope you give us a second change to turn around your experience .
I wish you a great day.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Spotless clean, great sea view and rooftop view. Rooms are fansy and spacious, service is wonderfull. Near to metro station and groceries needed. All best recommendation.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Dragana,
Many thanks for staying with us and for your recommendation.
We strive to provide memorable experiences for our guests, and it is wonderful to hear that we succeeded, so we hope to welcome you back again in a very next future.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: the hotel was good , we had 2 negatives 1 being no tea /coffee making facilitys in the room , and no usb to charge our phones. the bed was to hard for me but ok for the other half. very expensive hotel bar so go out and about .clean rooms , warm pool, good breakfast [ bit expensive ] staff friendly .shopping mall next door loads to eat and shopping.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Karen,
Many thanks for contacting us.
We are so happy to see your overall experience was a positive one and you enjoyed our service and facilities.
There is no coffee facilities in room, but you can take a coffee, tea, or whatever you prefer in our bar or even order it to our room service.
We hope that you will consider us for your next visit to Barcelona.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
First of all we booked this place as a quick city break for 3 nights in a 4 star hotel. In reality we got a dirty room and the hotel resembled a youth hostel.

The first room we had was a disgrace, the shower was even hanging off the wall. The second room was better but still things were wrong with it. When asked if we could have aircon as we were sweating in the bed the night before (which was as solid as concrete by the way) we were told “you can only have hot air” we came away thinking we were going to have a relaxing break but in reality going home needing a break more than ever. Dont stay here if you’re used to a touch of luxury and in need of a rest.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Ryan,
Although we may not always enjoy receiving negative feedback, it certainly allows us to opportunity to review the services we provide.
We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.
I wish you a great day
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: They say it’s a four-star hotel. I’m giving this to star rating because I don’t even think it’s a one star hotel for $4000 for five days very very tiny all words like howling and very tiny room. I would not recommend this hotel
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Jason,
Thanks for your feedback.This is the exact opposite reaction we were hoping to have. It is never a good feeling when a guest at our property has been disappointed by their visit.
We regret that on this occasion we have not fulfilled your expectations, and I would appreciate it if you would detail us in a more concrete way the inconveniences that you had during your stay to be able to treat them carefully.
I do beleive that our pricing is competitive against similar quality of establishements locally. We constantly monitor our competitors prices to ensure that our prices are fair and I am confident that this is the case just now.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Amazing rooms with beautiful views. Great staff & service. Overall a great experience. 👌
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Rohan,
We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at Barcelona Princess. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback. I will share your comments with our team.
We’re hoping to see you back very soon, given the good experience so far.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Nice hotel. Rooms are nice and modern and the views are really nice of the city. Close to the beach. Good transport links. The shopping centre next door is convenient.

Big problem for me though was the lack of air con. The room are a set temperature of 21 degrees. That's warm where ever your from and you can't change it. They just shrug at you when you ask. I'd say that's the only negative.

The free minibar is good and the showers are amazing!

I enjoyed this hotel for its great location and the setup of the rooms. Everything is efficiently placed and all space is put to good use. My one complaint is that there was no coffee machine or kettle in the room - no free access to hot drinks. There was free coke, bottled water and a lemon drink but no way to make coffee other than buying it at the cafe downstairs or in one of the restaurants.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Sara-Anne,
Thank you so much for your rating.
I´m so glad to see you had such a great time with us and you enjoyed our service and facilities.
All our rooms have a free minibar that we fill every day. They don´t have kettle coffee facilities but you can go to one of our bars to enjoy of our coffee, tea or whatever your wish or If you prefer you can ask our team to take it to the room as our room service is open 24h/day.
We hope to see you back soon again.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princes

reviews.review_text:
Hotel was absolutely amazing, great location. The staff were very attentive and helpful especially Gabriel from the restaurant ans Anna at the reception.

Would highly recommend this Hotel
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Pro Gamer Singh,
Many thanks for your amazing review and recommendation.
It´s a pleasure to get such good reviews, we work hard every day to maximize our clients´ satisfaction. I will make sure that Gabriel and Anna will be recognised for their great service.
The team and I are all so excited to welcome you back soon!
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Very good hotel. Amazing view of Barcelona. It’s in a good location. The breakfast is good and the bar is amazing. The pancakes where not the best. Karlos was very kind and friendly bar tender. Overall good hotel.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Dan,
Many thanks for sharing your review.
Your many positive comments are really appreciated and we would like to thank you for taking the time to inform us about your recent visit to Barcelona Princess Hotel. I will make sure that Karlos will be recognised for her great service.
We hope to see  you soon again.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
In many reviews people mentioned free mini bar but in our fridge it was empty.
The room we got was not the same as in the picture: We got 5th floor which is very low so the view was not good. There is only one chair in the room and the staff said they don’t provide a second chair. So it is very hard for both me and my partner to work in the room. The desk was very small as well so only have space for one computer. If the room is designed for two people, then this small desk and one chair are not reasonable at all.
The pool is very small and the water was not so clean. No staff around to control so people are smoking weeds. Breakfast is English style, no chance to experience Spanish breakfast such as churros or tortillas. The bathroom is not very couple friendly because there is no wall so you can hear everything...
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Ni,
Many thanks for sharing your experience.
We regret that your experience was not completely positive in our hotel; we do our best every day to give the best service and facilities to our guests.
First of all I would like to let you know that all photos published are updated and not retouched, so what you see is exactly what we have. All standard rooms are the same, so they are as shown in our site. To have a higher floor you must reserve a sea view or a city view room.
About the minibar, due to COVID restictions is not available (as indicated in the website) but you have 2 free bottles of water in the room.
We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Great location next to a shopping mall, grocery store, metro, and tram. The staff is really polite and pleasant. They have a great selection for their breakfast buffet. The room was clean and had a gorgeous bathroom however I didn't find he bed comfortable. Although, I will still come back for the location and the cleanest of the hotel.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Beata, we are very pleased to know thath your stay with was comfortabel, we are  happy to have fulfilled your expectances, it was l be a pleasure hot have you with us and we hope to see y ou again.
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
While I was here just for one night my rooms was less then comfortable . The air conditioning would not work, bed literally on wheels slid across the floor anytime you moved and also had one large pillow rather then, you know a normal set up.

Overall not a pleasant nights sleep. Can't offer more insight into the hotel grounds as I didn't explore.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear guest,
First, I want to thank you for your feedback. While I wish you had had a better experience. We will take your comment into account to solve possible issues and improve our services.
We hope that you will give us another try on your next visit to Barcelona so that we can provide you with the experience that you truly deserve.
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: After a long drive from switzerland, we arrived at the hotel and wanted to check in. At this point, we were extremly exhausted and just wanted to sleep in a bed. then the receptionist said, we were too late. I dont understand now, what is the meaning of a reservation???? I mean, we would‘ve paid for the days we booked, and we even had to deposit our credit card for the reservation. Now what is the meaning of this reservation??? Very bad, very unfriendly people!!!! Then they also craved for another deposit of 600 EUR!!! Never again.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Ernis,
I am sorry for the situation that occurred upon your arrival at the hotel, but your reservation was for the night of the 25th. If on the day of the scheduled arrival the client does not show up at the hotel, the reservation is automatically cancelled in its entirety, so when you arrived there was no reservation in your name.
At that time if the hotel has rooms available, you can stay, but you must leave a deposit that will be returned upon departure.
We hope we have clarified what happened.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
We stayed here for 4 nights at the end of October. It was a surprise for my birthday, my husband chose it and I'm glad he did. Lovely large room with a (sideways) sea view. Massive bed. High end fittings.
The only downside is that the en-suite could not be closed off from the room. There is a large glass door but the magnetic catch no longer holds. As the windows do not open we had to find other toilets 😉, not a problem - a little 'design over functionality' issue. Basic, but necessary 🙄
Breakfast is a generous buffet with lots of different dishes. There is no evening restaurant service but that's not a problem, all of Barcelona beckons.
The hotel is close to many restaurants  a huge shopping mall and loads of transport options. We walked to the beach every day, again lots of restaurants for tapas - and more. The pools are small, OK for kids. It's a city hotel not a beach resort.
Altogether a great place to stay, thoroughly recommended.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Nikki,
Many thanks for your recommendation and for staying with us.
I´m really glad to see your 5* which means we have meet your expectations.
All our rooms are designed to take advantage of the daylight and that´s why the bathroom is open plan. But if you want privacy there is a full glass wall looking out to the sea with an electric blackout blind so you can adjust your privacy/lighting as needed. And there is also a door that you can close to have two different and completely private spaces.
Our Corner Bar is opened untill 1.00am, but we have a 24h room service and you can always ask for something to drink or some cold dish.
We’re hoping to see you back very soon, given the good experience so far.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Well, they don’t have iron which is basic need if you staying in a hotel, the excuse is security reason, this is non sense, staff on reception is not very helping, so overall they need to meet the standards of 4 stars. Not recommend until they give 4 stars facilities
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Hamna,
Thank you very much for having taken your time to make us aware of your concerns. Your comments help us to evaluate and improve the experiences of our guests.
We are disappointed that we didn't meet your expectations this time. Please accept our apologies and rest assured that we will continue working to ensure that the satisfaction of our guests continues to improve.
We understand your concern regarding the irons, however it is for security (fire risk) and electric network limit reasons why we do not have irons available for our guests. We have a laundry service available, we pick up your clothes and give them you back during the same day. We also provide an express service if it´s more suitable for you, both pressing and laundry.
We hope this doesn´t discourage you from staying with us again.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
The hotel was great,
clean and nice.
The breakfast was well, but something for everyone.
Overall, everything was fine and we were satisfied.
Unfortunately, only the manager at the front desk was very rude and unprofessional.
in the end, he puts the other nice employees in the shade.
A pity.
One should not forget that the guest is king and therefore you should not dissociate unnecessarily.
and a lift more would not hurt either.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Yenniraah,
Many thansk for staying with us and for your review.
We are glad dto see you had a good time and you appreciate our cleanliness, breakfast and facilities.
Regarding the staff, I like to inform you that service is one of our main concerns. They are all trained to give the best of themselves to be helpful and kind, as satisfaction of our guests is our main goal.
We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Stayed here for a week in May. Hotel is fantastically. Rooms are very big and modern. Large windows, mini fridge is free and stocked daily with glass bottles of coke, sparkling water and beer. Modern lighting, air conditioning and electric blackout blinds which can be closed from the bed :)

Had breakfast one morning, a bit pricey but a lovely buffet. The food in the pool bar was nice, their club sandwich is fantastic! Food was cheap and delicious. Had food brought up as room service and only cost one euro extra per dish.

The pools are both quite small but this is a business orientated hotel so what do you expect. It's still very nice, the rooftop pool has a great view. Unfortunately the weather wasn't very warm when we visited.

The staff are friendly, the food was nice and the room is affordable. It's beside a beach, tram line and shipping centre. It's a little bit out of the way but it's worth it die to the price, services and features.

I spent 5 nights in this stunning hotel. The facilities were superb and I enjoyed spending hours in the rooftop pool. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly 😊 free mini bar which was refilled everyday and gift package made my experience much better. I would highly recommend it. The perfect balance between a sun holiday and a city break.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Michelle,
Thank you very much for your rating. We are happy to see that we have lived up to your expectations in terms of quality, service and facilities and happy you appreciated our staff. The team just love what they do and it´s great to hear it shows. And thank you for highlighting them all.
We hope to see yu back again for another amazing experience.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
We arrived a day later as our flight was delayed the day before. When checking in, we asked the staff member if it was possible to accommodate us for missing our check in date the day prior due to our flight being delayed. The staff members at the front desk were extremely rude and not sympathetic at all to the unfortunate circumstances with our flight. They did not refund us for missing a day that was not under our control or giving us any type of accommodation for the inconvenience. Once arriving to our room the door lock would not lock. We called to request the door to be fixed and the front desk representative said a technician will be up shortly. The technician never came.. We went down stairs the next day to talk to them about the same issue with the door lock as it was not resolved when requested.The front desk insured us it will be done. It was extremely concerning for us as we are trusting the hotel to be able to leave our personal belongings in our room and the lack of consideration of not taking action right way is horrible customer service.
The only positive thing this hotel has to offer is the view from the pool but overall I would not recommend this hotel. They don't care for there customers that travel from different parts of the world to provide a trusting and caring experience to keep our mind at ease to have an enjoyable vacation.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Drew,
Many thanks for your review concerning your recent stay with us.
Please may we pass on our sincere apologies that in this instance we failed to exceed your expectations.
I´m so sorry to see you didn´t feel welcome by our team. I like to inform you that service is one of our main concerns. They are all trained to give the best of themselves to be helpful and kind, as satisfaction of our guests is our main goal…I´m sorry you didn´t notice it this time.
You reserved a non refundable room, and as written in terms and conditions this reservation can not be cancelled or modify. That’s why we also offer flexible rates, so the guest has de chance to choose the most suitable option.
About the door, they all need a battery to be opened by the key card, and sometimes this battery runs out and they need to be changed.
We are very sorry to hear that you were disappointed with the quality of your breakfast and dinner you experienced during your stay. We have passed your comments to our culinary team so we can improve our offerings and we are welcoming your comments.
I do hope that you would stay again as we like the chance to change your mind.
Kindest regards

Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Loved my stay here. Great service and friendly staff, regular housekeeping. The views from the pool on the 23rd floor are  great and the spa is amazing. Ideally located next to the conference center, very convenient! Really enjoyed the whole experience.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Trisha,
Many thanks for your review.
We are delighted to hear that your experience was enjoyable and will be pleased to celebrate this with the colleagues who made it all possible.
We hope to see you ba ck soon again.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Absolutely fantastic! I love everything about this place. We had a very positive experience with the receptionists (very welcoming, helpful). We had a room with a great view, the room itself was very spacious and clean. Very nice breakfast and good restaurant on the ground floor. 5minutes walk to the beach, 3minutes to the metro station. A fairly big shopping centre within 200metres. I'd definitely stay here again! Highly recommended.

Well located, reasonably priced, and very clean. But that’s it.
They were running a promotion on Booking so we booked. We then found ourselves in the company of a hotel full of Axe body spray…
If you’re looking for a classy couple’s getaway, it’s definitely not the place. Forget a trip to rooftop pool, it’s packed with unsavory types doing canon balls from morning to night.
If you’re looking for well-priced party digs for you and 5 friends, you love gold chains, long fake nails, and of course Axe body spray, it’s the place for you.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Sydney,
Many thanks for sharing your thoughts with us.
I am disappointed that these issues have dampened your impression of the hotel, but we accept all king of guest. We do not require any dresscode for being with us.
We would like the opportunity to make ypur next experience a better one.
Regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Needs renovation. Clean room, old furniture. Reception service not friendly. If you go by car first stop near the entrance, go to the reception, pay for thr parking, take the ticket go round the hotel and into the parking place. Smile :)
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Andrei,
Thans a lot for your review.
We are glad to see your overall experience was a positive one but i regret to read our team was not friendly with you. They are all trained to give the best of themselves to be helpful and kind, as satisfaction of our guests is our main goal, so we are so sorry you didin´t notice.
We take note of your comments for our improvement and hope to welcome you soon again.
Regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
It was a pleasant work trip stay. We had a room with a seaview, and you could have a peek at it from the bathroom as well.

This place has everything a hotel needs. There was great service during the company dinner and the had a variety of options over breakfast.

What I personally loved about the place was the cosy room for three and how it was a short distance from the beach and a park though it was prettt much an industrial area.

Excellent staff, cleanly environment. Loved the blackout curtains in the room, as well as the well-renovated bathroom/shower. The air-conditioning was easy to control and very efficient. We used the rooftop pool, which has great views, but if you're looking for something quieter they also have one on the third floor. Would recommend!
reviews.owner_answer:
Nick, thank you for your great comments, we are glad that you had a fantastic experience in our hotel and enjoying our pools. We hope to welcome to soon again.
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Incredible Hotel in Barcelona. The View from our room couldn‘t be better, the breakfast was also really good with fresh fruits and lots of things to choose from. The service was really nice and would help immediately if there was any problem. I would recommend this Hotel for sure!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Laura,
Many thanks indeed for your comments and your recommendation following your recent stay at the Barcelona Princess.
One of our mail goals is a high guest-satisfaction and it´s a pleasure to know that you were overall satisfied during your stay, especially with service provided by our staff, breakfast or our amazing views.
We’re hoping to see you back very soon, given the good experience so far.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Incredible views of the city, you can spend hours looking out the window. The only thing the room didn't have cattle to warm water. It was clean and nice
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Chris,
Many thanks for sharing your opinion.
The hotel is a skyscraper with magnificent  views to the city of Barcelona and to the Mediterranean sea, and from our heated  infinity pool placed in the 23rd floor you can enjoy  one of our best views !! I´m so glad you enjoyed this experience.
We look forward to welcoming you back.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
More than five stars to this beautiful place.
We visited in December and booked a sea facing room. The room was exactly as in pictures. It was my birthday and they sent over cake and champagne with a birthday note.
The heated pool on 23tmrs floor is amazing!!
The service, lobby, sauna, coffee - Superb.

The best view to wake up to.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Pooja,
Many thanks for sharing your experience and for your kind words.
I am delighted to read your kind comments on the experience and to read how much you enjoyed the cake and cava for the celebration. I will share your feedback with the team here and I hope to be able to welcome you back again very soon.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Would give it 3.5 stars. No kettle/coffee in the room, and a leaky shower that had been patched up with sticky tape weren't a great start. The floor is also tiled, not great if you do yoga and don't have a mat. The view is stunning though, the room size is fine and the bed is comfortable, the pool area is nice enough too and it's in close proximity to plenty of shops.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Basil,
Many thanks for your rating.
