We are glad to see you had a pleasant stay with us and you ejoyed our room and views.
All our rooms have a minibar that is free and that our team fill every day. There is no kettle or coffee facilities in room, but you can take a coffee, tea, or whatever you prefer in our bar or even order it to your room as we have a 24h room service.
We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Nice hotel. Could be finished a bit better. The rooms are clean, tidy and modern. The staff are friendly. Don't stay here if you want to be close to the centre of town. There is a metro station around the corner but it's a bit far out for my liking.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Conan,
Many thanks for your feedback.
I´m glad to see you had a great time at Barcelona Princess, located just 3 minutes walking distance to a metro station that takes you downtown in less than half an hour, close to the beach and next to a big shopping mall where you can find everything you need.
We would like to welcome you back again.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
This a very nice Hotel. Outstanding views close to the beach. Loads of foods close by. Best part was the roof top pool. location was brilliant. Nice and tidy room the showers was the best part.
I even got a complementary  birthday cake and cava. Real nice touch
reviews.owner_answer:
Thank you, Dan, for your high scores, we try our best every day to make our guests feel special and help make each experience personal and unique.
We hope you´ll soon visit us again.
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Lovely place. Incredible view, even in the elevator. Nice rooms with good air. Nice staff. Nice breakfast (unfortunately not outside). Ironing express is available, but it has its price. It should be possible to do it by yourself. Unfortunately rooftop pool was not open😪 but there was another one, very small with nice bar for food and drinks (view is not that nice). On this floor is also the sauna. It takes about 10 min to walk to the beach. Metro station in the near, 3 min to walk. Best price/performance ratio in this category. Keep it up! 👍
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Nadine,
Many thanks for your extended review concerning your recent stay at Barcelona Princess Hotel.
We are delighted that you loved so many aspects of your stay. It is a pleasure to read that you loved your room, location, views... I am thrilled that you enjoyed your breakfast and that our friendly staff was such a highlight for you.
We hope to see you back soon again.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: I was there for business travel and I found this property less than impressive.  The hotel across the street is a better option (I stayed there 1 night prior to transferring to this property).  If I had not been required to stay here by my employer i would have checked out after the first night.  My room's bathroom smelled horribly and continuously during my stay.  I alerted the front desk and they said it would be resolved - it wasn't.  I asked the housekeeper on my floor to help.  She tried, but the stench persisted.  Also, I had my do not disturb sign out everyday and I know for a fact that my room was entered each day - nothing was missing, but that's not the point.  Elevators were very slow.  You often waited several minutes before one arrived.  The positives:  The staff were generally friendly and helpful.  The breakfast was nice and had a decent selection.  The meeting rooms met expectations.
reviews.owner_answer:
HI Ted,
We really appreciate your feedback and that you share your experience with us because all the opinions help us to improve and to give a better service day by day.
We are so pleased to read your words about our staff and our breakfast, a large buffet made with high quality products. But we are however disappointed to see your whole experience was not so good as we would like.
About the smell in your room, we contacted our maintenance department who tried to solve this issue in the best way. That day the hotel was fully booked… otherwise we could have change you to another room, but i twas impossible.
We have also contacted our housekeeping deparment and after checking their files, we realized that we didn´t enter to your room every day, but the third. According to our hotel policy, even there is a « no disturb » in the room, our staff must clean it every 3 days.
We regret your experience with our elevators and we appreciate your patience and understanding.  We have 5 elevators, 2 of them from ground floor to business centre, Breakfast restaurant and meeting rooms and 3 panoramic lifts where you can enjoy the views of Barcelona.  We are in process of installing a lift intelligent system to optimize the client flow.
We would like you give us another opportunity to offer you the service that all our guests deserve.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Deleted my previous review as the hotel is dealing with my issue and being helpful.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Savannah,
I am very sorry to read your comment and the bad experience you had. While you were at the hotel and when you explained us the situation we did our best to assist you.
The images from the cameras can only be given to the police and we have already done so. As soon as we have a response from them we will contact you.
For any clarification you can contact us by e-mail to any of the e-mails adresses that we already gave you in the hotel.
I wish you a great day,
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
I have a love hate relationship with the hotel. The location was great. It's in a newly developed part of the city. On the downside, you are right next to some sketchy housing. But there is security at the door, and there is a shopping mall that shares the same block.

As for the amenities, the pool was VERY small, and I alerted the staff and let them know my shower was broken and sprayed water everywhere when you turned it on.

I told them twice on 2 different days.

It was still broken when I checked out.

All in all it looked nice, and it is in a good location to some taxi stands, and the shopping mall. But the fact that they couldn't fix a broken showerhead within the 6 days I stayed, is a problem for me.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello George,
Thanks for letting us know your concerns, it is very important for us to know the opinion of all our guests to improve our services.

I´m glad to see you found the hotel in a convenient location but I´m so concerned to see the feeling you have with hotel and I would like you to accept our sincere apologies that in this instance we failed to exceed your expectations.
I can assure you that your experience with the shower is in no way indicative of the standard of service and care that we do pride ourselves on providing. The relevant departments have been contacted by myself in order to conduct a full investigation into this matter
We would really like to welcome you back again and give us the opportunity to provide the service all our guest are used to
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: ot in love with this hotel. Nice enough but the amenities are lacking. For example, there are no tea kettles in the rooms so you need to go downstairs to get hot water or pay a service charge to have room service deliver hot water. They also do not have irons available so you have to pay to have your clothes pressed if you don't want to look like you just got off an airplane. Bonus - you get to pay an expedite charge if you find this out too late. Location is great if you're going to a conference but not for much else. This is a little nitpicky but the rooms are dark because there are no overhead lights and the ceilings are painted black (great for mood lighting, not for much else). And finally - this hopefully doesn't happen to everyone - the heating and air conditioning was not working so my room was either freezing or a sauna. I ended up moving to a room with a view so that was nice. All in all not the most pleasant experience.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Michael,
I’m sorry there were a few negatives for you, but we thank you for your review and the opportunity to learn from your experience and improve.
We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.
We would like to welcome you back with us.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Great location for the conference center at the other side of the street. The room is nice and comes with a free mini bar. All amenities are present. There is a pool on 3rd and 23rd floor. Tapas in Gym restaurant were good.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Tom,
Thank you very much for your rating. We are happy to see that we have lived up to your expectations in terms of quality, service and facilities and you also appreciated our location. We hope to see you again soon.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Very tidy and clean rooms.  Staff were very helpful.  Restaurant on 3rd floor was nice.
The breakfast buffet was not great.  But there were many other options in the shopping centre next to hotel.  Would recommend this hotel and we will definitely book again in future.
reviews.owner_answer:

I´m sorry however you didn´t enjoy our breakfast...All our food is prepared with a great selection of products called 360, proximity, fair trade, seasonal… , and to enjoy a Mediterranean gastronomy you will find many dishes as salads, hot and cold dishes, fruits, vegetable, cold met, natural juices... among other products of high quality. It´s a very good way to discover our gastronomy
Thanks one again for recommending this hotel and we will be waiting for your again!
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Nice hotel, staff is friendly and helpful. Rooms are perfectly fine, could maybe use an update/refresh, but not crucial. Biggest issue is the elevators - usually they come quickly, but sometimes you wait around 5 - 8 minutes for one.

Best regards,
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: I stayed there 2 nights for work. Didn't use the restaurant or the spa. Breakfast was very nice (lots of choices). WiFi worked incredibly well throughout the stay in the room. Service was efficient. The rooftop pool is a little disappointing (very narrow and the surrounding area is small and boring too - though the view is nice).

It would be lovely to see you again in the hotel, for future bookings visit our website and use FBPRINCESS code for special discount.

Santiago Hernández
Director.

reviews.review_text:
This hotel is not matching my expectations for a 4 stars hotel:
- this hotel has 26 floors but only 3 lifts (you have to wait around 5 min to get one sometimes)

reviews.review_text:
I have to change my review for the worse to 1.
I was in the hotel in 30.04-04.05.2019.
You just can not be in the room.  the smell is disgusting.  In the room, the air conditioner is terribly noisy in the bedroom.  for a long time we could not understand whether this smell seems to us or not, therefore, we didn’t immediately turn to the reception office. reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Sergey,

Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Hotel nice enough and convenient for the convention centre which is across the road. Breakfast poor but OJ very nice. The so called restaurant in the hotel is terrible.  The hotel is missing a trick here as nearly all guests were eating out in local restaurants. Pool on 23rd floor was nice but only 8 beds and no seats. Worst thing about the hotel are the lifts  ,

Best wishes
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Not a very good hotel, overrated. Even thou is well located, elevators can't cope with the amount of clients, they take forever to arrive. Air condition is very deficient. Would not stay again

Best reagards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Elevators are super slow, especially during breakfast time. Sometimes it was faster to take the stairs! Beds are uncomfortable and the shower in the smaller rooms leak.  The pools are both tiny and you can't find a lawn chair after 10am. Finally, the gym leaves a lot to be desired. The staff is nice and friendly but it doesn't make up for the rest. reviews.review_text:
Facilities top notch, but no iron in the rooms.

Location is great if you have a conference, not so great if you want to explore Barcalona
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Babar,
Many thanks for sharing your reveiw.

Regarding ironing, we do not have irons for security reasons but we do have a laundry service available. We pick up your clothes and give you back during the same day, and we also have an express service if it´s more suitable for you, both pressing and laundry.
We hope to see you ba ck again.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
We stayed in a standard double room with an ocean view for 3 nights. The hotel has an initial wow factor with the big windows and obviously beautiful view of Barcelona but it isn’t until you have time to view the specifics that you see some disappointing flaws. Firstly, the bathroom is poorly designed, with no fans or windows for ventilation. The shower+bath screen doesn’t cover enough and water ends up all over the floor. Also, the window is right next to the shower and has one curtain covering it, meaning you choose between having the curtain soaked in water or access for anyone to possibly see you in the shower. The bed was king sized, comfortable and nice. There are two pools, both cold, clean and sizeable. The top floor pool is advertised as an infinity pool but this is certainly not the case as it has a platform at the end of it yet the glass is not clean.

One of my main reasons for booking was the location, it is good, being directly next to a mall with fast food, restaurants, clothing stores, a grocery store etc. however it is advertised as being “50m from the beach” however that is far from true as it is about a 10 minute walk of 800m. The nearest beach is the nudist strip so expect a lot of topless women and also a lot of trash in the water. Nothing to do with the hotel, but worth pointing out if you want to take your kids to a hotel where they’re near a beach, this probably isn’t the best option unless you don’t mind the nudity.

At the end we were not made aware of the city fee which was almost 8€ for 3 nights until we were checking out. 8€ isn’t much but only being made aware that we’d be charged AFTER spending most of our holiday money on food, souvenirs etc it was not nice to be presented with a hidden fee.

Overall the stay was okay, but almost every negative aspect could’ve been rectified by stating things more clearly or taking just a little extra time designing the bathrooms. I would probably not stay at this hotel again.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Lachlan,
Many thanks for this detailed feedback.
I´m glad your overall experience was a positive one but I would have liked it was much better.
Concerning the tourist tax, it is a tax on stays in all Catalunya for all those who stay in tourist establishments (hotels, apartments, pensions, etc). This is not something ikmposed by the hotel.
We do hope you will return to Barcelona Princess Hotel in the future, so we can deliver to you a more memorable experience.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Very nice rooms, great views from the hotel, handy location, very good breakfasts.
Some "glitches" should not be there though (like e.g. air con controller that could not detect the room got already completely frozen, the beautiful glass door to the shower cabin that could not be opened without nearly pulling it out of its hinges or difficulties with identifying the reservation at the check-in)
Very nice hotel very nice area comfortable and relaxing 😌 😎
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Myra,
Many thanks for your amazing review.
We are happy to read that you had a good stay with us. Nothing makes us more happy then our happy guest, so we hope to welcome you ba ck again.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text:
Nice location. Good views from the upper floors. Lovely pool at the top with fantastic overlook.
In these days, when people are so obsessed with keeping fit and working out, why not invest in a proper 'gym' at the hotel. It takes so litte.... A few treadmills, Basic machines for large musclegroups and some free weights. This is important for a lot of guests:)

Hi Henrik,

reviews.review_text: The location of the hotel is quite convenient for the purpose of my visit. The hotel rooms are quite small as compared to nearby hotel. Some of the furniture is very awkward to use. They do not provide the basic facilities which are available with most hotels of this type like an iron for clothes, moisturizer/cream, the gym is too small with very few equipment. Swimming pool is also very small. Food is decent. Overall not a very satisfied stay.

Friendly staff, felt very welcomed when we arrived. Room was nice, could do with a bit of paint, but nothing major. The view for the bedroom and bathroom overlooked the conference centre but also the sea. Waking up to the sun rising on the horizon was beautiful. Facilities at good. Location is pretty good to actually. Easy to find and really close to the metro station. Would stay here again.
reviews.owner_answer:

We are happy to hear that our rooms, staff, facilities and location were at the high of your expectations.
Hope to see you soon over here,
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Good hotel close to the beach and a mall
Good services. Some rooms with a great view. I will be back

reviews.review_text: Although the hotel itself is beautiful, the staff are very noisy in the corridors during the day which makes it hard to rest if you are jet lagged. Also, if your room is overlooking the pool, it can be very noisy if there are loud children/adults. The elevators are TERRIBLY slow! We do hope you will return to Barcelona Princess Hotel in the future, so we can deliver to you a  memorable experience.
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Rooms especially furniture need some serious updates. Location is nice for shopping and across the street from congress Centre. Staff is very nice and friendly. Free daily minibar refill was a really nice touch.
I just wish the windows can open in rooms without balconies.

Nice place, the room is ok, the service is ok. The elevators are underperforming as you may wait 5 to 10 minutes during rush hour.

Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Staff were fabulous, slightly disappointed with the pool areas. Showed really big in the reviews but during most of my stay I was hardly unable to use it. reviews.review_text: Amazing hotel in a beautiful position, near port and comfort for transport. Room it’s very beautiful and staff are really really charming. We come for a birthday and they give us a special gift in room with cake and white wine. We really appreciate. Thanks for everything!

reviews.review_text: Hotel is located in what seems to be a new part of the city with new long buildings and big new shops. Hotel has a heated (during winter) open air swimming pool. We didn't know that and we didn't bring any swimwear, however there's a primark shop just near the hotel where my girlfriend and I bought swimwear for a total of 10 euros. Hotel is clean, breakfast is really great. Staff are very friendly and welcoming. Deserves its 4 stars.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Aleksandrs,
Thakns a lot for shring your expericence with us
I am so pleased to read that your recent stay with us has been a perfect one. This is always our utmost goal, and I am very happy that we have succeeded during your stay.
Hope to see you back soon again.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Absolutely fantastic! The moment we arrived the reception staff made us feel welcomed and clearly explained what facilities they had within the hotel. We arrived at the hotel two hours before check in but they allowed us they leave our bags with them and offer us to use their facilities if we like.
Then later we went to our hotel room which was stunning. The beds were spacious and comfortable. The bathroom had great lighting and mirrors. And the balcony had a beautiful view of the sea and was big enough to seat out on.
We then used the gym bar which offers a menu and cocktails. The food was gorgeous from pizzas to burgers. They were cooked to perfection (and the burger cooked to how you like). They had a variety of cocktails and the ones I had (such as mango cooler) were amazing. The staff in the gym bar were delightful (Francesca was so welcoming and such a lovely woman). The view from the bar was also nice with a lovely view of the 1st floor pool (which you can drink out on) and the ocean.
We opted in for the breakfast buffet when booking the hotel and what a great it was. The buffet was massive with a variety of food from hot to cold to pastries to cereals. With drinks such as coffee, teas, juices all available. And the layout within the room was nice as well. Such a great buffet and was the one thing that made us get out of bed early!
There was an IT/chill out area which was handy to use if you need to print out tourist attraction tickets (for free). The 23rd floor pool was also a nice relaxation area which a gorgeous view.
Room service was extremely quick, when we needed spare robes and towels it came within minutes.
The hotel also has an ATM, bag weigh scales and another bar downstairs. The view from the glass lifts were amazing.
The hotel is located in a great area as well. There's a massive shopping centre right next door which is open til 10, and has a supermarket, clothing stores and fast food shops within it which was really handy at times.
Then at the back of the hotel there's a taxi rank which always had taxis available, and the tourist hop on hop off bus stop. Both once again were super handy.
The beach is around 10 min walk from here, and it's a lovely walk.
When we checked the staff called over a taxi and brought our luggage to the taxi.
Altogether this is extremely good hotel, well worth the money. It was so homely and very well ran. I can't think of a negative what so ever. Four star hotel should soon turn into five stars!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello,
Thanks for taking your time in writing this review, we are glad that you enjoyed our staff service. Our breakfast is made with natural products that come from fair trade and offer the best quality.  We are happy to know that you did enjoy the amazing views from our pool on the 23 floor. Our location is close to the beach and with several transports a few steps from the entrance. We hope that you enjoyed your stay in Barcelona and we really wish to see you again.
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Hotel rooms are 100% business minded :
- very close to convention center
- usually has good deals with enterprises during conventions.
- high levels with a nice view
- close to the sea to run in the morning
- an Ok Breakfast but not the greatest

Bad :
- when the hotel is fully booked and you are at higher levels of rooms , you can wait up to 20 min for your elevator , often out of service too.

- very very far away from any tourist attractions or restaurants. When you plan a diner with your customer take a taxi !!

- limited comfort in the room , especially after a long day of running around the convention you need that extra comfort which it doesn’t offer .
reviews.owner_answer:

Kindest regards

reviews.review_text: hotel card keys were not working every day had to go reception multiple times to then be told to calm down even doh i didn't raise my voice one time or be disrespectful the windows in the rooms have the handles snapped of so u cant open the balcony window we had a sea view room that was absolutely stunning cleaning staff were lovely the bar staff on floor three such nice ppl the bar staff on the ground floor are thieves and so horrible and disrespectful they charged €53 for one pint of estrella one Malibu and sprite and four shots of jager then when i was in the shower my mrs went for chips just a regular bowl of chips and she was charged €16 .but  up stairs on bar 3 the same five drinks come to €30 after tip just saying also if ur english most of them in Catalonia hate us dont no why that is but it is what it is . and its built right by sewage works as all you can smell there is human waste the further you walk away from the hotel into barcelona the smell does go
reviews.owner_answer:

For security reasons our windows in rooms can´t be opened. But next time you are with us I recommend you to reserve a superior room instead of a standard one as all superiors have balcony or terrace and so you can go outside.
Regarding the prices, they are the same for the corner bar and the Gym Bar, so if you consumed the same drinks, the total price should be the same.

reviews.review_text:
The hotel was lovely and the staff were very helpful and friendly. The free mini bar was greatly appreciated and it gets refiled everyday! Good location and transport nearby and rooftop pool was amazing.

would definitely recommend
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Darragh
We would like to thank you for recommanding the Barcelona Princess and for the wonderfully positive review following your recent stay.
See you again next time you come back to Barcelona !!
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
We spent 5 days in this wonderful hotel.

Extremely friendly staff, especially Roc who did an early check in on the first day and put us in a room on the 25th floor overlooking Barcelona!

For the cleanliness of the hotel and the room 5* all credit to the housekeeping team! (Ritual cosmetics are used in the rooms)

In the room you will find an Android phone that you can use completely free of charge when touring the city, with the Internet and recommendations on what to visit

On the 3rd and 23rd floor there is an open swimming pool with hot water, a real treat in January.

Very close to the hotel there is a metro and taxi station. (Shopping mall also)

Recommendation certainly.
Thank you for a fantastic stay!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Natasa,
Thanks a lot for your kind and detailed feedback.
We are thrilled to learn that everything during your stay was to your satisfaction, starting out with the friendliness of our staff through the cleanliness of our facilities.
I will kindly pass on your words to our colleagues and this will for sure put a smile on their faces
We hope to see you back soon again.
Regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
We got this hotel at a great price for such a class hotel. The front desk staff were very helpful and friendly, as were the rest of the staff. The rooms are gorgeous and contemporary and were complete with slippers and bath robe and electric blinds and bathroom blinds.

The location was good too, around a 3 minute walk from the metro, which is around 6 or 7 minutes from the city centre. Everything you need is within a few minutes’ walk from this hotel including the Diagonal Mar shopping centre right next door.

A special touch always goes down well, and our friend who was also staying there got a nice birthday surprise of a bottle of birthday Champaign and cake, which he enjoyed while chilling out in the rooftop pool on the 23rd floor.

The only reason I didn't give this fine hotel 5 stars was because during lunch it was almost impossible to get a coffee as the queues were large and the staff were slow. apart from that, everything was great.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Gary,
We are very pleased that you posted your review to give other travelers a glimpse of what it is like to stay at our hotel.
It is terrific to hear how highly you valued your experience with us and that you liked every element of our property as well the service you received from the team. We will pass your comments to the team!
Hope to see you soon again.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Nice hotel. The city view from the 24th floor is absolutely amazing. The bahroom is a little weird. The most disturbing thing is the very weak water pressure. After you flush the toilet, you have to wait at least half hour to do it again. Another disturbing thing: I choose to make my reservation on the hotel website, I prepaid it, but at the check in I was asked to pay again! To convince the receptionnist, I had to show my CC statement, which is not ok.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Andrei,
Many thanks for staying with us and for sharing your experience. We are s glad to see you had a great stay and you enjoyed our terrific views. We will have a look at the bathroom to see if everythng is Ok and if not, we will take the appropiated measues. Thanks for letting us know.
As you said, your reservation was paid in advanced thought the website. When you arrived our front desk department just asked for your credit car to guarantee any extra charge (is our hotle policy), but not for invoicing the stay again. We are so sorry for the misunderstanding.
We would really like to welcome you back again next time you visit Barcelona.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Best of both worlds! Its close to a nice beach and has great infrastructure around. We had an awesome view over Barcelona and enjoyed the clean room and great facilities. We thank the hotel staff for their friendly service! This made our stay very special.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Rashin,
Many thanks for your review.
I am absolutely thrilled and extremely happy to hear that you had such an amazing stay with us. We work hard to achieve 100 % guest satisfaction and are very happy when our guests really appreciate our commitment and determination.
We're looking forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon!
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Nice business hotel in general, but I would not recommend it for a city trip. Metro and Taxi take like 15-20min to get into the city.
Rooms are a little worn down, but still OK for that price. Breakfast had a great variety and was delicious. The hotel staff was friendly and helpful as expected.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Chris,
Many thanks for sharing your experience.
We are so glad to see you enjoyed your stay! We are just 3 minutes walking distance from a metro station that takes you to the city center in less than haldf an hour and you can also reach it by tram an bus.
We are really happy to see you appreciate our breakfast bus specially happy about the hotel staff, always friendly and helpfull and willing to make their best to make you feel at home.
We look forward to welcome you back again.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Well, the hotel is good. I have had trouble booking this hotel earlier because they have been expensive.but this time I could see sub $100 rate, which is unusual. I stayed for three nights. The good about this hotel is that they provide a smartphone for our use and we can make local and internatiomal calls for free. The bad - no coffee maker and iron in the room. Of all the hotels that I have stayed at in my life, this is the only hotel that does not provide coffee maker and iron in the room. This is a big turn off for me. Not staying here even at sub $100 rate.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Amrish,
Many thanks for sharing your experience with all of us.
We are glad you found it a good hotel but we ould have liked your experience was much better.
Regarding our rates, the hotel does not have a single rate but it depends on the availability, the events taking place in Barcelona ... so the prices vary depending on the dates.
I also understand your concern regarding the irons, however it is for security (fire risk) and electric network limit reasons why we do not have irons available for our guests. We have a laundry service available, we pick up your clothes and give them you back during the same day. We also provide an express service if it´s more suitable for you, both pressing and laundry.
All our rooms have a minibar that is free and that our team fill every day. There is no coffee facilities in room, but you can take a coffee, tea, or whatever you prefer in our bar or even order it to your room as we have a 24h room service.
We would really like to welcome you back you stay in Barcelona to provide you abetter experience.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
Beautiful hotel, great service and equipment!
Amazing selection and top quality breakfast.
The staff is super friendly and fluent in multiple languages.. very professional but still open for a nice and interesting talk.
Thank you for the great and relaxing time! We'll be back soon!!! :-)
5*smiles

The view of the sea is breathtaking, the rooms are big and spacious and the roof top pool is amazing with the view of the sea. Definitely recommend if you want a beautiful sea view room and at an affordable price.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Adrian,
We would like to thank you for recommending the Barcelona Princess and for the wonderfully positive review following your recent stay.
We really hope to see you back again!!
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Nice enough rooms, but relatively small and the beds are singles not doubles. Beds are quite close together as a result of the small room size. The bathroom door blocks no sound whatsoever as it is a glass panel with gaps all the way around. Bit weird for a 2-person room.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Kristina,
Thanks for your feedback. We are disappointed to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us.
Our rooms are made with a modern but warm design, all our guests can find different types of rooms at the hotel.  Some of them have a different design as the Terrace Superior Room or the Superior Room with Balcony.
Please visit us again. We will be pleased to see you soon,
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: A flawed hotel. Rooms are nicely designed with comfy beds and sea view is great HOWEVER breakfast is average and if you are on a high floor and like to be on time in the mornings then the lifts will NOT make this possible. On average it will take 10 mins just to get up and down at busy times. To make matters worse the key cards randomly  stop working. The gym is also terrible with old and I would even go so far as to say, dangerous. One running machine turned off half way through a jog and the other had a belt which kept slipping! They also don’t provide an iron, which for a business hotel is utter joke. Had to pay almost 40 euros to get 3 shirts and a psi of trousers dry cleaned as they don’t even have a press only option!! I won’t be staying there again.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Shomo
Thank you very much for having taken your time to make us aware of your concerns. Your comments help us to evaluate and improve the experiences of our guests.
I am very sorry to hear that your stay was not to your satisfaction. I can assure you that your experience is in no way indicative of the standard of service and care that we do pride ourselves on providing.
We regret your experience with our elevators and we appreciate your patience and understanding.  We have 5 elevators, 2 of them from ground floor to business centre, Breakfast restaurant and meeting rooms and 3 panoramic lifts where you can enjoy the views of Barcelona.  We are in process of installing a lift intelligent system to optimize the client flow. About ironing, we do not have irons for security reasons but we have a laundry service available. We pick up your clothes and give you back during the same day, and we also have an express service if it´s more suitable for you.
We will contact our maintenance staff to check the gym and take the appropriate measures if necessary.
We would like you give us another opportunity to offer you the service that all our guests deserve.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Lifts are a problem - they are slow or not working.  Get used to using the stairs.  Rooms smell like smoke.  Service is average.  Clean.  Receptionists are good.  This is a pay on arrival hotel which is an issue, especially when they don’t tell you this until you arrive.  I really don’t like paying in advance.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Jeff,
Thank you for your feedback.
We regret that your experience was not completely positive in our hotel; we do our best every day to give the best service and facilities to our guests.
As per our hotel policy payment must be made on arrival, and concerning lifts, we will install a lift intelligent system to optimize the client flow. In fact we are in process of doing it… and we would like to thank you for your patience and understanding during your stay.
We would really like to welcome you back again and give us the opportunity to provide the service all our guest are used to.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text:
The staff are lovely and helpful!
We stayed on the 14th floor and had a sea view room. The views from this hotel are unreal!!!
The rooms are clean, comfortable and well designed.
A free mini bar, toiletries gift box and Samsung in the room were all very welcomed surprises.

Location wise, it's great.
It is a bit away from the main center of things but that's not a bad thing.
Beside the sea and has a massive shopping center practically attached to it. So many shops and restaurants!!
It is right beside the metro, tram and bus links so it's really easy to travel to and from.

The hotel has 2 pools.
One on the 3rd floor with views of the sea and the natural museum. This also has a terrace where you can get food and drink. Access to the gym and sauna.
The next pool is on the 23rd floor with spectacular views all over Barcelona!!!

The only downside to the hotel that we could fault was €22.50 for a fry up!!! (Breakfast wasn't included in our rate)Madness! We actually didn't eat at the hotel because of this.
Also accessibility to tea or coffee making facilities in the room would be a great addition to the already fantastic rooms. Oh and an iron! Sometimes the clothes don't travel well..

If you are looking for a good base to see Barcelona, look no further!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello  Sinéad,
Let me take this opportunity to thank you for staying at the Barcelona Princess Hotel.
I am absolutely thrilled and extremely happy to hear that you had such an amazing stay with us. We work hard to achieve 100 % guest satisfaction and are very happy when our guests really appreciate our commitment and determination.
I do hope we are able to welcome you back again to the hotel sometime in the future to experience another wonderful stay.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: The location is great if you are attending meetings at the convention center. It has easy access so the subway, the trams, and taxis. The rooms have a cleaver glass wall that separates the bedroom from the bathroom to allow a larger feel and more light. The only downs the Hard surfaces that amplify noice in the room.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Shane,
Many thanks for staying with us and for letting us know your opinion.
We are glad that you have enjoyed your time here and we have managed to live up to your expectations, thank you for the high punctuation.
We hope to see you back soon again.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Worst stay of my life . Went through 4 TVs in 3 nights. Shower was leaking into the bathroom. The keys deprogrammed multiple times per day. The room service says it’s 24 hours but when we finally got a hold of them after calling reception to get them to call us back. They didn’t know the prices or product that is on the menu in the rooms. Never said sorry about the keys, or anything. Matter of fact they asked what we did to make the key deprogram. The elevators take 10 minutes to get down, even though there are 3 different ports. It is too far from anything other than the beach. Far from restaurants and monuments. The part of the city is very new and underwhelming. The beach is tacky and has no public bathrooms. The only thing that is ok about the hotel is they have an ok breakfast. I wouldn’t stay here again if they paid me.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Maria,
Thank you very much for having taken your time to make us aware of your concerns. Your comments help us to evaluate and improve the experiences of our guests.
We are happy to see you appreciated our breakfast but on the other hand we are sorry and highly concerned to hear your comments about your overall experience at the hotel. We take all comments immensely seriously and use them to review and to ensure we continue to improve the guest experience.
We are located in a quite area not downtown, but there is a metro station just 3 minutes walking distance that takes you to the city center in less than half an hour. And once there, you can visit the most emblematic sites of Barcelona.
We will contact our maintenance department to check the shower and the room lock  and we will take the appropriated measures. Thanks for letting us know!
About elevators, we will install a lift intelligent system to optimize the client flow. In fact we are in process of doing it… and we would like to thank you for your patience and understanding during your stay.
We would really like to welcome you back again and give us the opportunity to provide the service all our guest are used to
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princes

reviews.review_text:
Rooms lost a star due to v small toilet and shower cubicles
Location ok easy reach of the metro
Staff were fabulous every need catered for
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Wendy,
Many thanks for sharing your experience.
We are glad to see you ha a great time even you thought the toiltet and toilet cubicles were small.
We hope to see yo back again, maybe in a superior room as the room layout is different.
Kindest regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Fantastic hotel. The staff were friendly and extremely professional. The room was very comfortable and clean. The only problem was the shower head was very high and us shorties had to stand on tiptoe to alter the angle.  The views from the 23rd floor are great. It's a shame that it rained on the day that we would have loved to use the pool on the 23rd floor, but you can't have everything. We would definitely use this hotel again the next time we're in Barcelona.
reviews.owner_answer:
Thanks Terry for your fantastic review.
We do look forward to welcoming you soon again to our Hotel and you have the chance of use our 2 heated pools.
Warmest regards,
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Booked Hotel Barcelona Princess for 3 nights. Had a really nice experience in general but got a bit disappointed of the room placement. The view was extraordinary and every day, after a long day walking, getting back to an impeccable room, man... there is nothing better than that. But... our room was the last of the hall, and I imagine we were place next to the laundry room because the noise, specially at night, was really annoying. We were so tired every day that after the second night, the noise was not that intense, but still, for the price we paid I was expecting a quieter room. Service and personnel were great. We even requested uber eats and the delivery to the hotel went perfectly. Luckily location of the hotel is walking distance from the mall, train and bus stations, you are in beautiful Barcelona in less than 20 minutes.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Andrea,
Many thanks for your feedback.
We are delighted to have met your expectations in terms of quality, service, location and facilities.
I´m however so sorry to read yu were disturbed from some noise... our laundry room is not located on the room floors. Anyway if you ever come back and there is somethong that is not at your liking you just have to contact our guest service and we well do all our best to solve your issue. And if its not possibole to do it quickly and we have rooms available you wll be moved.
We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back when your travels bring you back to Barcelona.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

reviews.review_text: Good room service. Friendly reseptionists. Very delicious breakfast.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hello Mantas,
Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, I am pleased to see your stay with us was a great one and the staff will be delighted to see you comments. We all hope to see you again on your next visit to Barcelona.
Kindest regards
Santiago Hernández
Director

reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel at the beginning of Avingunda Diagonal. Nice view to the beach for some rooms. Definitely clean, friendly and helpful staff. Awesome breakfast with many many options. Within walking distance one can only go to the nearby beach and the nearby shopping mall. However it needs only 15' by metro to reach Barcelona's center.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Michalis,
Many thanks for you kind review.
I am delighted that you loved so many aspects of your stay. It is a pleasure to read that you loved your room, staff and location. I am thrilled that you enjoyed highlighted our breakfast with all our options!
We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back when your travels bring you back to Barcelona.
Best regards
Hotel Barcelona Princess

name: Palacio de los Duques Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World
